description: Hit ‘em where it hurts! The ultimate boxing game on mobile! Come swing your fists in this all-immersive mobile boxing game. Hone your jabs, hooks and uppercuts at the Training Center while accumulating special skills and power moves in the Skill Store. Presented in hilarious 3D, Punch Hero is addictive as it is challenging. With multiple modes of gameplay and customizable options, Punch Hero offers hours of endless boxing action! • • • FEATURES • • • • ADRENALINE PUMPING BOXING ACTION • Deliver swift jabs, hooks, uppercuts and serve brutal knockout punches as you fight your opponent. • CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION • Give yourself a gnarly beard or maybe some cool shades as you dress your character in the Costume Shop with items that enhance performance. • INTENSE SKILL BUILDING IN THREE DIFFERENT MODES! • Fight with new challengers in Arcade Mode, Amateur Mode and Pro Mode as you level up and hone your jabs, hooks and uppercuts. • ADD YOUR OWN FACE! • Throw your friend (or enemy) into the ring by creating your own challenger in Challenger Registry. No bitmap images are used in these clocks which means whatever be the grid size of your screen, you can re-size these widgets without having to compromise with quality and sharpness. It’s time for this year’s pumpkin race! Purple Turtle, Zing the Rabbit and Biggy Bear excitedly carve out their pumpkin boats ready to race along the river. But when things don’t go to plan, Purple shows that kindness is more important than winning. Purple Turtle storybook apps help make learning to read fun and rewarding. Each tale contains animations and full voice narration that bring to life the adventures of Purple and his friends as they learn about bravery, honesty and compassion. The narration can be toggled on or off, helping children to develop their reading skills as they grow. Each Purple Turtle app contains a complete story that will delight young readers with their fun and engaging characters. ** No in-app purchases or adverts** - Full voice narration - Fun and engaging characters - Animations bring the pages to life Developed by Gazoob, the team behind "Read with Biff, Chip & Kipper" on iOS and Android.

Here you can read the latest Space Scoop, our astronomy news service for children aged 8 and above. The idea behind Space Scoop is to change the way science is often perceived by young children as an outdated and dull subject. By sharing exciting new astronomical discoveries with them, we can inspire children to develop an interest in science and technology. Space Scoop makes a wonderful tool that can be used in the classroom to teach and discuss the latest astronomy news.

This is a very young princess who lives in a castle like the ones in the fairy tales. She likes to walk and play all day long in her castle yard and she would be very happy to make friends with a nice girl like you. The pretty princess is already waiting for you there to help her decide what sweet, lovely pretty princess dress she should put on for her major birthday party at the castle. So, play with the princess and get her dress for a new beautiful day, check out her pretty royal wardrobe and pick up the most beautiful dress of all to dress her up. description: A wedding cake is the most important part of a wedding ceremony! I want it to look delicious, fascinating and spectacular when I will get married so that all guests should be impressed! My wedding cake will have three layers lovely decorated and on top of my wedding cake I shall have 2 beautiful white doves as symbol of love and affection. Choose different colors and toppings for each cake decorating layer, pick the fanciest wedding cake plate, a pretty table cloth and your favorite background. The lovely chubby penguin needs your help to fly across the Antarctic icebergs! Chubby Penguin is a well-designed game which is entertaining and gets you into addicted. Easy to play! Use your finger slides up and down on the screen to control the directions of penguin, and avoid the icebergs to get points.

There is a group of penguins in the Antarctic, they just eat, sleep and bully Chubby in their daily life. Only one penguin eats and sleeps....in fact, this penguin's name is Chubby. But all of the penguins look like the same, you need to recognize the bad ones instantly, don't make wrong attack, and can't take actions too slow either. How can you stop them from bullying Chubby in time? It's the exciting action game which can trials your reaction speed, and can releases the pressure at the same time.

Fun math game for kids and you! Help your children to feel easy on their learning. This is a memory game for you to find the answer from your memory. You will need to memory the number in cards first, and then we will ask you the question later. From easy to very hard, even to the level of genius, this game integrates short-term memory and arithmetic. You will have fun in this game, and exploit brain’s potential unconsciously. Your ability of short-term memory, attention and arithmetic will be improved in the same time. The game is not only suitable for children, but also for adults who want to improve their memory. In some hard level, you can play with your children and increase parent-child interaction. The level in this game is from easy to hard. The cards you need to memorize will be increasing. The numerical will become larger and larger too. You may be asked to add or subtract two numbers and then select a correct answer card from your memory. Sometimes, you will be asked to select two cards from memory, and make sure after the two numbers being added or subtracted, the answer will be the number which shows in the screen. You can select any level you want to play in this game. We didn’t lock them. But our suggestion is to play from the easier level, so your ability of memory will be gained step by step. In the future, we may add more level if you tell us that the current level is too easy for you. Tip: Feel that the number of cards is increasing? Imagine that your eyes are the camera shot. Blink your eyes is just like to press shutter. Try to take a photo of the screen in front of your eyes. Notice:This app may not suitable for any Android Mobile. Please download the Free version to test before buying the Full version!!

RINGME is an alternative Ringdroid with elegant design, and more enhancements to come in the next updates. now RINGME allow user to Share Ringtone via email, wifi, bluetooth, etc ... - add a Sound Manager utility - add a Ringtone Picker utility - add a media browser which allow user to browse through audio files in external storage, - an external storage can be either built-in storage or sd card, in case there are both, sdcard could be inside the folder external_sd/ (e.g Samsung Galaxy SII) - use the Home button to quickly go back to external storage root while browsing - user can filter hidden files (in Settings) You can find more apps from Genie Nin by clicking Android icon inside!!! Use RINGME to edit MP3, WAV, AAC, and AMR audio files and create ringtones, alarms, and notifications from them.. More below... Tips: - long-press on an audio file from the main screen to delete it. - copy audio files to your SD card using a USB cable, or get MP3s using the Amazon MP3 application. - tap anywhere on the waveform to start playing at that position. - while playing, tap the word Start or End to quickly set the start and end markers to the current playback time. - Use the jog wheel for more precise adjustments. Keywords: MP3, WAV. AAC/MP4. 3GPP/AMR, Ringtone, Ringdroid, Music, Alarm, Notification, Contact, Editor, FREE app with AD supported. Permissions: - CONTACTS to SELECT, ASSIGN RINGTONE - STORAGES to SAVE RINGTONEs - INTERNET for AD Ringdroid project: http://code.google.com/p/ringdroid/ Ring Extended http://code.google.com/p/apps-for-android/ Sound Manager http://code.google.com/p/app-soundmanager/ Apache License, Version 2.0 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html

TMB App is the app from Transports Metropolitans de Barcelona that lets you access all the information you need on Barcelona bus and metro services from your smartphone. You can also enjoy personalisation services that make getting around Barcelona that much easier.
release_text: In the face of the wearable technology explosion that has taken place in the last year, as part of its TMB Digital strategic programme, TMB has made a firm commitment to extending this functions of TMBapp to these types of device in order to give users even greater access to transport services and information. This is the first version of TMBapp compatible with Apple and Android smart watches, and it incorporates iBus for both favourite stops and the nearest stops to the user’s location.

description: If you like the christmas spirit and everything else about the christmas this is the game for you! This game includes many christmas related things, everything from santa claus to snowflakes to rudolf the reindeer. Kids Christmas Scratch reveal and color is a classic scratch off game where a layer of some kind is scratched off to reveal a hidden image behind. It's suitable for children to learn about colors, shapes, winter and christmas. Features * 16 levels, 8 free and 8 unlockable (childproof in-app purchase). * 8 different types of layers to scratch off; solid colour, black and white, twisted, blurred, frosted, tiled, crystallized and inverted colours. On old devices only a subset of layers are supported. * Colorful HD graphics * This adorable kids scratch & learning game is suitable for toddlers and preschool kids (both boys and girls). * The game contains everything associated with christmas - Reindeers, santa claus, snow, songs & music, even some gnomes. KavraKids takes pride in creating apps for kids and toddlers. That's why all our kids and toddlers games are ad free and all links to external content and in app purchases will be childproof.

description: The Jumps season brings the very best of Chase and Hurdle horseracing from November through to April. Races include iconic events such as the William Hill King George VI Steeple Chase, the Cheltenham Gold Cup and the Grand National at Aintree. Now you can add to the excitement with the Telegraph’s FREE TO PLAY Fantasy Jumps Series game. Just select three jockeys and three trainers who'll score points for you each time they have a winner or placed horse throughout the series. Then pick two horses ahead of every race throughout the season to add to your score. You can play on your own or, better still, set up your own private league with friends. Download the app today and pick your stable to be in with a chance of winning some spectacular prizes including: - A share in a Jumps racehorse with The Racegoers Club for a two-season period - 2nd and 3rd place will each receive their own racing silks, as well as a one-year membership to The Racegoers Club - Monthly winners will win a Premier day for two at the races - The highest scoring provate league will win a Premier day at the races for six people Note: Prizes available are subject to age and location. See in-app for full terms and conditions.

GedStar Pro (now totally FREE!) works with a genealogy program on your PC to show all the details of your family history. Converts directly from "The Master Genealogist" and "Legacy Family Tree", or from a GEDCOM file. Displays all your data including events, notes, sources, repositories, and photos. Some product-specific features are also available, such as the research log or to-do list. There are four basic views: Personal Details; Family Group; Ancestor Tree; and Descendant Tree. There are several ways to navigate up and down a line of descent, and to search for specific people. An extensive menu of other features is available, such as for viewing your complete family photo gallery. Includes the "On This Day" widget as part of the GedStar Pro app with the new name "GedStar Today". This app requires the use of a free Windows conversion program, which is available from our website. A sample database is included with the Android app so you can explore the user interface without having to convert your own data. The database is stored on your device's internal memory and there are no limits on the number of people or amount of other data. It has been tested on a database of over 40,000 individuals.
release_text: > Fix feature that was broken by Android 6.0 upgrade.

description: Cheap International Calls with no connection fees. Download FooCall today and enjoy cheap international calls with no connection fees, plus your first call is FREE* Why download FooCall? • No Connection fees • Low call rates for over 200 countries • Earn free credit when you share and recommend FooCall • Make international calls using Wi-Fi or monthly network minutes • No SIM card required • Great Call Quality via GSM or Wi-Fi • Check all our Calling Rates in app • Share the app on Facebook or Twitter • No ads in the FooCall app - just download, add credit and make your calls • Hassle free Whether you're calling from home, a cafe or whilst travelling, FooCall gives you the flexibility and reliability you need when making calls abroad. We do everything we can to keep our call rates as low as possible, without compromising on quality. No matter where you are in the world, you can benefit from high quality, low cost calls with FooCall. Try FooCall out now – your first call is on us*! * First call is free up to £0.10 credit, call rates will vary depending on the country you are calling.

developer: GiggleUp Kids Apps And Educational Games
description: Calling aspiring fashion designers everywhere! Design, create, and style entire outfits fit for the cover of Glamour Girl magazine. Have you got a knack for colors, patterns and shapes? Showcase your creativity and bring those designs to life with this new app by the creators of award-winning kids apps and Hinkler Books. Choose from different cuts, colors and patterns and explore with prints and other accessories to create your dream design. Now made easy with simple multi-touch gestures, you can move, rotate and adjust everything exactly to your liking. Love your creation? You won't need to say goodbye to it. Every piece you create is a new addition to your wardrobe. Add the finishing touch with beauty accessories and you're ready for the photoshoot. Choose from beautiful backgrounds, or use your device's camera to take your own. Capture the perfect pose and voila! Bursting with content and fun tools, Glamour Girl - T-shirt Designer is your backstage access to the fashion world. KEY FEATURES - 8 models to choose from, each with their own unique personalities and fashion favorites - Customize your design with 24 different fabric patterns - Play around with 32 design accessories - buttons, graphic prints, pockets, and lots more! - Complete the outfit with jewelry, shoes and hair accessories - Choose from different cover backgrounds or take your own with the in-built camera - Save your magazine and share it with friends and family! - Kid-friendly interface with simple touch commands - Original characters from the popular Glamour Girls kids activity book series
release_text: Resolved the transparent clothes issue occurred on some devices.

developer: GiggleUp Kids Apps And Educational Games
description: Touch, look, and listen! 360 flashcards with words and sounds featuring animals, musical instruments, vehicles, and more! Simply tap to see a photo of the object, hear its name spoken out, and see it spelled across the screen. The perfect learning tool to add to your little one's playtime fun. Start the App and jump straight into the game - safe and simple. Touch the adorable illustrations of objects to display flashcards, and use tabs to quickly jump between categories. Tap on a picture and up pops a real-life photograph of that animals or object, accompanied by the sound that it makes! That's not all - each item has five real pictures and sounds to keep the kids interested. Explore six categories of words with bright and lively high-definition pictures and excellent sound quality. Includes farm animals, zoo animals, musical instruments, vehicles, household objects, and scenery - kids won't tire of tapping and exploring through all the wonderful curiosities it has to offer! The musical instruments category is especially packed with fun - for every instrument, five different runs of musical tunes are played for you to hear and perhaps have a little jiggle to! KEY FEATURES - Safe and easy navigation - play with just one tap! - An engaging learning environment for toddlers and preschool kids, including bright and beautiful graphics of animals and objects to see, and fun sounds to hear - 360 HD photographs accompanied by pleasant, high-quality sounds - 6 categories with loads of content! Includes photos of farm and domestic animals, wild and zoo animals, musical instruments, vehicles, household objects, and scenery. - The scenery category features scenes from countries all around the world! - 5 different pictures and sounds for each object to keep things fresh - Parental lock for safe playing -------------- Connect with us! Visit us: http://www.GiggleUp.com Like us: facebook.com/GiggleUpApps Follow us: twitter.com/GiggleUpApps Email us: Support@GiggleUp.com Brought to you by GiggleUp, creators of the award-winning Interactive Telling Time and other educational apps and games for kids. Our goal is to promote learning through play with the purpose of helping children develop useful learning skills. Our apps are enjoyed by children, at home or in the classroom, all around the world!

Learn English: Listen and Write allows you to enhance your listening and comprehension of English in an easy and funny way. Listen to more than 1000 words and 250 phrases in English and get a score on your level of understanding. Supports 2 voice accent (UK English and U.S. English) and 2 voice genders (man and woman). Press play to listen and forward / rewind to hear new words and phrases. It requires an internet connection

Gilroy Outlet Mall using Google maps 1) Geolocates you and the searched store on the map 2) Can call the store from within the app 3) Internal walkways of the mall are drawn in red 4) App update not needed to get new store info. Can download store info from within the app. 5) Can save favorite places and plot them all at the same time on the map. 6) Has bathroom info 7) No longer need to relaunch app if data download fails. 8) Share your favorite stores right from within the app! This app is in no way affiliated with Gilroy Premium Outlets (r).

description: Für viele Angler ist das spätere Foto die wichtigste Trophäe. Und die meisten führen auch ein sehr akribisches Fangbuch. Wir haben uns bemüht, eine App für jeden Angler zu schaffen. Die wichtigsten Daten zu einem Fang können somit digital gespeichert und mit Bildern versehen werden - völlig unabhängig von der Fischart. Es gibt alle Funktionen, die zu einem ordentlichen Fangbuch gehören. Dies ist eine App für den eigenen Gebrauch und nicht zum Veröffentlichen von Fängen. Jeder, der ein Fangbuch führt, kennt das Problem, die aufgeschriebenen Daten später einem Fangbild zuzuordnen. Das gehört jetzt der Vergangenheit an! Ihre Fänge können Sie jetzt detailliert mit dem Smartphone festhalten und sichern. For many anglers the later photo is the most important trophy. And most also carry a very meticulous logbook. We have tried to create an app for every angler. The most important data for a catch can thus be stored digitally and with illustrations - completely independent of the species. There are all functions that belong to a proper logbook. This is an app for their own use and not for publishing catches. Anyone who runs a fishing book, knows the problem, then assign the data you recorded a capture image. This is now a thing of the past! Your catches, you can now detail to stick with the smartphone and secure.

Android version of a well known translation service in Georgia, http://translate.ge ქართულად: translate.ge-ს აპლიკაცია ანდროიდისთვის. ჯერჯერობით მხოლოდ ონლაინ და ნაწილობრივი ოფლაინ რეჟიმებით. გთხოვთ დაწეროთ თქვენთვის სასურველი ფუნქციები რომლებიც გინდათ რომ აპლიკაციას დაემატოს. გავითვალისწინეთ თქვენი თხოვნები და აპლიკაციას დაემატა ენის ამოცნობა (ანუ აღარ მოგიწევთ გადართვა ერთი ენიდან მეორეზე), ქართული კლავიატურა (ყველა ანდროიდის მომხმარებელი შეძლებს გამოიყენოს აპლიკაცია რუთის და ქართული ფონტების გარეშეც). გთხოვთ გახსოვდეთ, რომ თქვენ აფასებთ აპლიკაციას და არა სერვისს, შეაფასეთ შესრულების ხარისხი, ხოლო ბაზის სიმწირესთან დაკავშირებით მიმართეთ თვითონ translate.ge-ს ადმინისტრაციას. _____ Tags: ქართული, ინგლისური, ქართულ-ინგლისური, ლექსიკონი, თარგმნა, გადათარგმნე, უფასო, dictionary, vocabulary, glossary, georgian, english, qartuli, kartuli, inglisuri, leqsikoni, leksikoni, targmna, qartuli, translate, translate.ge, free, ufaso, upaso

Bored in the office and want to get away? Time to slack! Sarah loves slacking and procrastinating in this new Office Slacking girls game, Office Slacking 10. Complete eight fun mini-games within the time limit but don't get caught goofing off by the boss! Sarah has a romantic date planned for this evening and she can't wait to escape work to meet up with her hunky boyfriend, Tim. But she's stuck in the office and counting down the seconds until she can leave... Can she pass the time and have a bit of fun slacking in the office instead? Help Sarah prepare for her date without her boss noticing in this fun date slacking skill game! Summer is Here, Let's Slack! It's hard to concentrate on work when romance, flowers and true love awaits afterwards! Sarah is a real day dreamer and would sooner doodle on a notepad and color in some cute heart shapes or text her boyfriend than work Get Ready for Your Date! Sarah is planning a date with her boyfriend, but she's so lazy that she hasn't gotten ready yet. Maybe she can prepare for her date at work! Help her sort out her hair, touch up her lipstick and get her dress and jewellery ready... Without being caught, of course. Are You Skilled Enough? Complete all seven mini-games within three minutes. Tap and rub on the screen to complete the activities. Don't Get Caught! Don't goof off when the boss is on the screen. If your boss walks by your desk, tap on the close button to close the activity so she won't notice you messing around in the office. Game Features: >Help Sarah slack at work in the time limit. >Procrastinate in the office with fun mini-games. >Avoid doing work, but don't get caught by your boss. >Slack off and prepare for a romantic date with your boyfriend. >Text your boyfriend and make plans. >Get your dress ironed and ready. >Create a romantic vase full of red roses. >Put on your nicest jewellery. >Brush and straighten your hair. >Apply your best lipstick. >Pass the time at work by colouring in fun doodles. >Remember... Don't get caught! Why toss paper into a bin when you can toss a goldfish into a toilet bowl? Goldfish Toss is a simple but very addicting game. Use your finger to flick the goldfish into the toilet bowl, but pay close attention to the wind speed and direction or your goldfish will go splat.
release_text: - Game is now FREE! - Added ads.

description: Do you like hamburgers? I am sure you do. Then, for sure you will enjoy playing American Checkers! No matter if you are bored of Chess or regular Checkers. It's time for you to try the American version of this classic board game, which Checkers without a doubt are. In this version you can play against "a quite clever CPU" or your real-life friend - on one device! The big advantage of "American Checkers" is calm but colorful graphics, which will not disturb you while playing the game. The rules are quite simple: - the regular pieces can move one square forward diagonally - you can beat the opponent's piece by jumping over his or her pieces - if there are multiple jumps available, you have to make all available steps in this sequence - the regular piece becomes a king (is kinged) if you move him into the last row of your opponent's side - the king can move forward and backward by one square diagonally and beat only these pieces, which are adjacent diagonally - JUMPS are MANDATORY! - but you can choose the sequence Below more detailed description: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/English_draughts
release_text: 1.1 - HELP screen added (under OPTIONS screen). 1.2 - Framework updated to Cocos2dx 2.2.4 version. 1.3 - Google's library updated!

description: Territory Wars FREE is a free multiplayer turn-based game where strategy, tactics and risk are essential elements. HIGHLIGHTS * Play against your friends or play against random opponents from all around the world! * Crush your opponents with various tactics and strategies for growth, attack and defence! * Play with different game modes for a multitude of different game experiences! BE THE STRATEGIST Adapt your strategy for the various challenges while playing against one, two or three real human opponents. Different modes will require different tactics. You start with one green tile. Use the troops on this tile to attack its neighbor tiles. Attack success is randomly calculated, but the chance increases with numbers. Maybe your strategy is to rush and crush your opponents? Move and attack as much as you like each turn, only limited by the number of troops you have at your disposal. Optimize your strategy while it is your opponent's turn. Conquer all opponent tiles to win, or just their Capitals in Capital mode. MULTIPLE GAME MODES Alter the game play with game modes like Fog of War, Capital mode and Boosted tiles. Different modes will require different tactics. Creating new games with these modes require the premium version, but everyone can join existing games or be invited to games with these features. PLAY AT YOUR OWN PACE You're allowed 72 hours between each turn, so this is a casual game you can play for a short while at a time. SHOW YOUR SUPPORT We want to make Territory Wars the best strategy game on Android, so please show your support by giving us a rating. Territory Wars FREE contains ads. KNOW MORE To get more info about the mechanics of the game, strategy for rapid growth, and other advice; check out our blog on http://glaciallabs.com/blog Follow us on Facebook and Twitter and stay in touch to get all the latest information: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Glacial-Labs/208370112677388 https://twitter.com/GlacialLabs https://plus.google.com/+GlaciallabsTeam/

description: Ein Deutsch-Polnisch und Polnisch-Deutsches Wörterbuch auf 31.500+ Wörter. Dieses einfache, sehr handliche Taschenwörterbuch wird zu Ihrem guten Helfer sowohl während einer Reise als auch bei Studium und bei der Arbeit. Ein Deutsch Polnisch Wörterbuch. Ein Polnisch Deutsches Wörterbuch. Unter Eigenarten unserer Anwendung kann man folgende erwähnen: - mit Hilfe von nur einem Knopf „Umschalten“ können Sie zwischen den Deutsch-Polnisch und Polnisch-Deutschen Wörterbüchern umschalten. - 31.500+ Wörter, die im ständigen Gebrauch sind! - das Wörterbuch ist für Touristen, Übersetzer, Schüler, Studenten, Fachleute und wissenschaftliche Arbeiter geeignet. - Das alles braucht keinen Internet-Zugang! Sie werden leicht das Benutzen des Wörterbuches erlernen und die Sprache wird zu keiner Störung in Ihrem Leben. A German-Polish and Polish-German dictionary on 31,500 + words. This simple and very handy pocket dictionary will be your good helper both during travel and in study and at work. A German Polish dictionary. A Polish German dictionary. Under peculiarities of our application can mention the following: - With the help of just one button "switch" you can switch between the German-Polish and Polish-German dictionaries. - 31,500 + words that are in constant use! - The dictionary is suitable for tourists, translators, students, professionals, and scientific workers. - This all takes no internet access! You will easily learn how to use the dictionary and the language will not interfere in your life.

When you see your "English Language Test" results your confidence will achieve the next level!

G4S Global Warning System provide you with early warnings, alerts and reliable real-time safety information wherever you are in the world. With state-of-the-art communication and localization technology you will get personal safety information before anyone else sent directly to you. Imminent threats such as: tsunamis, earthquakes, terrorist attacks, civil unrest, approaching storms, epidemics, major traffic disruptions are followed and analysed 24/7 by experts in Sweden Features: - Real-time alerts warnings, security information and expert advice sent directly to you when a threat emerges in your current region - SOS Emergency numbers for current location - Country specific security and transportation information The G4S Global Warning System require a subscription from G4S. Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. G4S Global Warning System provide you with early warnings, alerts and reliable real-time safety information wherever you are in the world.

The myChevrolet App gives you all the practical and functional features a car owner would ever want at the touch of a button. App features are available to owners of 1990 through current model year vehicles. The Find My Car feature lets you mark parking spots on a map so you’ll never have trouble finding your car. Easily schedule service, locate a dealer or get roadside assistance when you need it, fast. The Lights and Indicators reference will tell you what that warning light on your dashboard means. You can access OnStar RemoteLink(1) to get info on car operations, battery levels and remotely lock/unlocks doors. Plus, your Owner Manual and current national service offers can all be in the palm of your hand. The myChevrolet App. A perfect, everyday companion for you and your Chevrolet. Please visit http://www.chevrolet.com/mychevroletappprivacystatement.html to view the privacy statement in its entirety. description: OnStar RemoteLink keeps you connected to your vehicle so you can remotely control your vehicle features all from your Android mobile device. Brand-new features plus a new user interface mean you can do amazing things because you drive a vehicle connected by OnStar: Send remote commands to the vehicle - Remote start/stop vehicle - Remote lock/unlock car doors - Remote horn & lights/cancel horn & lights View vehicle status - Monitor fuel level and economy - Check oil life and tire pressure (if equipped) - Retrieve electric vehicle-specific data (battery charging status & options) Map and plan trips - Pinpoint vehicle location - Search for destinations - Send directions to vehicle through OnStar Turn-by-Turn Navigation or in-dash navigation system (if equipped) Manage the OnStar Wi-Fi® hotspot (if equipped) - Turn hotspot ON/OFF and view or change hotspot name and password - View the status of the vehicle’s data package View important information about your OnStar account including: - OnStar account details - Available Hands-Free Calling minutes - Preferred dealer information Contact Support - OnStar Advisor - Roadside Assistance An active OnStar account is required to use RemoteLink. Some features require paid service plan. Features may vary by vehicle. For a list of supported vehicles, please visit onstar.com/remotelink. Privacy Statement: https://www.onstar.com/privacy

This is an assignment book for students. Many students already carry their devices around school. This will save them the trouble of also having to carry an assignment book. If all three other players pass you can either play another combination on top of the current one or start a new one. Whoever loses their hand first wins! ♦ Valid combinations are: (single, pair, Straight, Full House) < Four of a Kind < Straight Flush < Dragon. ♦ The last three combinations (Four of a Kind, Straight Flush, Dragon) are called Monsters because they can override smaller combinations of any type, whereas non-Monster combinations can only override smaller combinations of the same type. ♦ Once you choose to pass you can't play the current combination anymore and have to wait until a new one is started (this complies with the official Big Two regulations). = Additional Notes = ♦ Users can use their existing Gamesofa, Facebook, or Yahoo accounts to play ♦ If you want to use an MSN, Google, or other account to login, please see our “Account Conversion” page for more details: http://www.gamesofa.com/bigtwoapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa - Fun in five easy minutes ============================= Want to play more? app_name: 鬥地主 神來也斗地主
description: The No.1 Landlord Online - Everyone's Favorite Landlord Game ♠ Play as guest, no registration required ♠ Rated 5 stars by our players ♠ Over 20 million players worldwide, join tables in no time ♠ Play free: Get as much as 1500 chips to start out with = Features = ♥ Authentic Landlord gameplay ♥ Over 20 million players - tap twice and you're in ♥ New reconnect function - bet with confidence ♥ Bigger and clearer graphics ♥ Loads of achievements and prizes ♥ Never go bankrupt: always get more chips so you can continue to play! = What’s New = ♥ Landlord tournaments (Realtor, Tycoon, Magnate) ♥ Various new modes give you an awesome gaming experience = Rules = ♣ Classic gameplay: 1. Landlord is played with 3 players and one 52-card deck plus 2 jokers. 2. All but 3 cards are distributed among the 3 players. For the remaining 3 cards an auction is held to determine which player will be the landlord. 3. The possible bids during the auction are 1, 2 and 3. Players may bid higher than the current bid or pass. Whoever bids highest becomes the landlord, takes the 3 remaining cards, and will play alone against the other two. 4. If all 3 players pass, the cards will be reshuffled and the game restarted. 5. The landlord takes the 3 remaining cards and will play alone against the other two. The landlord plays first. 6. Players play anticlockwise. Each player must try to beat the currently played cards or select to pass. 7. Any player can choose to pass any time, but he must pass if he can't beat the previous play. 8. Whichever side (landlord or one of the two remaining players) runs out of cards first wins! ♣ “Rob the Landlord”: 1. After one player has called to be landlord, each other player has a one-time chance to rob the title from him. 2. If a player chooses to rob the title, that player will be landlord for that game. If no player chooses to rob the title, the landlord will stay the same. 3. Once chosen, players are not allowed to change their selection whether to rob the title or not. For full game rules please visit： http://www.godgame.com.tw/landlord/?op=teach = Additional Notes = ♦ You can use your existing GodGame, Facebook, or Yahoo account to play immediately ♦ If you want to use an MSN, Google, or other account to login, please see our “Account Conversion” page for details: http://www.gamesofa.com/sevensapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa - Fun in five easy minutes ============================= Want to play more? description: Everyone’s Favorite Chinese Poker! ♠ Over 23 million players worldwide, join tables in no time ♠ Play as guest, no registration required ♠ New Card Exchange function lets you draw up to 3 new cards ♠ Rated 5 stars by our players = Features = ♥ Authentic Chinese Poker, also known as Pusoy or 13Poker ♥ Over 23 million players - tap twice and you're in ♥ “Scoop” opponents for increased wins ♥ Smarter gameplay ensures you’ll be the best of them all ♥ Bonus card hands to make things interesting ♥ Loads of gifts, daily bonuses ♥ New reconnect function - bet with confidence ♥ Easy-to-use controls you can use with just one finger ♥ Use Interactives (emoticons) to talk to friends ♥ Daily tournaments now available! Compete anywhere, anytime using your phone ♥ Verified members gain 888 daily chips = Newest Android Version = ♣ Completely new table design = Gameplay = ♦ Basic Rules 　．Each of the 4 players receives a 13-card hand from a standard 52-card deck.. 　．The players then divide their cards into three poker hands: two containing 5 cards each and one containing 3 cards. Each of these three hands is compared among the players. 　．One of the 5-card hands has to be the highest ranking hand and the 3-card hand the lowest ranking hand. 　．Should two hands have the same point value, the higher-suited hand wins. 　．Bonus card hands are higher than regular ones. ♦ Card Exchange Before a round begins, players have 15 seconds to exchange 0-3 cards from their hands with the other players. If time's up before you press "Confirm", the currently selected 3 cards will be exchanged. ♦ Hands from highest to lowest: Straight Flush > Four of a Kind > Full House > Flush > Straight > Triples > Two Pair > One Pair > Single ♦ Bonus Card Hands from highest to lowest: Dragon Flush > Dragon > Broadway Cards > Three Straight Flushes > Three Four of a Kinds > All High > All Low > One Color (black or red) > Four Triples > Six Pairs > Three Straights > Three Flushes = Additional Notes = ♦ Users can use their existing Gamesofa, Facebook, or Yahoo accounts to play ♦ If you want to use an MSN, Google, or other accounts to login, please see our “Account Conversion” page for more details: http://www.gamesofa.com/13pokerapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa- Fun in five easy minutes ============================= Want to play more? Gamesofa Website: http://www.gamesofa.com More Games: http://www.gamesofa.com/mobile/ 【最多玩家評鑑5顆星，台灣線上十三支No.1遊戲品牌】 2,300萬玩家，3秒入桌、隨時刁牌！正宗13支玩法，免註冊立刻玩！ ♠ 最多玩家評鑑5顆星 ♠ 免費遊戲：立刻下載可得1200神幣 ♠ 首創換牌局玩法：手牌換3張、一對變鐵支 －Android十三支 遊戲特色－ ♥ 正統13支遊戲(又稱十三張、中國撲克、Chinese poker、Pusoy) ♥ 全球2,300萬玩家，按兩下就入桌 ♥ 經典打槍玩法，神槍手最愛！ ♥ 智慧墩牌提示+手動選牌，輕鬆成為墩牌王！ ♥ 首創特殊牌型：三同花、三順子、湊一色，獎金UP！ ♥ 贈幣超多：步步高升連續登入，天天領獎勵 ♥ 斷線重連系統，網路斷線也不怕 ♥ 一指叼牌，操作直覺流暢，手感真實，爽度破表！ ♥ 互動道具表心意，跟朋友打Pusoy更有趣！ ♥ 每日中國撲克神槍賽登場！手機隨時拚排名、贏獎金！ ♥ 認證會員免費補幣至888，每天都能免費玩線上Chinese Poker －Android 十三張 改版內容－ ♣ 全新Chinese Poker牌桌，除舊佈新財神到！ －Android 13支 遊戲規則－ ♦ 一般規則 　．一副52張撲克牌均分給4位玩家，每家13張牌。 　．玩家將手中的十三張牌分為3張(第一墩)、5張(第二墩)、5張(第三墩)的牌組。一、二、三墩依序與其他3家比大小。 　．比大小的方式與梭哈相同，但第一墩必須小於第二墩，第二墩必須小於第三墩，否則為「相公」。 　．比牌時，先比「牌型」。若牌型相同時，再比點數，不比較花色。 　．「特殊牌型」大於「一般牌型」，不與「一般牌型」比牌 ♦ 換牌局玩法 牌局開始前，有15秒鐘可選擇0~3張牌與其他三位玩家交換。若在時間倒數完畢時，已選好牌，但來不及按下｢確定交換｣，則系統將交換已選好的3張牌。 ♦ 基本牌型說明 由大到小分別為：同花順> 鐵支> 葫蘆> 同花> 順子> 三條> 兩對>一對> 單張(烏龍) ♦ 特殊牌型說明 由大到小分別為：清龍＞一條龍＞十二皇族＞三同花順＞三分天下＞全大＞全小＞湊一色＞四套三條＞六對半＞三順子＞三同花 －其他說明－ ♦ 原「神來也會員」或「Facebook」、「Yahoo」帳號直接玩 ♦ 若您之前使用MSN, Google等帳號登入神來也遊戲，想在手機上繼續使用該帳號，請參考「帳號轉換及登入教學說明」 http://www.gamesofa.com/sevensapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa 5分鐘．想樂最輕鬆 ============================= 想玩更多？ Gamesofa官網 http://www.gamesofa.com 更多神來也遊戲 http://www.gamesofa.com/mobile/

Cyphr - Encrypted messaging simplified. Cyphr makes encrypted messaging easy. All messages are encrypted, private and 100% yours. Generate your public and private key pair so only you can read your messages, start group conversations with friends, and share attachments privately. ONLY YOU CAN READ YOUR MESSAGES. Cyphr generates a unique public and private key pair so only you and your friend can read your conversation - not us, not your phone company, and not a 3rd party. We take a zero-access approach, and give you total control of your data. BE AS PRIVATE AS YOU WANT TO BE. Whether you are a casual user or a privacy fanatic, you can adjust Cyphr's settings to fit your privacy needs. If a feature requires information sharing, you can choose to disable that feature. PRIVACY WITHOUT SACRIFICES. Cyphr doesn't sacrifice simplicity or features for privacy. Start single or group conversations, send attachments, and more. WE DON'T STORE DATA ABOUT YOUR MESSAGES. We do not needlessly store information about you, your recipients or your messages. MULTIPLE LAYERS OF SECURITY. Cyphr encrypts your messages using a combination of symmetric keys, and public and private key pairs. Cyphr also verifies messages with public key verification to ensure you and your friends know messages are from each other, not an impersonator. All messages are transmitted securely with SSL/TLS to protect your personal data, in addition to the message. YOUR MESSAGES. OUR SERVERS. NO 3RD PARTIES. At Golden Frog we own our servers, write our code, and manage our own network to deliver the highest levels of security, speed and privacy. Cyphr servers are located in Switzerland for maximum user privacy and protection. A COMPANY YOU CAN TRUST. Golden Frog's founders are Internet veterans who have fought to preserve online privacy, security and freedom since 1994. We arm users in 195+ countries with VyprVPN, a secure personal VPN, Dump Truck, a secure online storage solution, and Cyphr, the world's most secure messaging app. Together these tools allow users to protect themselves online, wherever they go. HELP US BUILD THE APP YOU WANT. Leave your Cyphr feedback and feature requests so we can make the best encrypted messaging app for you. UPCOMING FEATURES: • Multi-device capability • Desktop apps • Rotate encryption keys • Gigabyte attachments • Whatever you want! http://www.goldenfrog.com/cyphr

description: Magnetic stud finder app puts an handy stud finder in everyone's pocket at no cost. Even if already having your own stud finder, this app provides a valuable second source. Magnetic stud finder app consists of a customized metal detector with a bubble level view. It can be used for both metal and wood studs. Steel nails/screws are used to fix drywall to the wood studs. Magnetic stud finder finds wood studs by identifying the location of nails and screws. The bubble level is another tool for handyman. The app can also be used as detector for all ferromagnetic objects. To make the best out of it, it is very important to use this app properly. We provide help within the app. More information is provided in our website www.goldsequence.com. You can also see this instruction video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dZmd5vkag7o We have tested this app in multiple buildings with different phones. It works pretty well for drywall if used properly. Even if you cover the drywall with a extra layer of 1/4 inch thick ceramic tile, the app can still work. That being said, the app is not without its limits. This app won't work well if the variation of magnetic field strength becomes too weak to pick up. For example, if you live in a old house with plaster wall and the plaster layer is more than 1/4 inch thick, the app will probably not work well. Even if your house uses drywall, if the size of the drywall screws is too small, it could generate problems for this app. So we agree that this app is not for every house. However, we do believe that it can do good things for many people in many houses.

description: This app connects Wii Remotes with your smart phone. It provides functions such as: * motion alarm: You can use it for baby monitor, security system etc. Compared with other similar apps in the market, our app requires only ONE phone, not TWO! For baby monitor, you can put Wii Remote in the crib and watch TV in another room. The phone will beep when your baby gets up and makes movements. Even in completely dark room, it works well. * real-time monitor: the app can display Wii Remote movement on the phone in real-time. * data collector: it generates records when alarm triggered. It can also collect accelerometer and gyroscope sensor data samples from all Wii Remotes. You can mount Wii Remotes on human body or objects to record the movement. System with similar feature can cost you 100x more even with less portability. With Wii coupled with smart phone, sky is the limit for its applications. If you discover new usage of this app or desire some new features, please let us know at support@goldsequence.com . We will be glad to serve. It works with up to two Wii Motionplus。 WARNING: 1. The machine has its limitations. For critical tasks such as baby monitor, please don't outsource all the responsibilities to the phone. 2. The Android bluetooth function does not support Wii. We have to create our own bluetooth function. Because of that, this app may not be supported by some vendors. 3. This app won't work with Wii Remote without Motionplus option. It only works with genuine products made by Nintendo. 4. The app relies on bluetooth connection. Bluetooth's range is about 30 feet. This app will be unreliable when the range gets larger. This app can't be used in: HTC phones with sense UI, Samsung Galaxy phones such as Verizon Charge and at&t infuse. Because of "rooted" phones, these devices are not excluded from app installation.

description: Send animated emoticons even with sounds!, encrypted text and other emoticons with your favourte chat app!! You can also send them as images so all your friends will see them (even if they have not this app installed)!! -Compatible with different Chat apps. Important: Your friends must have this app installed to see the animated emoticons and encrypted text. -How to use: After activating Animated Smileys service and keyboard (the keyboard is optional, you can also use the gallery). To send emoticons as images, select share image option of your chat app and select Animated Smileys as source of images. If you activated the keyboard: 1)Open your chat app, type !ws and select "Animated Smileys Keyboard", writte your message if you want and send it! 2)To send encrypted text, choose they option "send encrypted text" in the Animated Smileys Keyboard, put your message and set the password. Encrypted message will be copied to clipboard, now paste it in your chat and send it! If you did not activated the keyboard: 1)Open your chat app, open a chat with your friend, a floating icon will appear in top right corner of the screen. Touch it and choose your emoticon or the option to send encrypted text. Encrypted text and emoticons will be copied to clipboard, now just paste it in chat and send! To read an encrypted text just tap the message!! -Explanation: *Animated emotes will not be shown in chat, they will open in top of your chat in a floating invisible window (in chat you will see a command like "!ws12;". *Android version 4.0 or higher will automatically show animated emoticons, lower Android versions will have to tap the message to see the animation.

description: "With over 50 ranches, the Apple Hill Growers Association (AHGA) farms have been a family destination since 1964. A family trip to visit the Apple Hill Growers means so much more than just apples and pies. It's memories that'll last a lifetime! It's berry farms, you-pick farms, and kid-friendly activities. For the grown-ups, it's fine wines and handcrafted beers in an incredible Sierra-soaked setting. It's Christmas trees for as far as your group can wander. On behalf of all the wonderful folks in the Apple Hill Grower area, we encourage you to make our little slice of heaven a part of your world. It's a tradition you'll cherish forever! Our farms are located in an area that stretches from Placerville to Camino to Pollock Pines, California--between Lake Tahoe and Sacramento on Highway 50. In addition to the AHGA ranch listings, events, and family fun, you'll find area restaurants, hotels, and other nearby adventure in this app."

Established in 1832, Bastrop’s historical roots run deep. Over 130 buildings listed in the National Register of Historic Places earned Bastrop the unofficial title of “Most Historic Small Town in Texas.” In 2010 the National Trust for Historic Preservation named Bastrop to its prestigious list of Distinctive Destinations™ in the United States. Nestled on the banks of the Colorado River, the historic district is filled with a variety of shops and restaurants. The quaint ambiance of downtown is complemented by nearby neighborhoods of well-preserved historic homes. Proud of its tie to early Texas history, Bastrop boasts three early settlers who signed the Texas Declaration of Independence, several died at the Alamo, the town evacuated during the Runaway Scrape, and 60 men are recorded as having fought at the Battle of San Jacinto. The town, destroyed during the Runaway Scrape and later rebuilt, was named Bastrop in 1837 by the newly established Congress of the Republic of Texas. Today, Main Street is lined with century-old structures housing antique shops, specialty stores and great restaurants. The 1889 Opera House continues to offer live entertainment. The ‘Old Town’ Visitor Center is located in the restored 1889 First National Bank Building and the Bastrop County Historical Museum is located in an 1850 historic home on the banks of the Colorado River. Fisherman’s Park provides access to the river for fishing or kayaking. Many of the historic homes house bed-and-breakfast inns that recall the elegance of another period. Bastrop State Park (also listed on the National Register) is nearby with majestic pine trees and Civilian Conservation Corps (CCC) buildings from the 1930s. The area is home to excellent golf courses, and the new Hyatt Regency Lost Pines Resort and Spa is minutes away. Bastrop, Texas…come for a visit, we’ll capture your heart!

Visit California Cheesemakers and Tour their Farms. * Find and visit a cheesemaker near you. * Plan a personal driving tour or follow a suggested itinerary. * Get the inside scoop on where to taste free cheese. * Learn about over 150 California cheeses, all sorted and searchable. * Find answers to those puzzling questions about cheese. * Browse details about 50+ cheesemakers. * Find out where to buy those obscure cheeses. * Includes cow, goat, sheep & water buffalo milk cheeses. * Read cheesemaker stories and so much more (with more to come). Have fun exploring and discovering both new and familiar cheeses. Oh yeah. It’s all about cheese!

Nestled in the heart of Santa Barbara’s wine country, Solvang combines old-world charm with contemporary amenities unlike anywhere else in the United States. Enjoy the experience of a European village with no passport required. While taking in the beautiful scenery and excellent weather, discover Solvang’s unique stores and boutiques. A shopper’s paradise, there are more than 100 shops offering old world antiques, Danish imports, collectibles, arts and crafts, books, shoes, clothing, jewelry, homemade candy, home goods, toys, souvenirs and art. Delight in a divine culinary experience at Solvang’s restaurants, cafes, bakeries and sweet shops. Discover some new favorite wines served at the wine bars and tasting rooms of the Solvang Wine Experience. There’s beer tasting with local brews and unique imports too. Museums and historical attractions reflect the fascinating rich multi-cultural background of the area. Every Third Wednesday, more than 60 stores, restaurants, wine establishments and professional offices offer special discounts and sales all day. In the summer there are outdoor concerts and movies in Solvang Park. Outdoor activities abound – golf, hiking, cycling, horseback riding, touring and more. Experience Solvang…..come for a day or stay for a while….you won’t be disappointed.

This app offers residents, visitors and people who work in Hackensack, New Jersey information on dining, retail, services, events, parking and real estate in Downtown Hackensack. The Hackensack Main Street Business Alliance (MSBA or Upper Main Alliance) is a public private partnership formed as an alliance between the business community and the City of Hackensack, New Jersey. We are responsible for various aspects of Main Street beautification, special events, parking and real estate availability. Our key area extends along Main Street from Atlantic Street to Clinton Place. There are 153 commercial properties and over 375 businesses within the district.

Just an hour drive from the San Francisco Bay. Harvest Time is a Non-Profit Organization that is dedicated to educating the general public and "foodies" about farming and its products while improving Agri-tourism in the Brentwood California Region of East Contra Costa County. Each year we produce a farm trail map that directs you to over 40 growers which sell direct to the consumer! Come learn how farm-fresh is just naturally more delicious and nutritious-and more economical too! Whether you prefer picked produce, or enjoy picking your own, we have educational programs, fresh, delicious fruits, vegetables, and nuts waiting for you. We also have wine, pies, gift baskets, gourmet treats, Alpaca clothing and nursery stock. Come visit some of the farms in Brentwood California's bountiful agricultural region to celebrate Harvest Time! Encounter our generous agricultural heritage and learn about farming and much more in our region of Northern California.

Less than an hour east of San Francisco, Livermore Valley Wine Country welcomes visitors with a flourish expanse of vineyards, wineries, and wine country experiences. Amid picturesque canyons, ridges and outposts of suburbia, the lush vines and convivial tasting rooms increasingly define the quality of life in the valley. To the delight of residents and visitors alike, the region is enjoying a wine renaissance harking back to the golden years of early California wine history. One of California's oldest wine regions, the Livermore Valley played a pivotal role in shaping California's wine industry. Spanish missionaries planted the first wine grapes in the Livermore Valley in the 1760s. In the 1840s, California pioneers looking for outstanding vineyard sites began planting grapes in the region. Robert Livermore planted the first commercial vines in the 1840s. Pioneer winemakers C. H. Wente, James Concannon, and Charles Wetmore recognized the area's winegrowing potential and founded their wineries in the early 1880s. Livermore Valley captured America's first international gold medal for wine in 1889 at the Paris Exposition, putting California on the world wine map. Livermore Valley wineries were the first to bottle varietal labeled Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc and Petite Sirah. Nearly 80% of California's Chardonnay vines trace their genetic roots to a Livermore Valley clone. Livermore Valley also boasted more than 50 wineries until Prohibition and contributed significantly to the state's enology and viticulture that lives on today. Innovations developed in the Livermore Valley include overhead irrigation, mechanical harvesting and roller crushing in the vineyard. Attracted to the rich winemaking tradition, climate, soil and geography, new winemakers and vineyardists are working alongside fifth generation winegrowers to create this Livermore Valley wine renaissance. The region now has over 40 wineries, with several more about to open, and more than 5,000 acres of vineyards. Wineries vary in size from limited release, 100-case labors of love to 400,000-case industry heavyweights, and grapes range from familiar Merlot and Chardonnay to Italian, Rhone and Spanish varieties. Welcoming tasting rooms showcase award-winning wines and offer year around activities. In addition to the myriad happenings at individual wineries, the Livermore Valley Winegrowers Association sponsors several consumer events each year, showcasing the talent, energy and fine wines of the region. The Livermore Valley iPhone app concentrates on the Livermore area wineries, along with a sampling of local businesses and events for the user. We don't try to be a comprehensive directory of restaurants, shopping or activities, but provide enough of a selection for wine lovers spending a day or weekend in Livermore to stay busy.

Twenty years ago there were eight Lodi wineries. Today, there are more than 80…and each year the number continues to grow. Whether you’re new to Lodi or a dedicated Lodi wine enthusiast, this app will allow you to maximize your wine tasting experience while visiting the Lodi appellation. You can search for a particular winery, find your favorite among the list, or discover new ones. You’ll also be able to get driving directions while navigating from one winery to the next using the integrated Mapping feature. The app also allows you to view tasting room hours, special events, local activities, wine specials, and more. About the region… Nestled between the San Francisco Bay and the Sierra Nevada Mountains lies Lodi Wine Country, a region fast becoming one of California's true wine stars. Lodi Wine Country offers a rural atmosphere and relaxed pace for you to enjoy its beautiful vineyards and exquisite wines. Lodi wines are tended by generations of farming families rooted to the land, yielding wines that are simply irresistible. They are full of flavor, yet soft and supple on the palate—delicious on their own or the perfect companion to food. Lodi has been a major winegrape growing region since the 1850’s. Today, the area has 100,000 acres of winegrapes, farmed by more than 750 growers. Lodi is best known for its full-bodied Old Vine Zinfandel wines. In addition to Zinfandel, Lodi leads all other California wine districts in the production of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, and Viognier. The App includes: Directory of the Lodi Wineries and local associated businesses: Wineries Restaurants Hotels Activities Tasting Rooms Listings include name, address, phone number and email, hours and a short description of the business. Website, pictures, Facebook, Twitter, Yelp and other links may be included if the information was provided by the business. Wineries can be sorted and filtered by: Varietal Amenities Calendar of Events Winery iPhone App Specials Trivia about Lodi Favorites folder to store frequently used entries Maps integration: Directions to the selected business Mapping of nearby similar businesses Social integration: Facebook & Twitter-enabled Find local friends using Facebook and Twitter Post directly from the app to Twitter and Facebook See where other users are gathering Full Privacy options to broadcast or hide your location

Mountain View Mobile puts the Mountain View, Arkansas, area business community at your fingertips -- listings, events calendar, photos, and more. It is produced by the Stone County Leader. The Stone County Leader is the hometown weekly newspaper serving Stone County, Arkansas, since 1952. An award-winning publication, the Leader has been recognized by the Arkansas Press Association as one of the top weekly newspapers in the state. Our office is located at 104 West Main in Mountain View. Subscribers enjoy free classified ads (non-business) and free access to our e-edition. Visit our website www.stonecountyleader.com for more information.

Coastal Wine Agency (www.coastalwineagency.com) is a multiple winery tasting wine club that allows wine connoisseurs to taste at different wineries across the Central Coast for one low flat rate. Each pass is valid for two adults. We offer two clubs, a quarterly pass at $40 and a weekly pass at $20. Our members are able to buy a pass and taste at multiple wineries from Paso Robles to Los Olivos without paying each tasting fee. Buy a pass today and taste at more than 15 wineries on the Central Coast!

When planning a visit to Tracy, you’ll want to come early and stay late! Once you arrive…relax and enjoy our warm temperatures and even warmer hospitality in our beautiful historic downtown. Tracy is known for its many hometown events including the annual Farmers’ Market on Saturdays on 10th Street, Block Parties in the newly renovated downtown 6th Street Plaza, Girls Night Out and the Fourth of July Day-In-the-Park which is a taste of true small town Americana with hot air balloons, arts and crafts, and a spectacular fireworks display. Later in July, the Tracy City Center Association and the City of Tracy will be co-sponsoring, for the first time ever in downtown Tracy, the “Then & Now” Car Show in late July; a fun filled day for the entire family. The annual Tracy Chamber of Commerce California Dry Bean Festival held in early September along with the Tracy City Center Association’s signature Fall Wine Stroll help to bring in the Fall season. And you won’t want to miss the Holidays in Downtown Tracy to kick off a fun filled holiday season.

description: Upgrade for Android™ Go Next: An essential app to detect your smartphone/tablet specifications and upgrade or update it to a new version of Android™ OS firmware. Inspired by old 8 bit computer games "West Bank" on ZX Spectrum and "Bank Panic" on Commodore 64, the game Back to the West is a special tribute to hot hacker summers in mid 80’s. Take the role of an Old West Sheriff who must protect a bank and its customers from robbers. Sheriff must watch three bank doors. The doors will open to reveal a customer (who will drop a bag of money, making a deposit), a robber (who will attempt to shoot the player) or a … well, You can find out the rest… Meet the Gang: * Mary Louise Williams * Her father was a hardworking railroad man who delivered bread for a living to support his wife and Mary Lou. Don't kill her 'coz she is a good girl. She is single. * John Peters "Johnny" Ringo * Ringo was born in Greensfork, Indiana, of distant Dutch ancestry. Ringo was jailed in Burnet,Texas by Sheriff A. J. Strickland. He was broken out of jail by his friends shortly thereafter, but they parted company to evade the law. Ringo is surly, bad-tempered man. * William Magear Tweed* The greedy and corrupt mayor of Dodge City, Kansas, mayor Tweed rigs elections and makes taxes so high that some people compare it to stealing. He also serves as Dodge City's Bank President. * Nathaniel "Texas Jack" Reed * Reed gave up working as a cowboy and became an outlaw. He and his gang robbed trains, stagecoaches, banks and, on one occasion, captured a large shipment of bullion in California. The American Express Company offered a reward of $250 for his arrest and conviction. * "Dynamite Dan" Clifton * A cattle rustler and train robber in Oklahoma Indian Territory. Tale says that he lost three fingers while playing with dynamite as a child. Clifton accumulated a sizable bounty on his head—thirty-ﬁve hundred dollars, so make sure you shoot him TWICE! * John Horton Slaughter * After serving in the army of the Confederacy during the American Civil War, Slaughter was a member of the Texas Rangers before becoming a cattle business man. Slaughter, with penetrating black eyes, was often stuttered, but he wore a pearl-handled .44 * James B. “Killer” Miller * Miller is known to wear a black frock coat, making him hard to see in the darkness. His coat also concealed a steel plate he wore on his chest to protect him from opposing gunfire. Beware! Despite his piousness, he is actually one of the deadliest guns!

Phone Dialer is an assistant dialer for telephone. By the DTMF dialing, it can directly extract the number from the mobile phonebook, and then send it to telephone to dial out. Simply pick up the telephone, put the mobile speaker close to the mouthpiece of telephone, and press the “by phone” icon, then the dialing will be completed by Phone Dialer. After the call connected, you can directly talk on the telephone. In most country, using telephone to call to PSTN is much cheaper then using mobile to call to PSTN. Besides, it’s convenient and health to talk on telephone! If you talk on mobile for a long time, it will become heat. You will feel uncomfortable, and the electromagnetic waves may harm health. So just save all the contact numbers in the mobile phonebook, and let Phone Dialer dial for you when using telephone. 20 sets of Dial plan. It will add or delete code for phone number. In some country, the way you dial out by mobile or telephone will be different. For example, you will add the local code before the PSTN number if you dial out by mobile. But if you want to dial out by telephone, you should not add it. Dial plan can solve this issue! Or maybe you want the telephone use another telecom provider to dial out. For example, the number in the mobile phone book is 0093312345. Dial plan can automatically change the number to 0053312345 for you when the call is dial out by telephone. Notice: It may not works perfectly in every mobile phone because of the speaker quality. Please download the Free version to test before buying the Full version!! **If you have any suggestion to improve this app, please feel free to contact us!!**

SyncRoid is the best Android application to sync your Outlook Contacts, Calendars & Tasks with Android via Bluetooth & WiFi. Simple, efficient and secure! You need to download FREE SyncRoid PC Client on your computer from http://www.syncroid.com No need to use USB cable or pass your personal information through the cloud or internet any more just to sync your contacts, calendars and tasks between Microsoft Outlook and Android! You are welcome to try SyncRoid Lite version before deciding for the FULL version. Kindly contact us before posting a negative comment at care@syncroid.com Please also visit our FAQs section on our website www.syncroid.com. We will be looking forward for feedback, comments and your experience with this application. We can be reached through: • Email: care@syncroid.com • Twitter: @SyncRoidApp • Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Syncroid -------------------------------------- Keywords: Synchronize Outlook, Synch Android contacts, Sync Calendar Outlook, SyncRoid, Sync Tasks, Sync WiFi, Sync Bluetooth

description: Backgammon is a great game! You will love it from the beginning! Are you ready for the best game ever! Love backgammon but can't find a really good, fun and easy to use game app? Backgammon is one of the oldest board games for two players. As you may already know there are tricks and rules to follow in order to win and beat your opponent! The basic rules are to roll the dice and move your pieces across the board to win. Sound simple? It isn't! Features: GAME MODES: 2 difficulties to choose from; anyone can play and exercise their brain! Even if you have never played or have been doing it since you were a kid; this app is perfect for YOU! Single Player Soon we will do the multiplayer version. Now you can also choose to play against the computer or a friend; are you up for the challenge? This is it! With amazing graphics and developed to the last detail get ready to exercise your brain with this timeless game that has been capturing generations!

This handy application presents you several self-guided walking tours to see the best of the Bangkok, Thailand, and it comes with detailed tour route maps and powerful navigation features to guide you from one sight to the next. No need to hop on a tour bus or join a tour group; now you can explore all of the best attractions on your own, at your own pace, and at a cost that is only a fraction of what you would normally pay for a guided tour. Walking tours included in this application are: * Art Galleries in Bangkok (5 sights) * Famous Architecture (7 sights) * Wats and Temples (8 sights) * Places of Worship (7 sights) * Bangkok's Landmarks (7 sights) * Museums in Bangkok (7 sights) * Nightlife in Bangkok (5 sights) * Shopping in Bangkok (8 sights) * Chinatown (6 sights) * City Orientation Tour (12 sights) All the data used in this app is built into the software, so you can follow the walking tours or use the city map without internet access or cellular data plan. No need to pay the costly roaming charges when traveling to foreign cities. The app is optimized for Android phone and tablet. The powerful navigation assistance includes: * Touring routes clearly displayed on map. * Precise turn-by-turn walking directions from one sight to the next. * `FindMe` displays your exact location and Auto Tracking displays your movement on the map (this feature is not supported on device without built-in GPS function). * Built-in compass to show you the direction. * A detailed city map which can be used independently for your other traveling needs. Please visit our website at www.GPSmyCity.com to find city walks for over 470 cities worldwide.
release_text: - Enhanced the search function in city map.

Basic life support (BLS) is the level of medical care which is used for victims of life-threatening illnesses or injuries until they can be given full medical care at a hospital. It can be provided by trained medical personnel, including emergency medical technicians, paramedics, and by laypersons who have received BLS training. BLS is generally used in the pre-hospital setting, and can be provided without medical equipment.This test includes 30 questions of the BLS test (2008)

description: Gambling Addiction Help by Hani Al-Qasem. Is your gambling addiction totally out of control? Are your relationships and finances suffering because of your addiction? Is your addiction costing you your life? Would you like to stop your gambling addiction and take back control of your life; your health, your relationships, your finances? If you seriously want to conquer and be free of your gambling addiction, and if you genuinely want to take full control over your mind and your gambling urges, so you may appreciate your self-worth and the value of money, this audio is designed especially for you. With this audio you will: * Be sensible and in control of your mind and urges * Have the strength of mind to always be in total control of your thoughts and emotions * See the value of every dollar that you have, and you will also make wise spending decisions * Have full control over your urges and impulses Wouldn't it be great if you could remain strong over your temptation to gamble so you can eliminate gambling out of your life, so you may save money instead of burning money? Here's your chance to be responsible for your life. How this audio works: This 20 minute audio works on your subconscious mind to bring about the desired outcome. It starts off at a high level, just above 'alpha', and slowly descends to the lower end of 'alpha' over 5 minutes, designed to calm you. It is then kept constant at this lower end of 'alpha' for 10 minutes; during that period, the affirmations are being delivered directly to your receptive subconscious mind while you remain in this relaxed state. What makes this and every 'The Choices I Make' series of audios super-effective is that you will hear the carefully worded affirmations in triplicate, using the accelerated learning technique. On top of that, we utilise the immense clout that lies behind the three words, "I choose to…" Your incredibly powerful subconscious mind more readily accepts the words, "I choose to…" than "I am…", thereby bringing about change much faster than by using the traditional two worded phrase. After the messages are finished, there will be a short gap before we slowly move up the frequency, gradually ascending back to a level just above 'alpha', over the remaining 5 minutes so you will be fully alert, energised and refreshed. Once the session comes to an end, you open your eyes and continue with the rest of your day. "We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make our world." - Buddha The way you think is critical in every aspect of your life.

When a coin toss simply won't do and arm wrestling is out of the question, Duel! is the decider. An abstract single-screen multiplayer game of combat and total uncompromising obliteration for two or more opponents. Compete head to head on the same screen. Launch missiles to attack or block your rival. Duel! feels your touches through space age finger recognition technology and distills them into the pure concentrated essence of justice and destruction. This game is ABSOLUTELY FREE. NO ads and NO in-app purchases. ----- Some older devices only register 5 or fewer touches at one time. Should this affect your device, you will need to work out a gentleperson's agreement with your opponent on the field of battle.

The HAR.com Android app allows both consumers and HAR members to search for homes for sale or lease across the state of Texas. Consumers will be able to use the award-winning HAR.com residential property search engine to find a home or rental, bookmark listings and view property search history. Members will be able to access MLS information (MLS subscribers only), their leads, their listings, as well as their company's listing inventory. Features for Consumers & Members • Award-winning HAR.com residential property search engine to find Homes And Rentals across the state of Texas. • Wide range of search filters such as proximity, price, square footage and more. • Utilize the Drive Time search feature to locate homes available for sale or rent within a designated commute time. • Map automatically refreshes to display listings when you pan/move across the map. • MLS listing information is updated every 15 minutes. • Most comprehensive listing details include price, room dimensions, interior and exterior features, open house schedule and more. • Easily slide through a photo gallery for each listing (including up to 32 photos, which is more than you may find on any other app). • Enhanced mapping with Street View. • Bookmark your favorite listings. • View a history of your searches. • Easily contact the listing agent or broker. • Information for more than 8 million properties in Texas, even those not currently listed for sale. Features for MLS Subscribers Only HAR MLS subscribers may log in to the password-protected members only area by using their HAR.com username and password. Members have access to their leads, their listings and their company's listing inventory. Detailed listing information includes: • Complete listing details • Days on Market • Archive and agent full report (Listing price changes) • Access to Tax Profile Report • Showing instructions (if applicable) • Tax information (including values and tax rates)
release_text: • Redesigned Map View – The Map View has been streamlined and polished for a better user experience. • MLS Subscriber Info – MLS Subscriber data is now directly available from the details page of any listing! • Request An Appointment – Found your dream home? Schedule an appointment right from the listings page! • Agent Branding – Branded agent information is now included when you share listings! • Print-Friendly – Print any listing or document right from your device. Anytime. Anywhere.

description: ※ Android 2.2 (Froyo) and over Wow ! Beautiful Rainbow Clock Widget ! This application is clock widget that can be installed simply on home screen. http://android007.tistory.com/entry/RainbowClock [[[ Main Features ]]] ■ 10 Types of Analog Clock : Touch the analog clock ■ 11 Colors of Digital Clock : Touch the hour ■ 4 Colors of Date : Touch the minute ■ 8 Left Background Colors of Widget : Touch the left icon ■ 8 Right Background Colors of Widget : Touch the right icon ■ Show/Hide Calendar : Touch the date ■ Show/Hide StatusBar Clock : Touch the icon ■ Support 12/24-hour format ■ Auto Start after Booting ■ Battery Level on StatusBar (Battery Voltage/Temperature) [[[ How to Install ]]] ■ To install the widget, Menu → Add → Widgets → Choose 'Rainbow Clock (DUO)'. ■ You can also move the widget on home screen after long press the widget. [[[ Notice ]]] ■ The statusbar icon prevents from killing this App in low memory situation. On Android 4.1+ devices, the statusbar icon can be hidden via the App info in settings. ■ Exclude this clock widget from task-killer to prevent time freeze !

Wow ! Beautiful Rainbow Clock Widget ! This is clock widget application that can be installed simply on home screen. The widget size is 3x2 and you can see the large clock on the large screen such as Galaxy Notes(high resolutions). [ Major Features ] ◆ Support Battery level on status bar. (Battery voltage/temperature) ◆ Changeable 10 colors of digital clock. (Touch digital clock of widget) ◆ Changeable 12/24-hour format. (Touch AM/PM of widget) ◆ Support transparent background. (Touch date of widget) ◆ Support battery information. - Support QVGA (240 x 320) - Support HVGA (320 x 480) - Support WVGA (480 x 800) - Support WXGA (800 x 1280, 720 x 1280) [ How to Install ] 1. Press long on empty space of home screen, and select "Widgets" in "Add to Home screen" menu. 2. If you select "Rainbow Clock (HD32)" in "Choose widget" menu, "Rainbow Clock (HD32)" is appeared on home screen. 3. You can change the analog clock and color of digital clock by touching the widget. 4. You can move the installed widget on home screen after pressing long widget. [ Notice ] Exclude the clock widget from task-killer to prevent time freeze ! Have fun !

★ Widget Size (5x1). ★ Support WXGA (800x1280, 720x1280) like as Samsung Galaxy Note. Wow ! Beautiful Rainbow Clock Widget ! This is clock widget application that can be installed simply on home screen. The widget size is 5x1 and you can see the large clock on the large screen such as Galaxy Notes(high resolutions). [ Major Features ] ◆ Support Battery level on status bar. (Battery voltage/temperature) ◆ Changeable 8 kinds of clock fonts. (Touch the hour) ◆ Changeable 10 kinds of clock colors. (Touch the minute) ◆ Support transparent background. (Touch the date) ◆ Changeable 12/24-hour format. (Touch the AM/PM) [ How to Install ] 1. Press long on empty space of home screen, and select "Widgets" in "Add to Home screen" menu. 2. If you select "Rainbow Clock (HD51)" in "Choose widget" menu, "Rainbow Clock (HD51)" is appeared on home screen. 3. This is Headset/Earphone/Bluetooth audio volume manager. It can set the sound volume of system. If headset(earphone, Bluetooth, etc.) is connected, it automatically detect and adjust the sound volume. In addition, the audio-related convenience functions are provided. [key features and preferences] * It's support Bluetooth Headset(HFP, HSP, A2DP, AVRCP). * Automatic Volume Control : It remember the volume of each status and adjust automatically. * Headset Etiquette Mode : When you connect the headset, it switch to vibrate or desired ringer mode automatically. It should set the ringer mode of profile to Etiquette Vibrate or Silent mode. * Silent Media Mode : If ringer mode is changed to silent or vibrate mode in normal state, it mute the media volume. Normal state is that you don't wear any headset. This mode is applicable only in the normal state. * Modify the system volume: Volume tab is possible to modify the total system volume. * Use incoming call volume for notifications : If checked, the ring volume is used in conjunction with the notification volume. * Play alarm in silent mode : If unchecked, don't alarm in silent or vibrate ringer mode. * Screen On: when connecting the headset, it turn on the screen. [NOTE] 1. For normal operation, the service must be executed. 2. Be careful not to kill the service by Advanced Task Killer or Task Manager. 3. the Screen On feature may not work in some devices.
release_text: v3.0.5 - Lollipop Silent mode support. v3.0.4 - Improve Bluetooth connection of some device.

description: OpenPGP Manager is an encryption client for Android, capable of: * Create/import/export/publish/search PGP keys * Send/receive encrypted mail with Gmail * PGP encryption/decryption of mail & files * Thunderbird integration (via gnupg + Enigmail plugin) * Password-based encryption/decryption (AES-256, 3DES, RC2...) * Sign & verify files and emails * Subkeys viewing and editing * Biometric words * Key armoring Public-key cryptography is in most cases the best choice to protect your mail and communications from being intercepted and/or sniffed by governments, NSA's PRISM surveillance program and such.
release_text: - Improved overall speed (Android 2.X optimization) - Fixed bug on certain key searches - Expect a major redesign on September!
