description: Free of charge for Michelin Pilot Sport Challenge participants Have you ever wished you could gauge your circuit performance? That is exactly what the MICHELIN Lap Timer offers with this application co-developed with the creator of Harry's Lap Timer for Michelin Pilot Sport Challenge participants. Because Michelin stands by your side regardless of your level of driving skill, we have organised a regularity race with several challenges on European circuits. The MICHELIN Lap Timer assesses your performance levels and generates individual and overall rankings. The three most consistent drivers will be rewarded at the winner's podium. At the end of the season, a European title is awarded to the most consistent racers. The MICHELIN Lap Timer is a high-precision tool that improves your practice sessions and Challenge ranking. Its many features are designed with you in mind. - Check your practice and challenge times via your smartphone. - Take advantage of all the indicators needed to get closer to your reference time and keep improving every time you hit the track. - Receive the official ranking of the most consistent drivers for challenge and European events. - Share your driving experience and ranking with your friends. - Record videos of your driving sessions and share them with your friends - Get access to highly accurate driving performance data by adding external sensors. Want to achieve your full driving potential? Meet us at the starting line: sign up at MICHELIN Pilot Sport Challenge! Check out https://auto.weareallracers.michelin.com/gb/eng for detailed information. Join the MICHELIN Pilot Sport Challenge community at https://auto.weareallracers.michelin.com/gb/eng/club
release_text: Changes in v18.3.8: ‣ Fixed an issue in GPS parser for recent OS versions (4.4.4, maybe 4.4.3 too) ‣ Several minors bug fixes and improvements

description: This app is a major update from the previous app of the similar name: NRSV Bible With Apocrypha. The NRSV Bible Apocrypha app contains the Old Testament, Apocrypha, and New Testament books which are divided into their respective categories e.g. Pentateuch, History, Gospels, Epistles. The app is structured as follows: Category --> Book --> Chapter

You may bookmark your favorite verses. 3. A searching feature has been added. 4. The font size and font styles may be customized.

Meme World Cup is a game of skill. You are "Me gusta" meme and you have to pick up all the footballs to win the Meme World Cup. As you probably know, most of the memes don't have legs, and they are round!. To move yourself around the pitch you will have to twist the gravity of the world. There are some arrows on the left side of the screen that will allow you to do this. The further you push from the center of the screen, the faster the world will spin, but take care, because if you go too fast, you can go out of play, and then it will be game over. Your biggest fan is watching the game, and if you beat your own record, he will raise his arm as a sign of success and happiness. Practice with Meme World Cup and make your friends bite the dust beating their records!

description: Business Card is a digital business card that you can carry on your portable device. The main idea is to replace your traditional business card in the simplest possible way. You won't have to deal again with the problems of paper business cards: What if you run out of cards? What happens if you change jobs? What if you have several jobs? Will you have to order new cards and notify all your contacts? All these problems are solved with digital Business Card. Synchronize your data with your LinkedIn account, and after only 3 single steps, you will be able to share your data: - Open the application - Press share menu - Enter the other person's email And that's it! Main features: - You can import your professional contact data from your LinkedIn profile (you need a LinkedIn account) - You can show up to 3 current jobs. - The data is stored locally on your mobile phone, so you won't need connectivity all the time. - You can refresh your local data if you modify your LinkedIn profile. - You can share your professional data. You will only have to write the other person's email and Business Card will write a template for you with all your info. You can always edit it before sharing. If there is no internet connection, the email will be sent when connectivity is available. - You can show your professional data on the screen of your device (vertical and horizontal format), as if it was a traditional paper Business Card. - If your contact has CamCard Lite installed, or any other Business Card Reader app. then he/she can take a picture of your digital Business Card, and your data will be automatically imported to his/her contact agenda. - You can take a screenshot of your business card and print it, or share it. *Business Card stores and shows your own professional data. It does not store or share data from your contacts *Your personal data will never be accessed or processed by 3rd parties. *If you are using a tablet, Business Card will work only with the main account. *No Ads version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hdrs.businesscard
release_text: Telephone number added: You will be able now to show your telephone number, and it will be used also in your QR code. description: The official 2015 Head2Head Fantasy Football Salary Cap app is here to provide you with everything you need to keep track of your Head2Head Fantasy team on the go. Easy to Play Using a salary cap of $100 Million, pick your team of 10 NFL football players who you think will rack up the most points each week using our Head2Head (or "H2H") scoring system. All players have been assigned a salary based on past performance and expected performance this season. You must choose 1 Quarterback, 3 Running Backs, 3 Wide Receivers/Tight Ends, 1 Kicker, 1 Defense/Special Team and 1 Flex Position (any position except a D/ST). Your players will earn H2H Fantasy Points based on their actual on-field performance. Go Head2Head All entries will be placed in a 32-team league made up of eight 4-team divisions - just like the NFL. You'll have the option to create or join a buddy pool (2 up to 32 players) with your friends, family, or co-workers. Or, if you prefer, join a public league! During the H2H regular season that runs for 17 weeks from Thursday, Sept. 10th through Sunday, January 3rd, 2016, you will compete Head2Head each week against a new opponent. Score more points than your opponent and you will post a win for that week! Score Big Points Each week, your players earn points for their actual on-field performance. Points are awarded according to the official H2H scoring system. Making Trades During the season, your players may get injured, suspended or fall into your doghouse. To maintain the strongest lineup possible you can make trades. Dump Romo for Brady or Lynch for McCoy... You make call! H2H Playoffs The top 18 teams in your league will qualify for the H2H Playoffs with the top teams from other leagues. The H2H Playoffs will run Saturday, January 9th, 2016 through Super Bowl Sunday, February 7th, 2016. Winners, including league and overall, will be determined by most cumulative points earned during the H2H Playoffs. Talk some smack! Use league messaging to talk some smack to your opponents or buddies in your league. You'll receive a message indicator on your team account and an email alert that you've been sent a message. This is a great way to talk up your game and get to know your opponents! Important tips! Have fun!! H2H Fantasy Baseball is intended solely for entertainment purposes. But we all know that losing sucks. Try any combination of asking for our advice, throwing objects or even some 12 ounce curls to bring back your sanity. Keep an eye out for good values, aka the "sleeper" (players who have low salaries and yield high H2H point totals). Take note that the salaries may change twice during the season. Once in the middle of the season some salaries will decrease only. Just prior to the playoffs, all player salaries may go both up or down. The National Football League and Google Play and its affiliates are not sponsors or otherwise affiliated with this fantasy game in any way.

From Bodybuilding-Apps.com: Ready to jumpstart your own body transformation? Get your best body in 90 days! Our three-month training program and meal plan will burn fat, build muscle and transform your body. Month One This month, we give you the first four weeks of an amazing 12-week training program that you can do in your living room. Combine it with our high-protein meal plan and nothing can stop you from getting the body of your dreams Month Two Last month, you committed to a 12-week plan to put yourself on the path to personal transformation. Four weeks into Month One of the amazing program, we’re guessing you’ve already enjoyed some notable progress: stronger arms, tighter legs, better endurance. Let’s see what else your body can do. Welcome to Month Two of your 12-week personal renovation. During this second month, we’re introducing you to one of the simplest yet greatest fitness inventions of all time: the resistance band. Month Three In just eight weeks, you’ve made significant progress. Month One was the instrumental tune-up, using your body weight as resistance. Month Two added the melody in the form of resistance bands and plyo. Now, it’s time to end on a high note. This month, you’ll challenge yourself head to toe with a mix of dumbbell-based exercises and high-intensity cardio. We’ve selected dumbbells as our tools of choice because they provide tons of tactical advantages: 1. Balance 2. Creativity 3. Stability 4. Range of motion 5. Convenience “HIIT” it! Exercisers often fall into bad habits when doing cardio – think trudging it out on the treadmill for an hour, day after day, at the same speed. There is a better option. High-intensity interval training, or “HIIT” for short provides exactly what you need to hit your fitness goals: fat burning that lasts all day long. HIIT involves intervals of high-intensity exercise, such as running at 90 percent of your maximum heart rate, followed by intervals of low-intensity recovery. Scientific studies reveal that there is an increase in your excess post-exercise oxygen consumption, or “EPOC” for short, following a HIIT session. What does that mean in plain English? Basically, that your body continuously burns calories and fat at an elevated rate long after you’ve stepped off the treadmill. Also, because a HIIT session is so intense, the time you save is invaluable over the course of a training cycle. One study conducted by scientists at the University of Western Ontario drives home the value of HIIT. They found that subjects who performed four to six 30-second sprints three times per week burned more than twice as much fat as those who jogged for 30 to 60 minutes at a steady pace. That’s an incredible difference, and one that we want to put to immediate use. In this program, we suggest that you do your cardio after weight training, as research has shown that your results may be hindered if you precede strength training with intense cardio, but not vice versa.

With this convenient remote app gone are the days of multi-tasking electronic gadgets with your hearing instruments. When used in combination with the Siemens miniTek, the Remote App easily and seamlessly allows you to control your hearing instruments and how they interact with all of your favorite electronic devices right from your smartphone. Whether it is watching TV, listening to your favorite song, or talking to a friend on your mobile phone – control is right at your finger tips. Note: Siemens miniTek is required in order to utilize this app. Compatible with Android versions 2.3 and higher Why use the miniTek remote app: REMOTE CONTROL: With the app all of the functions available to you on the Siemens miniTek can now be controlled directly on your mobile phone. NO MORE JUGGLING: Who wants to juggle multiple electronic devices? With the app you can easily switch between taking a call, listening to your MP3 player, watching television, or simply enjoying your surroundings all from the convenience of your mobile phone. VISUALIZE YOUR WORLD: Using the screen of your mobile phone the app creates a visual display of your hearing instrument’s status. You can easily see which memory program you have selected with one quick glance at your phone. DIRECT ACCESS: With the app users can directly switch between memory programs. The memory display on your phone allows you to directly select the desired memory program, no more cycling through the programs to find the one you want. So if you are taking a walk and want to listen to music one touch is all it takes to jump to your desired program. EASE OF USE: The app is great for people who have dexterity issues. Small buttons inherent in today’s tiny electronic devices can be a challenge for those of us with poor eye sight or who have trouble manipulating small things. Nice large buttons on your phone’s display make operating your hearing instruments and electronic devices a breeze. DISCRETION: For the self-conscious users the app allows for discreet control of your hearing instruments. Some users don’t want others to know they use hearing instruments and the app provides an extra layer of discretion. IT’S FREE: No further explanation needed!!! Sivantos GmbH is a trademark licensee of Siemens AG Sivantos GmbH, Henri-Dunant-Strasse 100, 91058 Erlangen, Germany

description: Hello Dialer is the Mobile Dialer that allows to make VoIP calls from any of the android devices and it uses 3G/Edge/Wi-Fi Internet connectivity. It is developed based on the requirements of VoIP Providers business needs. Hello Dialer Features:- It uses SIP protocol based for signaling Supports G729, PCMU, and PCMA codecs Runs behind NAT or Private IP User Friendly Interface Auto Sync of Balance Real Time Sip status messages Call History Address book integration Compatible with all sip standard switches Hello Dialer has very efficient implementation of jitter buffer to play voice smoothly. Silent suppression and comfort noise generation has been used to reduce the bandwidth usage, and this makes the dialer more efficient in making VoIP calls. It easily integrates with mobile phonebook and auto detects (+) sign when contact is picked from phonebook.”

description: Let your smartphone more comfortable! This application is a simple, high functionality, secure and comfortable password manager. In addition, you can also use as a tool to manage boilerplate. Corresponding to the backup of the data to the SD card, of course, also supports data backup to online storage integrated with Google Drive ™ , Dropbox, Box . https://www.dropbox.com/ https://drive.google.com/ https://www.box.com/ **** Supported Languages **** Icelandic, Gaeilge, Azərbaycan, Afrikaans, العربية shqiptar, հայերեն, italiano, ייִדיש, Indonesia, Nederlands español, ภาษาไทย, Tagalog, Deutsch, Türk, हिंदी, suomalainen français, português, русский, English, 한국어, 中文(简体), 中文(繁體), 日本語 Please let me know If there is a mistake in the translation. **** Main Features **** - Intuitive user interface that can be operated intuitively - Automatic input to your browser. - You can sort the list freely by drag and drop. - Categorization feature is useful to organize the password list. - Supports three or more input fields ! - Retrieve the input form of the web page from URL - You can lock the app by the protection key. - Data is immediately encrypted by AES-256bit algorithm. - The ability to copy data to the clipboard that can be launched from the status bar. - Collaboration with "Mushroom" - Supports the backup to SD cards, Google Drive, and Dropbox - Supports the restoration from SD cards, Google Drive, and Dropbox * 1: Only input items that has been retrieved from the URL, and is in the top page. * 2: This function can also be started from the "Share page" in your browser. * 3: Caution: If you forget a protection key, the data can never be restored. * 4: The data that has been copied to clipboard is cleared after 30 seconds. You can open a web page from a URL with any browser ! However, the automatic input function will not work at some browser. **** The Difference from the Free Version **** - The categorization features is enable in the paid version. - There are no ads in the paid version. **** Permissions **** - FULL NETWORK ACCESS This will be used only to display ads, and to retrieve the input form of the web page and. - MODIFY OR DELETE THE CONTENTS OF YOUR USB STORAGE MODIFY OR DELETE THE CONTENTS OF YOUR SD CARD This is necessary for the function of backup. - DRAW OVER OTHER APPS This is necessary for display a dialog overlay. - RUN AT STARTUP This is necessary to reside in the application status bar.

TriMet transit+ is an ad-free version of TriMet transit with a few additional features. TriMet transit allows riders to take advantage of the the API for tracking TriMet buses in the Portland area. TriMet transit also includes the ability to download route schedules. TriMet transit allows you to define alerts for TriMet routes and stops; get a notification when a vehicle on a specific route is approaching or arriving at a particular stop. Please send me an email if you find a problem or if you have any comments or suggestions. TRACKING - Put in one or more route numbers, separated by spaces or commas, and see all buses on those routes or put in an individual bus number (printed on the side of TriMet buses). ROUTE SCHEDULES - You can request a route schedule for any TriMet route by entering its number. Schedules can be viewed as origin/destination tables or on a map. On the map, see when the next bus is scheduled to arrive by tapping on a stop. See all times for that stop by tapping on the info window that appears. CLOSE STOPS - Select your current location or an address you enter or select on a map as a search location for TriMet stops that are nearby. You can specify a maximum number of stops to return as well as an optional route filter. ALERTS - You can define alerts for when a TriMet vehicle is approaching or arriving at a particular stop. These alerts are based on distance from the stop, using the shape of the route defined by TriMet. - Because these alerts depend on the vehicle following the shape defineUd by TriMet, if the vehicle is on detour, or if the vehicle isn't following the defined route for some other reason, your alert may not trigger as expected. DIRECTIONS - Choose an origin, a destination, and the time you would like to either depart or arrive, and the Google Maps app will display the different options available using TriMet's buses and trains. TWITTER - TriMet transit displays the latest updates from @TriMet. Other features: - Choose a light or dark theme. - Show satellite imagery and/or color-coded traffic data on the map. - Optionally keep the map screen from dimming and shutting off. - Adjust the update interval of TriMet vehicle locations. - Choose a custom ringtone for TriMet alerts. - Add track and route widgets and shortcuts to your home screen to go straight to the map or schedule you want. This is not an official TriMet app; I am not affiliated with TriMet in any way.

description: Make offers on farm equipment, fine art, motor vehicles, classic cars and more with KY Auctions, the premier auction app that connects you to auction sales and auctioneers throughout the entire state of Kentucky! Auctions for real estate, storage, land, paintings, homes for sale, collectables and more are available through this easy to use sales finder. If there’s an auction in Kentucky, you’ll find it with KY Auctions! KY Auctions is a leading bidding app that allows you to connect to auctioneers and collectors and make bids online, straight from your phone! Our app lets you search the entire state of Kentucky for a sale with a press of a finger. Auction time is all the time! Make offers in the bidding app for live auctions. • Auction access, instantly. Bid on an auction item right from your phone! • Auction notifications keep you up to date. • Online auctions available for farm equipment, motor vehicles, property and more. Once you find what you like you can start bidding from there. • Buying, selling and trading are easy when you can do it in person or online! Collect antiques and more – It’s easy to find antiques for sale! • Antiques and collectables can be found around your location through live auction map. • Auctioneers and auction types can be tracked via your favorites list to keep track of what you’re looking for. Make offers in live auctions today! • Auctions wherever you are. With the live auction map, you can find an auction nearby. • Get auction times to plan your schedule. Be notified when and where your chosen auction will be held. - View photos of what you’re leaving offers for. Auction access to 20+ categories! Make offers on anything! - Online Auctions - Real Estate - Estate Auction - Personal Property - Motor vehicles - Classic cars - Homes for sale - Land for sale - Car buying - Farms - Antiques and Collectables - Livestock - Produce - Farm Equipment - Paintings and fine art - Knives - Guns - Coins - School District Surplus - Classic books - Government Surplus - Foreclosures - Bankruptcy - Chancery Court Auctions - Benefit Auction Estate sales finder helps you find your ideal estate! • Property finder – KY Auctions offers an estate sales finder to help you find where the nearest estate is located. • Estate for sale is one of many specific categories that KY Auctions offers in their auction categories lists. • Auction times listed! You can view the date and time when the auction is taking place! • Maps and driving directions for when you want to check out the location yourself. KY Auctions upholds a standard of authenticity and legitimacy. Auctions on KY Auctions are run by licensed and trained auctioneers who review merchandise from collectors for you at their designated auction sites, so you know you’ll be buying, selling and trading the real deal. Auctioneers offer assurance that others don’t. • Buying feels secure when each item is personally authenticated to be legitimate and fairly priced. From classic cars to farm equipment, our auctioneers know how to fairly price what they’re selling • Auctioneers available at the tap of a finger. Contact any of our hundreds of professionally licensed auctioneers if you have questions or concerns. • KY Auctions is one of the best buying and selling tools in the auction and sales industry! KY Auctions makes it easy to search all of Kentucky for the best purchases. With all of our categories and our network of the most qualified auctioneers in the business, you can find everything you need and feel confident about making offers. Download KY Auctions and start bidding on real estates, collectables, motor vehicles and more today! For questions or comments about the sale and auction finding app KY Auctions, contact us at: support@auctionlook.com For more information about our app or to find auctions across the country, visit our website at: www.auctionlook.com

Goat Runner Infinite is an infinite runner starring a goat! The game is simple... Run as far as you can to try and beat your own high score. You can also compete against all other players around the world by trying to become the top ranked player in the in-game leaderboard! Access the leaderboard by simply using the Google+ account already linked to your phone. To play: -Tilt your phone or device left or right to move left / right -Swipe up to jump -Swipe down to slide under obstacles -Don't let the evil red goat chase you down! There are power speed, shield, and double coin power ups to help you along your way. Your coin total will be added to your distance total at the end of the game to calculate your score. Your high score automatically saves so you can always come back to try and beat your own high score or improve your position on the leaderboard. Watch out for all of the incoming obstacles in Goat Runner Infinite!

description: Flight information, indoor maps, weather, hotels, airport information for Hong Kong Airport (HKG) • 3 days worth of arrivals and departures information (yesterday, today and tomorrow) • Detailed map showing your current location within the airport, location of restaurants, bars, banks, toilets, shops etc. • General airport information (from Wikipedia) and airport news (from Twitter) • Facility to locate and book hotels nearby • 5 Day local weather forecast
release_text: 2.9.8.4 Changed terminal colours to be more distinct. Also, if you click on a marker in the airport map, you can launch navigation using Google Maps 2.9.6.6 Support for Android 5.0 "Lollipop", auto refresh on time selection change, better refresh progress reporting.

description: Was macht ein Hotel erfolgreich? Welches Produkt verlangt der Markt? Wie erreiche ich meine Kunden? Mit diesen Fragen muss sich der Spieler in Hotel Manager II herumschlagen: es gilt den Markt genau zu analysieren, den richtigen Preis zu finden, sorgfältig zu kalkulieren - kurzum erfolgreich zu managen. In Hotel Manager II hat der Spieler nicht nur die Möglichkeit verschiedene Szenarien zu spielen, sondern auch diese zu kreieren. Jedes Szenario konfrontiert den Spieler mit neuen Gästegruppen und veränderten Rahmenbedingungen. What makes a hotel successful? Which product the market wants? How do I reach my customers? With these questions, the player manager II must grapple in the hotel: it is necessary to analyze the market carefully to find the right price to carefully calculate - in short, to manage successfully. In Hotel Manager II, the player has the opportunity not only to play different scenarios, but also to create them. Each scenario confronts the player with new guest groups and changing conditions.
release_text: Several bugs fixed. Customers can now be adressed through different channels (sales-menu). Different prices can be applied to consumer groups (logis-menu).

description: My Life is Bro (mylifeisbro.com) takes a unique spin on sites like MLIA and FML. Is your life full of awesome, chill bro moments? Then this app is for you. Not affiliated with mylifeisbro (MLIB). - Read, share, & favorite stories - Submit stories (now native!) - Login - Widget (with sharing!) ** Please, when rating the app, rate it on the quality of the app. If you do not like the stories on mylifeisbro.com, please don't download this and then leave a 1-star review. Thank you. The app was incorrectly asking for Superuser access because of the ads we were running. It was performing a check to see if the device was rooted, but in a way that was triggering the superuser dialog. We apologize for this. The latest version has this fixed, we were not trying to do anything malicious with your device. Thanks.

description: A unique physics-based game like no other! Use the environment and quick timing to help save the chickens and liberate their nest of the evil monkeys. Chicken Story 2 features new gameplay mechanics, all new graphics, and hundreds of hours worth of user generated content. • 125 unique and challenging levels to introduce you to the game. • Unlimited replayability, with thousands of user-created levels. • Health Pack Network with cross-platform achievments and medals. • Localization in 10 different languages including English, Chinese, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish
release_text: Version 2.0.6: - 75 new levels (125 total) - Fixed a number of crashes with newer devices - Removed support for very old devices - Removed VIP in-app purchase - Fixed pink backgrounds on a few devices including Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 Version 1.0.7: - 25 New levels - Removed unnecessary phone permissions requirements (gps)

description: This "Maths for Kids" or "Kids Maths" or "Junior Maths" mobile application was conceptualized and designed after long and extensive analysis of kid’s learning behavior and progression pattern. It is always a difficult task to provide the fundamental concepts of mathematics to little kids in such a way that they can visualize and relate it to the real world. On the other hand, kids learn very fast and they have a steep learning curve. In this period they should be taught step by step and they should be exposed gradually from simple to complex mathematics concept. This app provide the platform to kids to learn basic mathematics. This is helpful for a kindergarten, grade 1 and grade 2 kids. It includes different tools like 1) Learn Numbers 2) Learn Counting 3) Backward Counting 4) What comes after, what comes before and between concept 5) Familiarization of Mathematics Signs like greater than, less than and equal 6) Learn Addition 7) Learn Subtraction 8) Simple Solution 9) Descriptive Problems (Addition and Subtraction) 10) Table of Addition 11) Table of Subtraction This app will be useful for kindergarten to grade 2 or 3 kids. Key Words: ------------------ Key Word: Kids Maths, Kids Mathematics, Maths for Kids, Teach Mathematics, Junior Maths, Teach Maths, Maths Quiz, Kindergarten Maths, grade 1 maths, grade 2 maths, Kindergarten Mathematics

By playing quiz like a game you will gain the important information about the glorious USA.Have fun. This is the 4th app of my dream series. Hope you will like it.

description: HSC Biology is an application which gives you quick and efficient access to the entire HSC Biology Syllabus content from the HSC Online website. It contains the dot points of every single core topic, as well as the options! All dot points are answered and all information is accurate and valid, directly from HSC Online (hsc.csu.edu.au) itself. This app is for students in Year 12 studying Biology as a part of their HSC subjects. Key Features: - Structured syllabus outcomes - Content directly from HSC Online (hsc.csu.edu.au) - Covers entire HSC Biology + Options - Easy to read, mobile interface - Slick GUI with appealing colours - Free with no ads
release_text: Update: 2/2/13 Fixes: jQuery Style Sheet Referenced locally - Complete styling do-over for phones that couldn't connect to the internet Fixes: No more crashes Fixes: All images are now referenced locally Fixes: Splash screen makeover and timeout increased

description: Hello HSK is a product researched and developed by the HSChinese team to specially provide training for Chinese learning and Chinese proficiency test. Hello HSK includes levels 1 through 6 and provides website, APP and offline teaching materials. [Honors] ●Since its launch in 2014, Hello HSK has been on the outstanding new APP board several times, and the number of registered learners throughout the globe has reached hundreds of thousands of people within one year. [Instruction for APP functions] ●Hello HSK 4 provides HSK Chinese vocabulary, listening, reading, practice and mock HSK tests to help learners pass the level 4 Chinese test; it is a good helper for foreigners learning Chinese. ●Hello HSK provides not only the Chinese teaching materials for learners, but also the function of consulting Chinese teachers at any time in APP; so it is convenient for students to ask teachers for help and essay correction. ●Hello HSK utilizes a speech forum. Therefore, the Chinese learners can practice for the oral Chinese test (HSKK); practice pronunciation and consult teachers at any time in the forum. ●Hello HSK also provides Chinese teaching materials and after-class exercises for teachers. [Instruction for Course Content] ●Chinese HSK listening course: It is classified into 8 categories and 42 types of topics according to HSK testing questions and common Chinese topics, including 865 outline words and 704 phrases, 636 listening exercises, mock HSK tests and detailed answer analysis. ● Chinese HSK reading course: It is classified into three question types and 18 types of topics according to HSK testing questions and common Chinese topics, including 229 outline words and 45 phrases, 425 reading exercises, mock HSK tests and detailed answer analysis. ● Chinese HSK writing course: It is classified into 2 question types and 26 types of topics according to HSK testing questions and common Chinese topics, including 892 outline words and 9 core sentence patterns, 1272 writing exercises, mock HSK tests and detailed answer analysis. [R & D Team] The HSChinese team devotes itself to establishing practical and useful online and offline products and services for global Chinese learners. In addition to the Hello HSK Chinese test series, HSChinese also provides: ●“Hello Daily”, a product that assists Chinese learners to systematically go from zero to intermediate, and advanced levels ●“Yep! Chinese”, a product that breaks traditional learning models and allows for fragmentized and interesting Chinese learning ●“Chinese Sound”, the product that focuses on correcting Chinese pronunciation ●“Hello Words”, focusing on Chinese vocabulary learning ●“西游汉语乐园”, “Pop Chinese”, game products for Chinese learning For more free learning and teaching materials provided by HSChinese, please visit us at: www.hschinese.com. Where there is Internet, there is HSChinese. [Contact Information] HSChinese Hotline: 400-821-7565 HSChinese Email: service@hschinese.com Address of Shanghai headquarters: Room 205, No. 22 Boxia Road, Zhangjiang Hi-Tech Park, Shanghai. Public account of HSChinese: WeChat-HSChinese Website: www.hschinese.com Key words: HSK 4，dictionary，exam, mock test, Chinese learning, mandarin, hanyu, words, vocabulary, listening, reading, writing, HSChinese, Shanghai Hansheng Info-Tech Co.,Ltd.

Lines 98 Deluxe is an fun game for killing time. It is easy to play but really challenge to master. You have to move same color ball to make horiontal, vertical, cross up or cross down line to make point. The more ball in the same line the more points you get. ------ Lines 98 là một trò chơi đơn giản dựa trên bản Lines 98 cũ trên PC. Luật chơi đơn giản, xếp các loại bóng cùng màu trên một hàng (ngang, dọc, chéo) để ăn điểm. Điểm càng cao nếu bạn ăn combo được càng nhiều hàng. Số điểm combo có thể lên tới hàng nghìn. Game có chức năng tự động lưu lại quá trình chơi.
release_text: Add more options and fix some bugs.

description: Child Desktop is a tool designed to prevent harmful material that your child may be exposed to while online. Secluding age inappropriate content, Child Desktop will help you protect your little one. Built to give you the right tools to protect your child’s online internet activity, Child Desktop is the best way you can control the digital content your children is exposed to daily. Child Desktop is efficient and easy to use. Built in features that disable/ diverts certain incoming calls/ text messages/ chain letters and customizable options that allow you to carefully select online trustworthy sources. Child Desktop is the app you need to have in order to provide full comfort and security while online, for your child.

Expecting important emails? Stop wasting time checking your emails every 5 minutes. Setup multiple email alerts to get push notifications for important messages without having to constantly keep an eye on your email accounts. Monitor Alert it's an application that can be used to MONITOR different services based on user predefined rules. For example an user receives emails which contain important information such as: - service down - nagios alerts - email from a bank - email from girlfriend - user defined scripts which can monitor business important metrics - zoneminder new events This app can be used to read this email or URL links and based on user defined filters will PUSH a notification to your mobile device. The application needs internet access and should not be used as a sole application monitor. Free version featurs: - 1 server with 1 mail alert - 1 server with 1 URL alert Pro version features:: - unlimited servers - unlimited alerts - no ads
release_text: 1.3.1 - libs upgrade - bug fixes 1.3.0 - added Cloud Monitoring, now you can move your alarms in cloud and you will receive push notification on your device.

description: mPower is an application specially created to be used with the Ubiquiti MFI MPower products ( http://www.ubnt.com/mfi#m-Power ). Application automatically connects to your mpower devices and collects the needed information. From within the application you can: - visualize the power consumption on all connected outlets - start/stop an outlet - tag outlet name - save configuration - schedulers
release_text: 1.2.1 - changed ads libs - bug fixes 1.2.0 - added fast ON option, now you can start/stop the outlets automatically after any predefined time. Humanoid est une galaxie de médias dédiés aux nouvelles technologies mobiles. Sur cette application vous pourrez retrouver l’ensemble des sites du réseau : FrAndroid, FraWin ou encore iAddict . Tous trois membres du réseau Humanoid, ces sites d’actualités spécialisés dans les domaines touchant à la mobilité traitent à la fois du monde d’Android (notamment sur FrAndroid), des iPhone & iPad (iAddict) sous Android, iOS ou Windows, tandis que FraWin se concentre sur l’univers de Microsoft, qu’il s’agisse de Windows Phone, de Windows ou des consoles Xbox. L’actualité high-tech n’est pas sans créer son lot de surprises au quotidien : suivez l’essentiel de l’information liée aux domaines qui vous passionnent, et bien plus encore ! Au programme, un flux RSS d’actualité en continu, mais aussi des tests complets réalisés par des spécialistes dans chaque domaine, des éditos, des interviews auprès des différentes marques et opérateurs, des reportages, et bien sûr des prises en main lors des principaux salons consacrés aux nouvelles technologies. L’actualité de vos opérateurs, Orange, SFR, Bouygues Telecom, Free Mobile et des MVNO, mais aussi celles de vos marques favorites, des principaux smartphones du moment (HTC One, Samsung Galaxy S4 et bien d’autres) sont au rendez-vous. Avis aux gamers : les jeux vidéo mobiles ne sont pas oubliés, et bien d’autres surprises vous attendent... Les sites du réseau Humanoid sont participatifs : tous les articles publiés sont ouverts aux commentaires, une large communauté autorisant de riches échanges entre les mobinautes. description: HuntStand Lite, provided to you for free, is a must-have tool for hunting and land management. HuntStand was carefully designed to work in both online and offline environments. Using this app you will have access to offline weather and maps of your hunt areas. Our app's interface is simple, yet powerful, and puts many useful tools right at your fingertips. Create an account and gain the ability to sync Hunting Area maps with HuntStand.com, view and edit maps using advanced on-line mapping features, share maps with friends, and sync maps with other devices. HuntStand features our revolutionary patent pending HuntZone technology. The HuntZone scent tool shows wind speed, direction, distance, and time in the most streamlined and efficient way possible. You can “slide” through wind forecasts and view the effects on your desired hunting area. The HuntZone tracks where your scent will be both at specific time and throughout your hunt, allowing you to plan accordingly. Fully map your property using 43 easily discernible custom icons including game sightings, scouting marks, stands, as well as numerous important objects of interest. Attach notes to your icons and sort them by time and type. Be aware of distances and area measurements using our advanced measurement tools. Our app will give you extremely accurate map-based distances in feet, meters, and yards and area measurements in acres. Have access to highly detailed weather and solunar information including a current weather page, (with useful charts) a 72 hour forecast, and a 5 day outlook. Customize various features on the app's Settings page and read useful tips and hints on how to use the app offline and how to maximize your time in the field. HuntStand, powered by TerraStride, will revolutionize the way people hunt and operate in the outdoors.
release_text: Create an account and gain the ability to sync Hunting Area maps with HuntStand.com, view and edit maps using advanced on-line mapping features, share maps with friends, and sync maps with other devices. Changes in version 2.94: Fixed Sync issues.

description: “减肥健身好指南，跑步训练好帮手”。风格最小清新的跑步软件就在这里！ 虎扑跑步，同万千跑者共同追求时尚健康运动！ 用虎扑跑步，您可以精确记录每次跑步的数据（时间、距离、卡路里），秒速打开、即时定位，无需等待让你随时随地畅快跑步！ 主要功能 - 单次跑步目标设置，实时查询完成进度 - 真人语音播报提醒，边跑边有妹子给你加油 - 离线地图下载，增加跑步路线起终点标识 - 有问题来「跑步有道」，装备训练比赛信息一网打尽 - PM2.5和天气实时查询，带给你贴心的运动建议 - 实时配速表，记录跑步过程配速变化 - 微信，QQ，人人帐号多个平台登录 - 拍照记录沿途风景，一键分享更方便
release_text: V2.4.1更新说明 1、首度采用下沉式通知栏，精彩内容不再错过！ 2、添加消息功能，好友聊天，想聊就聊！ 3、新增推送功能，回复点赞，随时查看！ 4、添加收藏功能，喜欢什么都统统存起来！ 5、卡路里计算方法修改，获得更加准确的减肥数据！ 6、优化群组功能，让你能更好的管理自己的跑步群； 7、修复部分GPS无法打点的问题，让你跑的更顺畅。 联系我们：微信帐号：puniu20140522；QQ群：78845982。

description: Road Trip Planner aims to provide the user unique features that current map / direction applications lack. By providing the user with the ability to plan ahead and set different pit stops between their set origin and destination, this is one of the many reason how Road Trip Planner stands out from the rest. These pit stops include food, gas stations, lodging options, and many attractions. Road Trip Planner also takes into account your vehicle information to provide you with specific gas station results and how much money you will spend on gas during your trip. This is calculated by using your specific vehicle's city and highway miles per gallon. It also helps the average person to be more aware of their carbon footprint by tracking the CO2 emissions outputted by their vehicle over the course of their trip. Key features: • Trip information: Total Cost Of Gas, Total C02 Output, Total Miles (City / Highway) and more. • Adding points of interests to your route that will be labeled with a specific marker on the map. • Marker, when tapped, will give you the option to call and visit the website along with displaying other information. • Turn by turn direction list. • List of points of interests that were added to your route.
release_text: Republished app due to technical issues. Sorry for the inconvenience! Update 1.0.3 • General bug fixes Update 1.0.1 - 1.0.2 • Road Trip Planner now available to tablets • Fixed bug associated with loading saved trips

El Recetario una aplicación desarrollada por voluntarios de IBM Argentina, en el marco del programa On Demand Community de Ciudadanía Corporativa. Esta aplicación desarrollada para ASDRA (Asociación Síndrome de Down de la República Argentina) busca desarrollar capacidades cognitivas mediante la enseñanza y preparación de productos de panadería y pastelería, siguiendo recetas en forma guiada. La aplicación cuenta con escenarios dibujados a mano por el equipo de voluntarios, coloreados dándole un toque artístico e interdisciplinario al proyecto. The Cookbook an application developed by volunteers from IBM Argentina, in the framework of the On Demand Community Corporate Citizenship. This application developed for ASDRA (Down Syndrome Association of Argentina) seeks to develop cognitive skills through education and preparation of bakery products, following recipes in a guided manner. The application features hand-drawn scenarios by the team of volunteers, giving colored and interdisciplinary artistic flair to the project.

Experience information like never before with IBM Cognos Mobile. Access and interact with all of the rich reports and dashboards you need to make the smartest business decisions, all on your Android device. Gain trusted insight through a rich and visual experience whether you are offline or online to ensure you remain productive wherever you are. Easily sync your IBM Cognos content from email attachments or directly from the Cognos server. Your IT department will love the fact that they can leverage existing Business Intelligence (BI) content and a single administrative environment. Built on a flexible and proven platform, IBM Cognos Mobile ensures mobile decision making is simple, reliable and secure. IBM Business Analytics software helps organizations better understand, anticipate and shape business outcomes. You, too, can achieve breakthrough results and outperform your competition.

description: IBM Mobile Systems Remote (IBM Remote) is an application that allows system administrators to monitor and manage IBM BladeCenters along with their installed blades and components, System x rack mounted systems, or zEnterprise ensembles and CPCs. Machines can be added to a list kept on the mobile device simply by specifying the hostname of the management module along with the user credentials (userid and password). Once this information is entered, the app will connect to those systems and provide an intuitive, drill-down user interface used to monitor their health and configuration. The app can also be used to perform some management functions such as: Powering systems on/off Clearing the event logs Changing ownership of the KVM or Media Tray Toggling the system locator lights Mobile security is a primary concern with business applications. All machine credentials are kept in a secur data store. The app also requires the user to specify an application password on startup. This password is used to avoid unintended access to your machines and as a confirmation step for any significant action that will alter your machines. This app was developed by IBM Research as an exploration vehicle for using mobile devices to manage IBM servers. Please provide feedback on our website or via email, so we can continue to adapt this app to better meet your needs. See http://www.ibmremote.com for a walk-through description of the different views and features.
release_text: new in Version 1.2: * Support for IBM System z * Creation and scanning of QR codes that identify a machine/view to be displayed * Swipe-based navigation

description: "La vida es lo que pasa mientras miras la pantalla de tu smartphone" Nace faceup, la primera aplicación dedicada a conocer y superar la movildependencia que sufren en 71 % de los usuarios de smartphones. Faceup promueve un estilo de vida en el que el usuario vive y disfruta con intensidad cada momento libremente. Con esta app podrás: - Superar un test para conocer tu nivel de adicción al móvil. - Participar en un programa para lograr superarla mediante retos. - Jugar a PhoneStack con tus amigos; el juego de moda para evitar que te ignoren cuando estáis juntos. - Seguir tu evolución como usuario y analizar el uso que le das al móvil. Si te sientes identificado con esto, disfruta de faceup Desconecta y ¡vívelo! "Life is what happens while watching the screen of your smartphone" Nace faceup, the first application dedicated to meet and overcome suffering movildependencia in 71% of smartphone users. Faceup promotes a lifestyle in which the user lives and play with intensity every time freely. With this app you can: - Overcoming a test to find out your level of addiction to mobile. - Participate in a program to achieve by overcoming challenges. - Play with friends PhoneStack; the fashion game to keep you ignore when you are together. - Track your evolution as a user and analyze how you use the phone. If you feel identified with this, enjoy faceup Disconnect and live it!

description: Innovar en Salud mediante proyectos innovadores. ForumITESS es un lugar donde se expone información de interés, se interactúa con propuestas de ideas y comentarios y donde se organizan eventos y talleres para poder, entre todos, identificar oportunidades para conseguir una mayor eficiencia del Sector Sanitario. Más información en www.ForumITESS.com Innovate in Health through innovative projects. ForumITESS is a place where relevant information is exposed, it interacts with proposals and ideas and comments which organizes events and workshops in order to, together, identify opportunities for greater efficiency in the Health Sector. More information www.ForumITESS.com

Esta aplicación presenta los medicamentos genéricos más utilizados actualmente en medicina. Incluye información del grupo farmacéutico al que pertenecen, sus indicaciones terapéuticas y equivalencias en especialidad farmacéutica. Se puede filtrar por grupo farmacéutico y buscar por nombre del medicamento genérico. En caso de duda, es importante consultar con su farmacéutico. genericum es una app de Llar i Salut. This application presents the generic drugs used in medicine today. Includes information pharmaceutical group they belong to, their therapeutic indications and specialty pharmaceutical equivalents. You can filter by pharmaceutical group and search for generic drug name. If in doubt, it is important to consult your pharmacist. genericum Llar is an app i Salut.

Productivity is an app, based on the activity based costing method, to estimate customer – product profitability taking into account direct and indirect costs, variable and fixed. With this tool you can also know cost per unit of each cost driver and cost of excess of capacity. Available in main currencies.

Do you always take your medicine as scheduled? Sometimes, people on a medical treatment do not take one of the doses, either because they just forget or because they feel better and simply decide to stop taking it without seeing their doctor first. The MedsOnTime mobile app has been designed to improve user quality of life by providing them with a platform that sends out warnings and monitors the intake of medicines. This platform contributes to the safety and the efficiency of treatments by sending out graphical, flexible and user-friendly messages to iPhone or iPad devices. MedsOnTime can manage up to three profiles at the same time and is intended for anyone on any kind of medical treatment, or for caregivers of elderly, young or sick people. Thousands of people all over the world are already making the most of MedsOnTime monitoring. MedsOnTime® by Medicactive. The information contained on this website is not medical advice. See your doctor about diagnosis and treatment.

Print your smartphone photos in a Mitsubishi Electric Kiosk just with the new Kiosk Prints app. Your photos from your smartphone can be easily selected and sent through wifi to a Mitsubishi Kiosk for editing and printing.
release_text: - New main screen, more simple, with old functions removed. - The smartphone can be connected automatically to the Kiosk wifi network by reading a code that appears in the MITSUBISHI Kiosk screen. - Multilanguage: dutch, english, french ,german, italian, portuguese and spanish. - Other improvements.

description: Aplicación de Incidencias Nunca la comunicación con su Administrador había sido tan fácil y directa. En cualquier lugar o momento podrá dar de alta una incidencia, desde su smartphone, consiguiendo una mayor celeridad a la hora de su resolución. Una vez introducidos los datos la primera vez, podrá comunicar cuantas incidencias surjan en su Comunidad de un manera ágil y sencilla. También, si lo desea puede llamarnos con 2 pulsaciones y comunicar una emergencia a la Generalitat, si se encuentra en necesidad de ello, usted o un familiar. App exclusiva para clientes y sus familias, propietarios en una finca administrada por Olivares. Implementation Issues   Never communicating with your manager been so easy and straightforward. In any place or time you can enlist an incident from your smartphone, achieving greater speed when it comes to its resolution.   Once the data is entered the first time, communicate any incidents arising in Your Community a quick and easy way.   Also, if you want you can call us with 2 taps and report an emergency to the Government, if you are in need of it, you or a family.   App exclusively for clients and their families, owners of a farm run by Olivares.

High Resolution Singapore MRT & LRT map. This app works without internet connection and is excellent for people who travel in Singapore MRT & LRT on North South, East West, North East, Circle Line, Downtown Line, Thomson Line and all LRT networks. Exclusive features: * Deep Zoom * Extreme High Resolution * No-Ads * No Roaming Cost * Updated Stations and Lines (Regards to LTA Singapore) * Landscape Mode * Move to SD Card * Free of Charge Note: This application is not official application of SMRT (Singapore Mass Rapid Transit), LTA (Land Transport Authority) and other authorities. Currently only Map will be available. We will add more features soon. New version will be released as soon as we get updated data. Thanks for all comments, feedback and direct messages. Credit to Zaw Thurein Tun
release_text: Version 2.0: Improve performance App2SD feature added New Map added Version 1.0: Deep Zoom

description: Have a sweet-tooth and a flair for cakes? Cake Maker is just what you need! Bake your favorite cakes with Stella. Baking a cake was never this easy. Decorate with toppings and layer with cream; make the yummy cake of your dreams! Easy to bake cakes for every event- make the occasion more special by baking a cake yourself with your Cake Maker! From Wedding to Christmas to Birthday- Show your loved ones the color of your affection by beautifully decorated cakes and let them taste the sweetness of your love by your freshly baked sweet delicious cakes. Pave your way to the best cake in town with the help of the numerous ingredients and decorations that your Cake Maker offers. From candles to toys to sprinkles- Name it and we have it! Score of flavored syrups to make you fall in love with your home-made cakes! Even kids can make a cake whenever they want, however they want- with their own hands. From baking cupcakes to cakes, we provide you with the ultimate satisfaction of baking the yummiest delicacies. Cake Maker is all that you require to make your cake-baking super fun. Share with your friends and increase the love. Send snap shots of your creations to the ones you want to tease and make their mouth water! Happy baking! Features: ✔ Thousands of possible combinations for making your very own cakes. ✔ Several unique decoration categories, each with 10+ items – all unlocked from the very start. ✔ Completely free – no strings attached. ✔ You can save your created cakes and show it to your friends and family. ✔ Colorful, vibrant visuals. Use your device as media server with the UPnP Server. Set the UPnP Server Pro to start when you get connected to a specified WIFI network and start enjoying all the media from your device on the television or other UPnP enabled device! Specify what folder should be public for UPnP clients and more! ★This product works with DLNA devices!★ Note. If you find a bug or have a problem please contact us by email since we cannot help you if you post it in the reviews. But we haven’t mentioned all features yet; you can even set a dynamic DNS updater! So you can always access your device from everywhere, even if the IP changed! It also has extensive logging functionality, and you can even set the app to email you the log automatically! Features summary: - Start/Stop a UPnP server automatically when connected/disconnected from a specified WIFI network, or on boot - Verbose log (filter, email, etc) - Add multiple folders which will be shared over UPnP - Set the name of the UPnP Server - Add a Dynamic DNS Updater using the local or public IP of your device All features: - Add a UPnP Server, and set the following: name, port (for HTTP files serving), enable extra data for Samsung devices, enable logging, only log errors, start the server when connected to a specific WIFI network and disconnect when the WIFI network is lost, or start on boot, add multiple roots (folder which will be shared) - Add multiple dynamic DNS updaters (set a custom URL, or choose from ChangeIP, DNSdynamic, DNSexit, DNSMadeEasy, DNS-O-Matic, DNSPark, DtDNS, DynDNS, easyDNS, eNom, HE.net, Joker, Namecheap, No-IP, ZoneEdit) - For every dynamic DNS updater set the name, timeout (in minutes), hostname, username, password and whether to update with the local or public IP address, start the Dynamic DNS Updater when connected to a specific WIFI network, update on connectivity change, start on boot - On the settings page of the app you can set the maximum log items to keep, whether to keep a WIFI lock (prevent WIFI from disconnecting automatically), keep the device alive, keep the device alive full (keep the screen on, battery intensive), set to start the app on boot - You can search/filter the log, or set it to be automatically sent when the log limit is reached. For questions, comments or feature requests just contact us! Visit us on: http://www.icecoldapps.com/ Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/IceColdApps Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/IceColdApps
release_text: - Added the option to start the server directly when the app starts (and wasn't running in the background) - Fixed bugs which should solve stability issues of the servers - Added the option to save the server settings to the sdcard to prevent removal during upgrades - and more!

description: This app is your guide to choosing the right NHS service if you become ill or injured. It will help you find local NHS services and explain what each service does and when it should be used.

AtHome Camera is a video surveillance app that turns your unused computer, smartphone, tablet or smart TV into a video monitoring system for your home in minutes.Using AtHome Camera, you are able to keep an eye on your home when you are outside, and receive alerts right away in case of any incident. The App has been installed on more than 4 million devices worldwide, acting as baby monitor, pet camera, nanny cameras etc. ******* Main Features ******** 1. Remote monitoring on the go: watch live streaming via 3G/4G or WiFi network from anywhere at anytime; 2. Motion detection: get emails or push notifications instantly when motion is triggered; 3. Scheduled recording: you can specify two time intervals each day to automatically start/stop video recording; 4. Two-way Talk: communicate with people and pets using the built-in mic and speaker; 5. Secure and private: all connections between your phone and the video streaming device are encrypted; 6. Pan/Tilt: remotely control your IP camera left and right or up and down to capture an entire room; 7. Run at startup and hide on startup: option to run the AtHome Video Streamer in background mode; 8. Multiple platforms: support Windows PC、Mac、iPhone、iPad、iPod, Android phone and Android tablet. 9.Cloud Storage: never need to worry about losing the video recordings! ******* Three Steps to setup ******** Step 1: Download the AtHome Video Streamer App from Apple App Store or Google Play and install it onto your device. A unique Connection ID (also referred to as CID) will be assigned to the device after the AtHome Video Streamer is launched at the first time; Step 2: Download and install the AtHome Camera app onto another device which you want to use as a viewer, open the app, sign up and login; Step 3: Select "Add by CID" or "By QR Code" to add a camera, you are all set to enjoy the live streaming! ******** Supporting ********* Facebook: http://facebook.com/AthomeCamera Twitter: https://twitter.com/athomecamera @athomecamera Google+: https://plus.google.com/u/1/b/108167516628708822330/ Email: support@iChano.com Skype:support_ichano Website: http://www.ichano.com
release_text: 1. Brand new UI, optimized user experience; 2. Added cloud storage, never worry about losing the video; 3. Added "Alarm Master Switch", quickly turn alarm functions on or off 4. Enhanced Two-way Audio, real two-way synchronized speaking becomes more effective; 5. Added alarm date selection, select days more flexibly; 6. Added split-screen viewing, quickly preview streamers. More useful functions are waiting for you to discover!

description: ★ ★ ★ Free GPS altimeter ★ ★ ★ Altimeter PRO allows you to get the altitude of your current location calculated by GPS. The altitude shown in meters and feet. Include Compass. In addition, it shows your current GPS position by latitude and longitude coordinates, the accuracy of the signal and the GPS satellite time. Very useful to know how high you are in the mountains or in your own town, calculates the cumulative drop your sport routes. It is imperative to have the GPS enabled on your device.

L’application du réseau social uB-link, la plate-forme communautaire de l’université de Bourgogne. Suivez l’actualité de votre réseau uB-link : flux d’informations de vos communautés, consultation de votre profil, liens favoris, messagerie privée, répertoire de contacts, agenda mais également flux d’annonces emplois / stages vous permettant de consulter les tous derniers postes vacants ! Informations en temps réel, avec possibilité de rechercher des contacts et des offres d’emplois / stages, d’envoyer ou de répondre à des messages, sans avoir à rallumer son ordinateur. The application of uB-link social network community platform at the University of Burgundy. Follow the news of your network uB-link: information flow in your communities, consulting your profile, favorite links, private messaging, directory of contacts, but also calendar listings stream jobs / internships allow you to view all latest vacancies! Information in real time, with the possibility to search contacts and job / internship offers, send or respond to messages without having to turn on your computer.
release_text: Mise à jour de sécurité (Apache Cordova)

description: Continue the Adventure in Chapter 3: Teslas Electric Mist is a classic point and click adventure game revolving around the mysterious Nikola Tesla, a time traveling device he invented, and a big experiment gone wrong for the citizens of Colorado Springs in the late 1800s. The elegant graphics of the game really bring the creative puzzles and story to life. Search for clues and solve the puzzles as the imaginative story unfolds. In the game, you are the hero. Your family has a history with the great Nikola Tesla, inventor of the radio, alternating current, and patent holder of hundreds of electrical inventions. Your great-great-grandfather worked for Tesla in Colorado Springs around the turn of the century. A family secret has been passed down over the generations since then, that some day Tesla would need your familys help once more. What this means, no one in your family really knows. But the time has come, and you will be the one to answer the call. Using a time traveling device invented by Tesla, you travel back in time to Colorado Springs, and only you will have it in your power to save the people of Colorado Springs, and in fact, Tesla himself, from an experiment gone terribly wrong. Features: * The classic point and click adventure game re-imagined for touch devices * Elegant artwork in every scene * A story line that draws you into the mystery * Almost 200 scenes with dozens of puzzles that build upon each other * Beautiful soundtrack and sound effects * In-game hint guide, for those tough to beat puzzles * A dynamic map that keeps track of your progress * Important clues you come across are recorded automatically in your trusty notepad * Professionally translated into several languages - with more to come This family friendly game is a joy to play for individuals of all ages.

Flight Check brings to you all International and domestic airlines/flights, all over the world operating mainly on scheduled services, excluding charter and cargo services. Includes; - All International Airlines in the world, -All countries with its operating Domestic Airlines.
release_text: - Bugs fixed - More airlines added - New interface

description: Overal inzicht in de uitgaven met uw ANWB Creditcard? Dat kan met de ANWB Creditcard App! Belangrijk: • De ANWB Creditcard App is alleen beschikbaar als u een ANWB Creditcard heeft. Heeft u Mijn Card Online nog niet geactiveerd? Ga dan eerst naar www.mijnanwbcreditcard.nl om Mijn Card Online te activeren. Let op: dit geldt alleen voor de Hoofd Card-houder. Als Extra Card-houder kunt u de ANWB Creditcard App activeren zonder Mijn Card Online. • Bent u een Bijenkorf-, ICS- of ABN AMRO Card-houder? Dan kunt u geen gebruikmaken van deze app. • De ANWB Creditcard App is alleen beschikbaar voor uw smartphone. ICS werkt aan een ondersteuning voor tablets. Download de gratis app en profiteer van de volgende voordelen: • Actueel inzicht in uw bestedingen en bestedingsruimte, ook voor de Extra Card-houder. • Gemakkelijk en veilig uw online transacties afronden met een unieke e-Code. • Locatie van geldautomaten in uw directe omgeving. • Aanbiedingen en kortingsacties. Hoe activeer ik de ANWB Creditcard App? Na het downloaden van de ANWB Creditcard App activeert u de app met uw Card-gegevens. Daarna kiest u een toegangscode. Daarmee is de app klaar voor gebruik. Veiligheid De ANWB Creditcard App is door International Card Services (ICS) in samenwerking met ANWB ontwikkeld volgens de strengste veiligheidsnormen. Deze app is bovendien zeer veilig doordat de app alleen toegankelijk is via de door u gekozen toegangscode. Ook via de app streven ICS en ANWB ernaar u een excellente service te verlenen. Wij gaan dan ook door met het ontwikkelen van handige en slimme functies. Everywhere insight into spending your AA Credit Card? You can with the AA Credit Card App Important: • The AA Credit Card App is available only if you have a AA credit card. If you have not activated My Card Online? Go to first www.mijnanwbcreditcard.nl to Activate My Card Online. Please note that this only applies to the Main Card holder. If Additional Cardholder, you can activate the AA Credit Card App Without My Card Online. • Are you a Bijenkorf, ICS or ABN AMRO Cardholder? You can not use this app. • The AA Credit Card App is available for your smartphone. ICS is working on support for tablets. Download the free app and enjoy the following benefits: • Current understanding of your spending and disposable income, also for the Additional Cardholder. • Easily and safely complete your online transactions with a unique e-Code. • Location of ATMs in your immediate vicinity. • Special offers and discounts. How do I activate the AA Credit Card App? After downloading the AA Credit Card App activate the app with your card data. Then you choose a password. Thus the app is ready for use. Safety The AA Credit Card App by International Card Services (ICS) developed in collaboration with AA to the highest safety standards. This app is also very secure because the app is only accessible via the password you chose. Also work through the app ICS and AA to ensure that you provide an excellent service. We therefore continue to develop useful and smart functions.
release_text: · In de statusbalk vindt u, naast het openstaand saldo en het nog te besteden bedrag, nu ook de som van eventuele gereserveerde transacties terug. · Het design van de app heeft een facelift gekregen. · De ANWB Creditcard App is nu geschikt voor meerdere gebruikers. Ook uw gezinsleden kunnen met hun eigen ANWB Card inloggen op de ANWB Creditcard App. Ga naar instellingen > gebruikers en volg de procedure. · Er zijn een aantal bugfixes uitgevoerd in deze release.

description: Teddy bear app is designed for children to pull and tuck on the teddy and have fun with it. If you double click on the teddy you will fill the teddy up with helium and he will float to the ceiling. Let you kid play with Teddy!

description: --------Увлекательная НАУЧНО-ФАНТАСТИЧЕСКАЯ онлайн стратегия!------- Завоюйте галактику вместе со своими друзьями; приведите свой союз к победе! Защитите свою базу с помощью Орудий и Ракет; Командуйте своей армией, ведя войну против Ваших врагов в необъятной вселенной. В Звездных Баталиях Вы можете создать свою собственную, уникальную военную базу, конкурируя с тысячами игроков в космических онлайн сражениях. Ежедневно онлайн миссии предоставят Вам быстрый доступ к Энергокубам и помогут Вам постоянно развивать свои объекты. Откройте новый раунд звездных войн, расширьте Вашу территорию и завоюйте пространство. Действительно ли Вы настоящий боец эпохи звездных войн? Только Вы сможете это доказать! Особенности: - Бесплатная реалтайм стратегия - Возможность завести друзей, присоединяясь к союзам и создавая планеты! - Великолепная графика перенесет Вас в фантастическую вселенную - Космическая Боевая Стратегическая игра с высокотехнологичной космической тематикой сражений - Боритесь совместно или против других игроков сервера - Стройте - Нападайте - Завоевывайте вместе с другими игроками Если у Вас есть какие-либо проблемы или предложения по «Звездным Баталиям», Вы можете связаться с нами в любое время через: электронная почта: starfights@mangolee.com Официальная группа «Звездных Баталий» в ВК: http://vk.com/mangolee_starfights -------- Captivating SF online strategy! ------- Conquer the galaxy with his friends; Bring your alliance to victory! Defend your base by means of guns and missiles; In command of his army, waging war against your enemies in the vast universe. In stellar battle, you can create your own, unique military base, competing with thousands of players in the online space battles. Daily online mission will provide you with quick access to Energokubam and will help you to constantly develop their sites. Open a new round of Star Wars, expand your territory and conquer space. Are you a real fighter era of Star Wars? Only you will be able to prove it! description: Finally... txt-book app lets you convert text-message (SMS + MMS) conversations into a creative and personalized text message book. Two unique PDF export styles: CONVERSATION or STORYBOOK. You can add a title, cover photo, nicknames, and back-cover note. Save it. Send it. File it. Print it. Keep for your records. Keep as a diary...or we'll bind it for the perfect gift! See below for helpful tips! · Download the app and start creating your first txt-book · Create your txt-book and decide to keep your book for $0.99 or upgrade to the UNLIMITED package to create, edit and send as many books as you like. · Convert SMS and MMS texts · Display large crisp photos · Videos appear as enhanced thumbnails · Select any date range ( For long text threads you can create several shorter books as Volume 1, 2, 3... ) · Remove unwanted messages and photos · Edit nicknames to personalize your txt-book · Privacy Guaranteed - All books are created locally on your phone - no data leaves your phone. · Create a book in as little as 30 seconds (if you have many texts/images it can take several minutes) · Print your book yourself -or- we'll professionally bind it for you. Visit www.txt-book.com for details and discounts. · Your txt-book arrives as a PDF file via your own e-mail service, a copy of the txt-book PDF file is also saved to your phone's memory card. If you do not receive your e-mail simply locate the file on your phone. - Not all foreign language characters and emoticons are supported. A txt-book is a perfect and easy gift for anniversaries, birthdays, graduations, Valentine’s Day, long-distance relationships or just...because. Text message conversations chronicle our modern lives. With txt-book now you can preserve the jokes, fights and photos that we share every day. Two Unique Export Styles: CONVERSATION: Displays the texts and photos in bubbles similar to the way it appears on your phone. The date and time, if chosen, are displayed above each bubble as well as the speaker's name. Photos appear larger than they do in your text-message conversation. STORYBOOK: Adds phrases to the beginning and end of text messages so that your text conversations look and read like a novel. Text messages are always shown in quotes, and words like, "replied Kristin" are added after a text message. Sentences are used to introduce a new day such as, "On July 4, 2013 Mark texted Kristin," so your txt-book flows like a story. Photos appear larger than they do in your text-message conversation. You don't have to choose between one - if you get the UNLIMITED package, you can make as many books as you want. Change the way names appear in your book. You may decide to change your Father's name to, "Dad." Or your boyfriend's name to, "Boo." Your Cover Page features a photo that you select and a title that you create. The Back-Cover Note allows you to write a description that explains the book's meaning, or create a special message to the recipient such as, "To Kristin - I hope this book has a second volume. Please keep this to remind you of our first three months. Love, Mark." If you don't want a Title, Cover Photo or back-cover note then you can simply leave them out. Txt-book was created so people can transform the conversations between friends, family and lovers into a book. Many people simply use txt-book to keep a personal record of easy-to-read volumes of their day-to-day conversations. You can be the author of hundreds of txt-books...get started now!
release_text: Have your txt-book bound. Visit www.txt-book.com for information on how to bind your txt-book.

description: Individually Designed Optimum Dosing Strategies, or ID – ODS, is a simulation resource tool with extensive model library built from population pharmacokinetic models published in high quality, peer reviewed literature. The application is designed to aid health care professionals in the optimal dosing and continuous therapeutic monitoring of medications at the bedside. Enter all clinically relevant information through a user friendly interface to generate priori dosing regimens or to supply concentration data for posteriori dose adjustments in the adult patient population via Monte Carlo simulation and individual pharmacokinetic parameter optimization via Bayesian feedback.

description: Make your Flight Simulator experience a more realistic one. iFMS will provides you with a nearly fully functional "Boeing style" Flight Management System and HSI display on your mobile device. The FMS display and functionality simulates the "Boeing style" Flight Management System accurately. Apart from all the standard flight planning and tracking (LNAV and VNAV) functionality, all the more complex functions such as hold programming, custom waypoint programming by coordinates, heading/distance calculation or waypoints radial/intersection calculation and abeam route waypoint calculations are available as well, along with much, much more. The HSI display was developed to equally realistic standards. Like the real Boeing HSI display it has a moving "MAP" mode and "PLAN" mode which allows for stepping through the active route. Your programmed route, the waypoints, the fixes, the navaids, the airports etc. are all programmed to be displayed using the standard symbolization rules of the industry. The route is properly drawn as a rounded track with turns calculated based on ground speed and configurable parameters in your aircraft file. The visible range of the HSI can be set in the usual intervals between 5NM to 320NM. Toggling display of airports, navaids, fixes, and visual reporting points (if present in the navigation data) is off course possible as well and these functions respond depending on the current visible range, just they would in the real Boeing system. iFMS also includes an LNAV/VNAV engine which will control your aircraft's autopilot to fly the programmed LNAV/VNAV route. iFMS uses Wi-Fi to connect to your favorite Flight Simulator over your local network, alternatively iFMS can also use the device GPS (if present) as a data source, you can be a passenger in the car and practice your FMS programming skills. Be aware though, iFMS cannot be used for real world aviation navigation as this is strictly against the terms of use of this product. iFMS can be configured for use with almost any of your favorite Flight Simulator's standard aircraft and most add-on aircraft, 6 default aircraft configuration files are included but you can easily make your own on your computer and transfer them to iFMS. Features summary: - Realistic Flight Planning/Tracking/Navigation - Realistic Boeing style Flight Management System - Realistic Boeing style HSI display - LNAV & VNAV calculation - LNAV & VNAV engine to control your Flight Simulator autopilot - Single portrait or side by side landscape view - Configurable aircraft - Use your own created aircraft files - Loading and saving of flight plans - Import flight plans and aircraft from your PC - Updatable navigation data through Navigraph Memory Requirements: - Android mobile device with at least 512MB of RAM and 350MB free internal storage space Compatible flight simulators: - Microsoft Flight Simulator X - Prepar3D - X-Plane Win32 - X-Plane Win64 - X-Plane Mac Please visit http://www.ifms-fs.com for more details about iFMS, supported flight simulator packages and how to connect iFMS to them.

Marble Solitaire / Peg Solitaire is a board game for one player involving movement of Marbles on a board with holes. The Game is Known by the name Brainvita in India . Marble Solitaire is a classic marble solitaire strategic game. You need to remove as many marbles as possible. Our aim is to remove all marbles till there is no valid move remaining and end up with one marble in minimum time and movements. The one who can make one marble remaining in the board within the shortest time and movements will be the Master in the Score. ★★★★Game Play★★★★ 1. Start the marble solitaire game by moving any of the marbles behind the center hole to the center hole. 2. Then the marble which is jumped over get removed from the marble solitaire board. 3. Moving one marble over other marbles to remove all the remaining marbles. 4. You can move marbles vertically and horizontally but you cannot move marbles diagonally. 5. If One Marble is Left in the board then You will be the Toper in Google Play Leader Board . ★★★★★Game Features★★★★★ ✔ Three Difficulty Level : Easy, Medium and Hard . ✔ Brain Challenging game but Easy and Fun to Play . ✔ Google Play Game Features Like Leaderboard and Achievements . ✔ Score is Calculated on the basis of Time and Marbles Left in the Board . ✔ Simple Design and Easy to play . ✔ Remove Ad's by Purchasing the Ad Removal in-app . We are happy to see your suggestions and feed backs. android@igosttech.com
