Einen freien Parkplatz suchen und finden - ab sofort mobil mit der neuen ADAC ParkInfo App leicht gemacht. ADAC ParkInfo bietet eine nahezu vollständige flächendeckende Übersicht über die Parkeinrichtungen (Parkplätze, Parkhäuser sowie P+R Anlagen) in Deutschland: mit mehr als 5.500 Adressen, Infos zu Parkpreisen und Öffnungszeiten sowie vieles mehr. Besonders attraktiv: Für mehr als 900 Parkanlagen erhält man online den aktuellen Belegungsstatus, d.h. die Angabe wie viele Stellplätze aktuell noch frei sind. Mit Hilfe der farblich gekennzeichneten Anzeigen auf der Karte erhalten Sie einen Überblick über die aktuelle Situation im innerstädtischen Bereich oder auch an Flughäfen und können sich den schnellsten Weg (Route) zum nächsten freien Parkplatz berechnen und anzeigen lassen. Sie ersparen sich unnötige Zeitverluste und lästigen Parksuchverkehr und fahren zielgerichtet einen freien Stellplatz an. Mit dem integrierten Parkfinder finden Sie immer wieder auf direktem Weg zu Ihrem abgestellten Fahrzeug zurück. Achtung: Für eine korrekte Anzeige der dynamischen Parkhausinformationen sowie der aktuellen Belegungsdaten ist eine Internetverbindung notwendig! Search and find a parking space - immediately mobilized with the new ADAC Park Info app easily. ADAC Park Info provides almost complete coverage overview of the parking facilities (parking lots, parking garages and P + R facilities) in Germany: with more than 5,500 addresses, information about parking prices and opening times and much more. Especially attractive: For more than 900 parks to get online the current occupancy status, ie specifying how many spaces are currently still free. With the help of color-coded indicators on the map to get an overview of the current situation in urban areas or even at airports and can calculate the quickest route (route) to the next available parking space and display. This will save you wasting time and annoying parking search traffic and drive targeted to a free parking space. With ImperiHome, control your home automation systems and connected objects from a single and highly customizable interface. No need for a central server or dedicated setup. The application directly connects to your systems using APIs and allows you to remotely interact with all your devices. Currently, ImperiHome is able to connect to: - Fibaro Home Center 2 (ZWave controller by Fibaro) - Myfox Home Control 2 (security and home control system) - Philips Hue (lighting system) - Vera, VeraLite (ZWave controller by Micasaverde / Vera Control) UI5, UI6 and UI7 - ZiBase (Multi-protocol controller by Zodianet) - eedomus (ZWave controller by Connected Object) - IPX800 (Relay controller by GCE Electronics) - Eco-Devices (Teleinfo energy counter by GCE Electronics) - Netatmo Weather Station - Koubachi Plant Sensor - LightManager (Controller by JBMedia) - Zipabox (Multi-protocol controller by Zipato) / Cameras and security features not yet supported - Systems implementing the ISS API (ImperiHome Standard System) - MJPEG, MPEG4, h264 IP cameras - … more will come! At home using your wall-mounted tablet or outside using your smartphone, take benefit of ImperiHome features to control your smart home the way you want: - fast and responsive user interface - voice recognition - NFC tags actions - charts module - customizable dashboards with smart widgets (limited in free version) - Android shortcuts - local or remote network auto detection - layouts for both smartphones and tablets - several options to fine-tune the application - import/export preferences (only in pro version) - Sony SmartWatch2 integration - Automatic wake-up using front camera move detection. WARNING: this feature is highly dependent on the type of device and camera. We can't guarantee it will work wit all devices. - Tasker Plugin (pro version only) - REST Control API (pro version only) - Android Wear support (voice commands and camera viewing) This is the free version of ImperiHome. Unlock pro features by installing also the ImperiHome Pro Unlocker: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imperihome.lite.unlockerpro Check out more on ImperiHome webite ( http://www.imperihome.com ) and contact us at support@imperihome.com should you encounter any issue. description: Manage your online Flickr content: photos, photosets, collections, favorites, galleries, groups, contacts. FEATURES * Photostream - view and manage the photos in your Flickr photostream. You can download photos, add photos to photosets, add photos to a group, share, view/add comments or delete photos. * Photosets - view and manage the photos in your Flickr photosets. You can create new photosets, delete existing ones or remove photos from photosets. * Local media - view and upload your local photos to Flickr. You can upload them directly to an album, or just to your photostream. * Interesting - view, download, add to favorites or to galleries, share or comment on interesting photos. * Favorites - manage your favorite Flickr photos: add or remove favorites, add photos to galleries, download them to your SD card or share them. * Contacts - add or remove contacts, view their photostream, photosets, favorites and galleries. * Groups - view your groups, search for public groups, join or leave groups. Download photos from any group to your SD card, comment on them or share them. * Galleries - manage your photo galleries, add or remove photos, download and share photos. While you can create new galleries, you cannot delete them from the app due to an issue in Yahoo's Flickr API. * Search - search public photos based on keywords. Add to favorites, galleries, share or download any photo you find. * Multiple accounts - you can switch between all your Flickr accounts. * Video support (playback, download, upload) * Slideshow - view photos in any section of the app as a slideshow. DISCLAIMER * This product uses the Flickr API but is not endorsed or certified by Flickr. * Flickr is a registered trademark of Yahoo Inc. * Imprologic Inc is not not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Yahoo Inc. OTHER CONSIDERATIONS * We stand by our product - if you encounter any issue or if you are not satisfied with the app, we will either fix it or fully refund your money. You can send us your feedback at imprologic@gmail.com . * Free and continuous software updates: we will be releasing new features often, based on user feedback. * Detailed online help and FAQ: http://imprologic.com/flickr/android/help/ ----------------- Flippr for Flickr was developed in Ontario, Canada.

description: The English language is full of rules and exceptions to those rules. Learning them all can be tedious and frustrating for younger students. That’s why The Interactive Studio created English Quest, a fun and interactive game that uses 3-D incentives to help students work towards mastery. English Quest targets learners in the second grades, and offers age-appropriate lessons to help them build language skills. Teachers will delight in the array of features that allow them to adjust the game’s difficulty and to customize quizzes. Students will stay engaged as they attempt to build their own 3-D zoos by earning new animals for correct answers. English Quest is a "Ten Year Series" collection of high quality english questions crafted for the students. It differs from the traditional collection of Ten Year Series questions as it is infused with learning pedagogy to engage the learner and accelerate his assimilation. English Quest is designed by educators to allow the young learner to be motivated in learning and enjoys the learning journey. There are a total of 500 high quality English questions that are distributed randomly over 15 different Safari animals. The main aim of the app is to encourage the learner to attempt each set of the quiz so that he can collect each of the 15 safari animals in order to populate his very own 3D Safari Zoo. The adult or teacher can adjust the level of difficulties such as the quiz duration/passing score to cater to the varying needs of the learner. The safari animals serve as a source of motivation and end goals to encourage the young learner to keep on practicing the quizzes. In addition, the quiz format has also been given an extreme make-over. There are 3 different themes that the quiz is based on. The themes are the "Deadly Sharks", "Monster Crocs" and the "Giant Piranhas". The different themes, interactivity and animation of the quizzes aim to provide a fun and engaging learning environment for the young learner to enjoy the learning process. In the end, beside having the ability to review the correct and wrong attempts by the learner, the adult/teacher can simply look into the 3D Safari to see the number of animals collected. We are confident that your child will certainly enjoy the theme-based quizzes and on his way to improving his command of the English language

It differs from the traditional collection of Ten Year Series questions as it is infused with learning pedagogy to engage the learner and accelerate his assimilation. Science Quest is designed by educators to allow the young learner to be motivated in learning and enjoys solving Science problems. There are a total of 300 high quality Science questions that are distributed randomly over 10 different marine animals. The main aim of the app is to encourage the learner to attempt each set of the quiz so that he can collect all of the 10 marine animals to populate his very own 3D Ocean Aquarium. The adult or teacher can adjust the level of difficulties such as the quiz duration/passing score to cater to the varying needs of the learner. The marine animals serve as a source of motivation and end goals to encourage the young learner to keep on practicing the quizzes. In addition, the quiz format has also been given an extreme make-over. There are 3 different themes that the quiz is based on. The themes are the "Deadly Sharks", "Monster Crocs" and the "Giant Piranhas". The different themes, interactivity and animation of the quizzes aim to provide a fun and engaging learning environment for the young learner to enjoy the learning process. In the end, beside having the ability to review the correct and wrong attempts by the learner, the adult/teacher can simply look into the 3D Ocean to see the number of marine animals collected. We are confident that your child will certainly enjoy the theme-based quizzes and on his way to improving his Science.

Jadranski sajam se nalazi u Budvi, turističkom i poslovnom centru Crne Gore. Svojim položajem, neposredno uz Slovensku obalu, najpoznatiju plažu na crnogorskom primoriju, u samom centru grada, pod palmama pruža jedinstven ugođaj za obavljanje poslovnih i sajamskih aktivnosti. Za svojih 40 i više godina postojanja, Jadranski sajam je postao mjesto okupljanja najuspješnijih privrednika i kolektiva, mjesto prezentacije najnovijih dostignuća, inovacija, značajnih poslovnih kontakata. Mjesto gdje se iz manifestacije u manifestaciju traži mjesto više, ostvaruje rekordna posjeta i prodaja mnogih proizvoda. Jadranski sajam danas organizuje 15 specijalizovanih sajamskih manifestacija. Veliki broj stranih privrednih delegacija, prisustvo renomiranih svjetskih firmi, kao i medijski odjek, čine Jadranski sajam poslovnom kapijom Crne Gore. Kao članica Atlas Grupe, jedne od najvećih poslovnih grupacija na Balkanu, u čijem se sastavu nalaze i modena radiotelevizija, banka, investiciona banka, investicioni fond, penzijski fond itd. svojim klijentima i partnerima pruža širok spektar mogućnosti za implementaciju uspješnog posla. Svojim članstvom u međunarodnim sajamskim organizacijama : UFI ( Međunarodna unija sajmova ), CEFA ( Alijansa sajmova centralne Evrope ), EASE ( Asocijacija sajmova jugoistočne Evrope ), Jadranski sajam afirmiše državu Crnu Goru i njenu nacionalnu privredu. Jadranski sajam raspolaže sa oko 22 000 m2 zemljišta na najatraktivnijoj lokaciji u Budvi, na Slovenskoj obali. Koristi 11 000 m2 izložbenog prostora. Zatvoreni izložbeni prostor iznosi 3 000 m2. Za manifestacije koje to zahtjevaju dodatno se postavi do 8 000 m2 izložbenog zatvorenog prostora ( sajmovi turizma, namještaja i građevinarstva). Tokom godine organizuje niz specijalizovanih sajamskih manifestacija i događaja, koji svaki za sebe predstavlja idealnu priliku za uspješan biznis. Adriatic Fair is located in Budva, the tourist and business center of Montenegro. Its position, close to the Slovenian coast, the most famous beach on the Montenegrin coast, in the center, under the palm trees provides a unique atmosphere for business and trade activities. In its 40 years of existence and more, Adria fair has become a gathering place for the most successful entrepreneurs and collectives, place the presentation of the latest developments, innovations, important business contacts. The place where the events in the event requires more space, makes a record of visits and sales of many products. Adria fair today organized 15 specialized trade shows. A large number of foreign business delegations, the presence of renowned international companies, as well as media coverage, make the Adriatic Fair business gateway to Montenegro. As a member of Atlas Group, one of the largest business groups in the Balkans, comprised of Modena and broadcasters, banks, investment banks, investment funds, pension funds and so on. its customers and partners with a wide range of options for the implementation of a successful business. Through its membership in international organizations fair: UFI (Union of International Fairs), CEFA (Central European Fairs Alliance), EASE (Exhibition Association of South East Europe), the Adriatic Fair affirms the state of Montenegro and its national economy. Adria fair has about 22 000 m2 of land in the most attractive location in Budva, on the Slovenian coast. Use the 11 000 m2 of exhibition space. Indoor exhibition area is 3 000 m2. For events that require that extra set to 8 000 m2 of indoor exhibition space (tourism fairs, furniture and construction). During the year, organizing a series of specialized trade shows and events, which each represent an ideal opportunity for a successful business.

App Audience Perfect for SAR, Geo-caching, Aviation, or anyone simply interested in mapping. App Description Primarily, this App just performs simple math. More importantly, It first detects which one of the possible formats the coordinate was entered as. This prevents the user from having to spend time tapping between multiple input boxes, or wading through a plethora of configuration options. Once the App determines the input type, it then converts that number into other formats. App Background A couple of our developers volunteer with a local Search and Rescue organization and others do the same with an Aero Squadron. It became clear that, even though within a local area, neither group used the same coordinate system. In most areas, Search and Rescue typically use one GPS coordinate system, while another Search and Rescue Team, Law Enforcement Agency, Fire Department, other First Responder Groups, may use another. However, when this App first became available, it was quickly learned that this problem was not isolated to these teams. For example, one agency inside any given city / county may use one GPS coordinate system, while another may use something different. Additionally, when one of these agencies travels outside of its local area, they are sure to want to communicate easily with an agency that uses another system. Of course, there are a multitude of other personal and commercial entities that need to communicate a location in a format different that what it is currently stored in. Innovative Concepts is proud to offer this free App to help solve this communications hardship... App Details Press the "Get Current Location" icon or manually enter any coordinate and this App will convert whatever was entered into other commonly used coordinate formats. The input boxes auto-detect the entry from the following formats: ✔ Decimal Degrees (D.d) → Enter as 12.345678 ✔ Degrees, Decimal Minutes (D M.m) → Enter as 12 34.5678 ✔ Degrees, Minutes, Seconds (D M S.s) → Enter as 12 34 56.78 ✔ UTM → Enter as 12 + 123456 1234567 Upon pressing "Go", the App will convert the coordinates entered into: ✔ Decimal Degrees → 12.345678° ✔ Degrees, Decimal Minutes → 12° 34.5678' ✔ Degrees, Minutes, Seconds → 12° 34' 56.78" ✔ UTM → 12 N 123456 1234567 App Features ✔ Automatically detects input format ✔ Multiple keyboard shortcuts ✔ You can copy the results ✔ You can select which output formats are displayed ✔ You can override all coordinate symbols ✔ You can specify the latitude / longitude separator text ✔ You have the option to automatically load and convert the current GPS location on App start ✔ You can transfer the results to Google Maps (or any other capable mapping app) App Future ✔ Add option to continuously update / convert current location. ✔ Add more input/output formats.(Such as MGRS)
release_text: * Added ability to launch coordinates into any installed/registered mapping app * Added ability to accept and convert UTM - Beta Release * Added ability to select/copy both the latitude and longitude at the same time * Added ability to scroll each coordinate pair left-right individually * Added ability to scroll entire group of results up-down * Added Advertising to subsidize costs * Redesigned all layout views * Display portrait view on smaller screens even when viewing in landscape * Many more

description: When you are driving a vehicle. You can't lift the Call or check the SMS while driving. Now you no need to worry about getting call or SMS , you don't need the get the mobile out of pocket, the application will talk the name to you and if it is from a number not in your contact list, it will say complete number. The application uses the built-in Android text-to-speech engine to speak out the caller name. All incoming calls are announced over your current ring tone. Incoming messages can also be announced and Read. If your device connect with Bluetooth than app can be announced over some Bluetooth devices. You can enable/disable the Call/SMS feature. Just shake it to make it silent during incoming call and SMS. Features: * Speaks caller name of all incoming calls, over your existing ringtone * Speaks sender name of SMS and read SMS Content. * Speaks SMS or Caller Name is not saved in contact list then it will say complete number * You are allow to disable SMS, Caller name, SMS Contents from main activity * You are also allow to disable speech engine when you shake you device.

Another Gallery-App can classify your photos by location or time, but only with this it's hard to find your old photo and movie. So if you have organized your photos and movies by topic, it is easy. But with other App it is difficult to create a new folder and move/copy the photos and movies. Especially, to navigate a faw screen, is too confusing. In our Folder-Gallery App you show all your photos and folders on one screen and can process immediately and easy in the one screen. This will introduce you to move/copy your photos easy. This App features Organizing your photos and movies. Key Features 1, Create your folders - so you can categorize your photos in the folders 2.Move and Copy your photo and movie easily to another folder Your folders are listed in the top screen always. You can move / copy your photos and movies with Tapping the folder. it is very easy 3. Photo Explorer - In the photo Explorer, you can navigate folders up and down. you can organize your photo in your folder and sub-folder. 4. total and monthly views - You can show your photos full or monthly. 5.Grouping - Your photos and moview are classified based on the picture-date and the count. You can move and copy by the group 6. Folder excluded - You can exclude your unnecessary folder or secrit photos. it is hided 7.support to move and copy In other gallery-app - In your gallery-app, your move and copy your photos with Share fuction. 8.Register lock-app - Register your lock-app and you can use it easily. 9.etc - slideshow, share, send, rotate, crop, etc. tags : gallery, album, pic, picture, photo, photo album, photo gallery, Facebook, Twitter, photo wonder, image, instagram, Pinterest, Vingle

description: SyncSpace for Android provides a zoomable drawing space that can be shared in real time over the net, a sort of shared whiteboard. Turn on synchronization and send a link to the document to others who will be able to see your drawing and also make changes using SyncSpace. The resulting drawings can be emailed as images or saved for later editing. It's the perfect whiteboard replacement for distributed teams. Discover more about SyncSpace for Android and iPad at infinitekind.com/syncspace Note: The iPad and Android versions are compatible however the iPad version has some features not yet available on Android such as exporting to PDF and adding images/photos.
release_text: added Italian localisation some minor bug fixes updated app icon more updates coming soon!

description: First Grade Kids Word Play is a set of 250+ exercises using 250+ words to teach 5-7 year old kids phonics, spelling and reading. Images and spoken words help advance kids' learning. Kids learn to read as they play. The games are - * Word Search Kids look for words for the pictures shown in a word grid. They can hear the word sound and see the spelling by tapping on any image, but, they have to memorize the letters in the word to find it. * Sight Words Kids match first and second grade level sight words in a memory game by tapping on cards. * Phonics Kids learn the sounds made by vowel-combinations and complex consonant-combinations within the context of a word. * Spelling Kids practice spelling 4, 5, and 6 letter words. Our Story When we looked for apps to help teach our kids, we couldn't find any that were good. One was just information text for the kids to learn by rote. Another was multiple-choice tests - just press buttons. A third had 2 sound-tracks and 4 animations running all at the same time. How was a kid supposed to focus? So, we designed and built them games - that teach in the way parents and teachers explain concepts, and engage in the way playing does.

First Grade Word Play Lite is a set of 25 exercises using 20 words to teach 5-7 year old kids phonics, spelling and reading. The full version has 250+ exercises using 250+ words. Images and spoken words help advance kids' learning. Lite version has 5 exercises of each game - * Word Search Kids look for words for the pictures shown in a word grid. They can hear the word sound and see the spelling by tapping on any image, but, they have to memorize the letters in the word to find it. * Sight Words Kids match first and second grade level sight words in a memory game by tapping on cards. * Phonics Kids learn the sounds made by vowel-combinations and complex consonant-combinations within the context of a word. * Spelling Kids practice spelling 4, 5, and 6 letter words. Our Story When we looked for apps to help teach our kids, we couldn't find any that were good. One was just information text for the kids to learn by rote. Another was multiple-choice tests - just press buttons. A third had 2 sound-tracks and 4 animations running all at the same time. How was a kid supposed to focus? So, we designed and built them games - that teach in the way parents and teachers explain concepts, and engage in the way playing does.

V 1.30 Updates - New UI Controls (with actionbar added to v2.x handsets) - Improved audio handlers, especially while in a call - Minor bug fixes - Thanks again to everyone for great feedback - we take all comments into consideration, and a number of additions/repairs suggested by you are included in this update. The West Virginia 511 Drive Safe mobile app provides drivers with audible, hands-free traffic alerts from their smartphone. Open the app when you get in the car to begin your drive then set the phone aside while driving. The WV 511 Drive safe app will use your phone's speaker and GPS location to provide you with the audible travel advisories near your current location as you drive. In the settings menu you can customize the app to adjust the advisory replay interval and the number of miles radius for which you are interested in receiving advisories. HOW IT WORKS While driving you will receive audible updates on nearby construction, crashes, traffic delays, weather advisories and other helpful traveler information on nearby interstates and other high priority roadways while being able to keep your hands on the wheel and eyes on the road. The WV 511 Drive Safe app will continue to update you with nearby advisories as your vehicle continues to move. The application gives you audio player controls for Play, Pause, Stop, Skip, and Replay All. If the GPS signal is not available the device will utilize the highest precision location tool available (whether it be GPS or cell tower triangulation). You do not need to register to use this app or to get these alerts. We don't get or record any identifying information about you or your phone. By default, you will be elected into reporting your device-determined speed along with your location to our servers, but you can elect to opt-out from within the application. You must opt-out of this selection each time the application is restarted. The Technology The application is based on Information Logistics’ patent pending "Open Microphone Platform", which is a queue-driven streaming technology platform used in combination with your phone's built-in GPS. The data for the system is the WV travel advisory data. IMPORTANT - Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. IMPORTANT - NON-GPS DEVICES This application will have some limited functionality on these devices.
release_text: - improved audio handling when used with google maps navigation - crash report fixes

description: Receipt Hog is a fun and easy way to turn your everyday shopping receipts into real cash. "If you aren't using the Receipt Hog app yet, you are literally throwing money away." - Google Play Store review 1) Shop at any retailer, big or small 2) Snap a picture of your receipt 3) Get paid! Receipt Hog is hands down the easiest way to put some extra cash in your pocket with minimal effort. Feed your Hog receipts and be rewarded with coins or spins for the Hog slot machines, where you can win even more coins. Redeem coins for cash via PayPal or Amazon gift cards. Cha-ching! Unlike other shopping rewards programs, Receipt Hog rewards you for receipts no matter where you shop or what you buy. FEATURES: - Watch your Hog grow fatter as you feed him more receipts - a fatter Hog means a fatter payout for you! - You'll love playing the Hog Slot machine! Pull the lever down for a chance to win extra coins and even have your last shopping trip paid for! - Earn even more by referring friends, completing short surveys, scanning item barcodes, and submitting receipts regularly. - Quickly level up and complete monthly challenges to earn more spins at the Hog Slots - Enjoy a totally uncluttered wallet - Receipt Hog digitizes & stores your receipts in one secure place so that you don't have to keep the paper ones HOW RECEIPT HOG WORKS: Receipt Hog offers a unique opportunity to join an exclusive market research panel whose purchases and opinions influence the products and promotions that brands and retailers offer. By joining this exclusive panel, your receipt data and any answers to survey questions will be made anonymous and summarized in market research reports for brands. As a result, you’ll not only get paid for using Receipt Hog, but you’ll also be part of a small group that influences the products offered at your local stores. HERE'S WHAT OUR USERS ARE SAYING: "For those of you who want to be smart with your money, this app is for you. Snap pictures of your receipts, make some money, and have fun doing it!" "Anything that pays you back for things you normally buy anyway is great in my book!" "Many of the apps that allow you to earn points, rewards, or £ are only good if you live in a large city with lots of chain stores. This app is great regardless of where you live." "This is a seriously bad a** app. Get paid for doing your normal shopping. What's not to love?" "I am a Receipt Hog queen! I've cashed out several times through PayPal. This app is a must have! I love that you can save all of your digitized receipts for your personal record. Pretty cool if you ask me!" "Thank you for helping with my children's Christmas gifts! I love Receipt Hog!" "I do a lot of shopping for me and my family and it only takes a second to submit a picture of a receipt! Receipt Hog is hands down the easiest way to make extra cash."
release_text: What's New in Version 3.0 - Introducing Levels and Monthly Challenges: 2 easy ways to earn bonus spins for the Hog Slots! - Improved Hog Slot experience and look - Bug fixes and enhanced app performance

Note: SecureTeen Parental Control App must be installed on your child's phone or tablet. If you have installed parental control app on your own device to test the functionality then you can uninstall it by logging into the app on the device and then clicking "Disable Protection" button. ---------------------------------------------------- Worried that your Kids might be exposed to mature content online through cell phones and tablets? Is it your teens’ location that always keeps you on your toes? Don’t worry; we have the perfect solution for you. SecureTeen brings you a complete parental control app which addresses your worries by monitoring and filtering your kids’ online activities, keeping a tab on apps they download on their cell phones & tablets and keeps you informed about their location. SecureTeen Parental Control App helps filter out all the cheesy and harmful content so your teens of impressionable age can enjoy all the good that the internet has to offer. This app lets you enhance your child’s online experience by ensuring that they stay safe from stalkers, cyberbullying, mature content, porn, and a whole host of other harmful online elements. This all encompassing tool allows parents to control apps that their teens download, stay aware of their location and remotely monitor their devices. But just what can you do with this helpful tool for parents? Here is a sneak peek:- - Set a schedule of your child's phone or tablet usage. - Keep a check on your child’s online presence 24/7 with SecureTeen’s help. - Use the bulk of built-in categories offered by SecureTeen to block all inappropriate content from your teens' internet experience. - Don’t leave any backdoors or loopholes open for harmful content – use keyword based blocking along with white/black lists to entirely block unwanted content. - Don’t like an app they are using? Use SecureTeen to shut it down. Even if it’s installed on the phone, it won’t work. - Use Web History Logs to stay informed when it comes to your child’s online activity. - Use SecureTeen to track their location and where they go, so you can make sure their well-being isn't compromised. - Monitor all SMS/MMS sent and received from child device - Track all Facebook activity and get alerts for suspicious friends & posts with SecureTeen - Monitor all Instagram activity remotely from your web based dashboard - And the best part: SecureTeen lets you do it all remotely through an online control panel created especially for you so you can control your child’s safety. With SecureTeen, you can let your teen safely browse the internet with minimal supervision, but optimum care, while staying informed about their outdoor location. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Important notes for users: - SecureTeen can protect the settings screen of the device. If this setting is activated, it will require you to type your SecureTeen password to access the settings screen. - If an app or a web site is locked by SecureTeen then parents can unlock it by using their SecureTeen password. They can also allow it remotely from their web control panel by white listing the app or web site - You can remotely manage SecureTeen at any time by logging into your online dashboard at http://www.secureteen.com/login - Need help? Please call our Toll Free number 1-310-409-0451 OR visit the support page at http://support.secureteen.com/
release_text: - New Feature which let's parents set time schedule for device usage - Some bug fixes to improve user experience - Now parents can uninstall app from Settings as well

description: Manage your banking affairs anyplace, anytime. Download the free ING Mobile Banking App and experience the comfort of secure and quick banking from your smartphone or tablet. Also available in English. Advantages of the Mobile Banking App: • View your current and savings account and transfer money wherever and whenever • View and use your credit card and loan (only for your personal account) • Insight in the development of your investment portfolio • Easy in use, also with voice control • Secure with a self-selected mobile PIN • Ongoing development of handy features Secure mobile banking With the Mobile Banking App you manage your banking affairs with a secure connection and no personal information is saved on your mobile phone or tablet. This is why we advise you to always use the latest version of the app. It always has the latest features and meets current security standards. Activating the Mobile Banking App Using the app for the first time? It is a simple step by step installation. You do need to have a working Mijn ING and an ING Debit account. With a Business Account you can have access to the Mobile Banking App if you're entitled to that payment account. Tell us what you think We would like to hear what you think about the app. Leave a review in the Google Play Store. Or use the ‘Feedback’ button in the app. We use your comments to improve the Mobile Banking App.
release_text: Update: Installation problems fixed. Want to reach your goal faster? Saving is easier and more fun when you keep track of your goal. Set your target amount via the transaction overview of your savings account. Are you already using your fingerprint to log on? From now on you can also authorize your transactions using your fingerprint. Simply enable this in your app settings. We fixed some bugs. Any remarks or questions? Please send us an e-mail mobiel.bankieren@ing.nl

description: 今天，你應該知道的十件事，就看「天下每日報」！ 現在開始，透過智慧型手機，隨時隨地掌握天下事！ 更快、更方便、更容易！ 慶祝新版每日報app上架，全功能限期免費開放!!! 4大特色： ◆ 每日新聞：每日摘錄國際重點新聞，深入解讀，讓您輕鬆掌握國際大事。 ◆ 離線閱讀：下載後即可離線閱讀，節省您的行動網路流量。 ◆ 圖文縮放：內文與圖表均可縮放，閱讀更輕鬆！ ◆ 有聲新聞：不方便閱讀時，戴上耳機，一樣可以完整聆聽。 ===========關於《天下雜誌》=========== 天下雜誌以深度、理性報導風格, 前瞻國際視野, 是華文世界最優質的財經雜誌。創刊32年來, 持續引介讀者最新趨勢與議題, 備受各界肯定, 獲獎無數, 是決策者最倚重的財經媒體。 「天下」取名自「天下為公」,表示對一個美好社會的嚮往與追求。 每個關鍵時刻, 「天下」都以積極、前瞻、放眼天下的態度, 試圖為台灣在世界前進的潮流中找到定位, 為企業因應政經巨變找到出路, 為領導人與中產階級搭起溝通的橋樑, 為台灣追求一個美好而公平的社會。
release_text: 慶祝新版每日報app上架，全功能限期免費開放!!! ．全新設計界面 ．新增語音播放，用聽的瞭解今天大事

description: Re-discover banking with official Mobile Banking app for Android phones and Android tablets from ING Vysya Bank (now Kotak) There's a lot that the app lets you do apart from viewing your Accounts & Deposits, opening FD/RD, Funds Transfer, Bill Payment, Shopping & more including: - A balance meter that gives quick updates just with a tap. - Built-in SMS to beneficiary as soon as a fund transfer is done. - Alerts on mobile calendar for Bill Pay. Say 'No' to late fees. - Forget cheque counterfoils. Snap with your phone camera & store cheques in your App. - Send e-Gift Vouchers right from your phone. - Locate nearest ATMs/Branches & contact us with a tap. ING Vysya Mobile (now Kotak) requires following permissions: - Contacts: This is required to allow you send SMS after Funds Transfer. - Calendar: This is required to set reminders for your Bill payments. - Camera: This is to take pictures of your cheque and store it for your reference. - Location: This is required for Branch / ATM locator. - Photos / Media / Files: This is required to let you access gallery / click an image to set profile picture.  - Phone: This is required for let you dial customer contact centre. - Please note that ING Vysya Mobile (now Kotak) fetches this data only when initiated by user and not otherwise. Steps to start using ING Vysya Mobile (now Kotak) Application on your Android Phone/Tablet: - Login with your Net Banking ID & Password *If you are not a Net Banking user you can directly register for Mobile Banking on the app and access your accounts
release_text: Version 3.3 1. Connectivity issues for some handsets fixed : Issue with app getting stuck on welcome screen on some models rectified 2. UI enhancements 3. Improved Loading time

★탁상달력 2013이 출시되었습니다.★ 2012년 간단한 탁상달력! 내 손안에 12년 달력 2012년이 밝았습니다. 내 스마트폰에도 달력이 하나쯤은 있어야 한다면, 달력 기능에 충실한 이런 앱 하나쯤은 있어야 되지 않을까요? ★이런 기능을 합니다 √보기가 편한 달력 √한국의 공휴일, 기념일 표시 √음력이 1일, 15일 단위로 표시 √위젯설정으로 이번달 달력 보기 ★이런 분들께 추천 드립니다 √여러 기능 다 필요 없고, 달력만 딱 볼수 있으면 좋겠다는 분 √날짜가 크고, 잘 보이는 달력을 원하시는 분 √일상생활중, 업무중, 회의중, 공부중 등 바로 볼수 있는 달력을 원하시는 분 √한국형 달력을 간단히 볼수 있으면 좋겠다고 생각하시는 분 √위젯으로 달력을 설정하고 싶으신 분 ☆위젯 설정하는 방법 -홈 화면의 빈 공간을 2~3초 정도 길게 터치합니다. -[위젯]을 선택! -[2012 달력] 위젯을 추가해 보세요. ☆위젯의 업데이트 간격 -안드로이드 스마트폰의 기본 위젯 업데이트 시간 (대게 30분) 입니다. -다음날로 바뀌는 12시부터 30분 이내에 위젯이 갱신됩니다. -업데이트 간격을 기본으로 두어서 배터리나 단말기의 리소스를 적게 소모하기 위함 입니다.
release_text: [v1.9 업데이트] -2013년 달력 링크 버튼 추가 [v1.8 업데이트] -2013년 달력 링크 추가 [v1.7 업데이트] -기타 버그 수정 [v1.6 업데이트] -기타 버그 수정 [v1.5 업데이트] -고해상도 단말기 위젯 오늘 표시 문제 수정 (갤럭시노트, 갤럭시넥서스, 등) [v1.4 업데이트] -위젯이 1월로 고정되어 갱신되지 않는 문제 긴급수정 (불편을 끼쳐드려 죄송합니다.) [v1.3 업데이트] -위젯 달력에 오늘 날짜 표시 [v1.2 업데이트] -기타 버그 수정 [v1.1 업데이트] -총선,대선,수능 날짜 추가 -카카오톡 선물보내기 추가

description: For all the kids and the old ones who love to play word game, A new Word Shuffle game for you to learn words. According to an old study, games can be a great way to learn, so from now on, help your child learn the language and words in a fun way. Get ready to test your word power and speed in the all New Word Game – The Word Craze. It's an Easy yet Addictive game, where you have to form the words using the given set of five Alphabets. Do keep a look at the time running out. To Find out or mark words from a rectangular grid of apparently random letters is difficult but to create the words is even more challenging, yet full of fun. So are you up for the challenge? An eye contagious interface and easy to understand Game play, makes the game even more fun. In case, you find any difficulty with the game, feel free to contact us through inkling.help@gmail.com For latest news on new games released : -- Subscribe to our Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/teaminkling -- Like us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/teaminkling -- Follow us on Twitter : https://twitter.com/InklingArts

Are you interested in learning Turkish, but just don't have the time? Let's face it, not everyone can commit full-time to learning a language. We know there are many things going on in your life: school, work, the kids, that special someone. That's why we developed WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary Lite for the ultra-busy, 21st century lifestyle. There's absolutely no reason to miss out on all the benefits of learning Turkish just because you're light on time. With WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary Lite, you'll start down the road to fluency and reap the rewards that go with it. With WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary Lite, you'll master 200 of the most frequently used words and phrases in the Turkish language right on your Android device! The app doubles as a mini travel guide packed with cultural insights and practical Turkish phrases. Learn Turkish with audio recordings of a native Turkish speaker and a voice recorder so you can master perfect pronunciation anywhere, anytime. This list of the 200 most frequently used Turkish words is compact enough to fit a little review into you busy schedule. Study at your convenience at times and places that work for you! WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary Lite also comes with an addictive Word of the Day alert and free Turkish audio lessons when you sign up for a free TurkishClass101.com account inside the app. What makes WordPower so effective? It's Fun, Fast and Easy to Use! WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary Lite FEATURES: - Completely redesigned UI. The user interface has been redesigned from the ground up to be much cleaner, beautiful, and more user friendly - New! Android Tablet support - Turkish Top 200 Words: A special list of words specific to daily life in Turkey. You’ll learn handy cultural insights with every entry transforming Word Power into a mini travel and cultural handbook (3G or WiFi required to access Wikipedia links within the app) - Essential Turkish vocabulary all in one place showing you the spelling, translation, pronunciation, image, and class. (Note: You will need an internet connection for the initial download) - Sample Sentences: See and hear practical sample sentences with every word entry - Free Audio Lessons: Learn more than just words! Access the newest TurkishClass101.com audio lessons when you sign up for a Free Lifetime Account within the app - Updated Basic Resources: Want to explore the Turkish language even more? Learn everything you need to know with this comprehensive source of Turkish learning tips, information and material - Easy to Use Design: Intuitive Android swipe navigation allows visual learners to browse vocabulary images quickly. Find everything you need without excessive swiping and tapping - Custom Flashcard Settings: You're in control of your study sessions. Mix up question types (recognition, production, audio and visual) for a full understanding of each word - Listening Practice: Hear each word's proper pronunciation by a native speaker - Perfect your Pronunciation: Compare your pronunciation to the native speaker's with the Voice Recorder, easily accessible throughout the app - Personalized Word Bank: Save difficult or useful words, with their audio files, to review at any time - Advanced Search Function: Search entire database in English or Turkish - Progress Bar: Keep track of how many words you have really mastered - Authentic Turkish pronunciation 200 words not enough? Upgrade to WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary full edition to get 2000 more words and phrases!

Met de Stop Heling app kunt u met serienummers van elk product controleren of het gestolen is of niet. De app zoekt uit of het product als gestolen geregistreerd staat in de database van de Nederlandse politie. Let wel: een product dat niet is geregistreerd kan alsnog gestolen zijn! Soms is er geen aangifte gedaan of is de aangifte nog niet verwerkt. De app kan kentekens en een groot deel van de serienummers automatisch inscannen. Tevens biedt de app de mogelijkheid om uw eigen spullen inclusief serienummer en foto op te slaan. Erg handig voor de verzekering of een eventuele aangifte. Het is u dus aan te raden om eenmaal door uw huis heen te lopen en al uw eigendommen te registreren. Deze informatie blijft op uw toestel staan en wordt niet opgeslagen door de politie. Wel biedt de app de mogelijkheid om de lijst met uw eigendommen naar uw e-mailadres te sturen. Het kopen van gestolen goederen is heling en dat is strafbaar. Wie gestolen spullen koopt, stuurt de inbrekers op pad. Bij het kopen van tweedehands spullen is het dan ook belangrijk om alert te blijven. Let wel: een product dat niet is geregistreerd kan alsnog gestolen zijn (de database gaat overigens niet verder terug dan 1 januari 2010). Bij het kopen van tweedehands spullen is het dan ook belangrijk om alert te blijven. Als iets te mooi lijkt om waar te zijn, is het dat meestal ook! Keywords: politie, serienummer, diefstal, stopheling The Stop Healing app allows you to check serial numbers of each product or it is stolen or not. The app finds out whether the product is registered as stolen in the database of the Dutch police. Note: a product that is not registered can still be stolen! Sometimes there is no declaration made or the declaration has not yet been processed. The app can badges and a large part of the serial numbers to scan automatically. This app also allows you to store your own stuff including serial number and photo. Very useful for insurance or any declaration. It is therefore recommended that you walk by your house once back and record all your belongings. This will remain on your device and is not stored by the police. However, the app offers the ability to send the list of your belongings to your email address. Buying stolen goods is healing and that is punishable. Who buys stolen goods, send the burglars set off. When therefore buying second hand goods, it is important to stay alert. Note: a product that is not registered can still be stolen (the database incidentally does not go back to 1 January 2010). When therefore buying second hand goods, it is important to stay alert. If something seems too good to be true, it is usually too! Keywords: police, serial, theft, stop healing
release_text: 1.7.2 Deze versie lost problemen met de Samsung S6 op. 1.7.1 Sinds deze versie is het mogelijk om eigendommen als gestolen te markeren en daarna een lijst van deze gestolen eigendommen te e-mailen naar bijvoorbeeld jezelf, de politie of de verzekering. Verder zijn er nieuwe standaard veldnamen voor eigendommen zoals ‘aankoopdatum’, ‘aankoopprijs’ en ‘merk en type’.

description: You want to create wonderful collage? This is the time to create your photo collage by using Insta collage effect application. By using this application you can create your lovely photo collage very easily. This application has support for space, grunge, bokeh and image effects. It has support for color borders also. Смски на любые темы: любовные и эротические смс, смс поздравления и пожелания (смс с днем рождения, смс спокойной ночи, смс скучаю и другие). Отправляйте SMS всем: смс девушке и парню, смс другу и подруге, смс маме, жене, мужу и даже бывшему! Вы можете отправлять смс-ки прямо из приложения! Sms on any topic: and erotic love sms, sms greetings and wishes (sms happy birthday sms good night, miss sms, etc.). Send SMS to all: sms girl and guy friend and girlfriend sms, sms mother, wife, husband, and even the former! You can send SMSes right from the app!

3D Dancing Angel "3D Dancing Angel" is an elaborate music game with the fashion music and the hot dance. The visual quality of this game is almost the same as the PC one. Let's dance with the 3D pretty girl and immerse yourself in the "Story Mode" and "Free Mode"! The actress, Mailing, was born in the country called "Dance". The people in Dance receive the dance training from childhood and participate in the various dance competitions during the life. The top dancer in Dance will be called "Angel" and every year the grand dance competition will be held. All the top dancers in this grand competition have the same purpose - winning the title "Dancing Angel". Trying your best to lead Meiling to get the crowning glory.
A great puzzle game for kids from age 2 to 8. ★ Many different motorcycles ★ rocking soundtrack (mutable) ★ teaches hand & eye coordination

Dodge your way through a frenzy of deadly enemies to collect orbs, get points, chain together insane multipliers, and upgrade your spaceship for special abilities! Challenging your friends via seamless Facebook integration! Energy Collector Grid Wars unique action packed, retro styled gameplay will bring you to the edge of your seat! THE GOAL • Collect orbs to get points and replenish your energy levels! • Collect power-ups for special abilities and extra points! • Chain together orb collections for massive score multipliers! • Destroy enemies for more points! Highly functional timer widget designed specifically for MultiTimer Pro app. Select any timer created in MultiTimer Pro. Start, pause, resume, stop timers from the widget. * Search the Google android market for MultiTimer Pro and install to use this widget.

Jukebox (Music player) for SD CARD audio files. Create play list for the audio files in SD CARD. Select one or more songs to play in background. Songs still play even after closing the Jukebox application. To stop playing songs, select "Stop JukeBox" button in JukeBox window.

description: An application that converts your Android device into a bluetooth mouse. i-Control can be used to control the mouse of any remote computer via Bluetooth. The application supports left, middle and right mouse clicks as well as double-clicks and click-and-drag operations. i-Control can also show a live preview of the remote device's screen. A supplementary software should be installed on your remote computer in order for the app to work properly. This software can be downloaded for FREE from our website: http://www.i-realitysoft.com/downloads The Android device should be paired with the remote computer before use. Note that this app doesn't contain any ads.
release_text: Version 1.2 > New Java based, simplified software for the remote computer, which does not require any installations. Can be downloaded from here : http://www.i-realitysoft.com/downloads/i-Control_Server.jar > Improved user interface

description: Music Bounce is an app that allows you to imagine, sculpt and construct musical tones by simply manipulating shapes and choreographing physical collisions! Get rid of the old musical notes, and let your imagination do the magic together with the highly interactive graphical interface! Add SoundFrames of different shapes, into which you can add various SoundBalls. The SoundBalls will continously bounce inside each frame, producing distinct sounds whenever they collide with the frame. You can edit the shape of the frame or change the speed of the balls to get tones of different beats and tempos. Add as many SoundFrames you like to create that masterpiece you've always dreamed of. The app also contains a fully fledged Help page, to assist you in discovering the many features of this app. It gets better. You could also save your creations to a file, and import them later if you want to tweak the settings. Once complete, you can share your music composition with others on the FreeBounce Exchange! This feature of the app will also allow you to download and listen to creations from other MusicBounce users around the world. Over the next few weeks, we have decided to keep our ears open for masterpieces that will emerge from our users, and so if you are feeling lucky, please upload your creations to the FreeBounce Exchange through the app. If you are really keen, you could save your masterpiece to a file and email it to savithru.j@googlemail.com with the subject "Music Bounce". We will select a few and publish them on our website too! :) This app has been debugged and tested on the following devices: > Samsung Galaxy SII > Samsung Galaxy SIII > Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 > ASUS Transformer Pad > Samsung Galaxy Ace And finally as always, comments and reviews are always welcome.

Access all of your device's sensors and record and save data from each of them! Sensor Logger also has real-time colour graphs which display the time history of the measurements from each sensor. Supports sensor data export into plain text and CSV files. Obtain additional data about the sensor's hardware such as its resolution, delay, power and vendor. Tested on: - Samsung Galaxy S4 (Android 4.2.2) - Samsung Galaxy SII (Android 4.0.3) - Asus Transformer Pad TF300T (Android 4.1.1) - Samsung Galaxy Ace (Android 2.3.6)

One Click App2SD One Click App2SD allows you to get more free internal storage space. With the help of this simple utility you can move any application from your phone to your SD card. After installation you will see the full list of apps which can be migrated to SD, just click on app to move it to your card and vice versa. Long click to freeze app on phone storage.

Pahelika: Revelations is a Hidden Objects Adventure game about exploration and puzzle solving in a mysterious world. Fresh from his success in obtaining the hidden magic book Pahelika, Sudesh Budkoti thought he was about to get some well earned rest. He thought wrong. Not only was he not about to get any rest, he would be called upon to save the world from an ancient evil he had unknowingly unleashed… ☆ Critic Quotes ☆ "It is a puzzle adventure game worthy of the detective skills of Edgar Allan Poe's Auguste Dupin." - Adventure Classic Gaming "The locations are realistically rendered and do create a fantastical atmosphere in the magical world, which feels mysterious and encourages you to discover its secrets." - Adventure Gamers ☆ Description ☆ Explore beautifully designed locations, converse with people to obtain clues, brew magic potions, inscribe scrolls, cast magic, and solve creative puzzles in this immersive game that will entertain you for hours. ☆ Fun things to do ☆ • Brew potions, then use them to solve puzzles • Inscribe scrolls, cast spells • Combine items to create new objects • Repair machine, craft objects to solve problems • Great music! Use Headphones if possible! ☆ Please rate the game if you like it! ☆ Find mysterious objects, solve clever puzzles, as you seek the solutions to the answered questions facing you. Is it possible that there is a reason to the nightmares, or are they, like most things in life, purely by chance? The promise of secrets hidden deep into the layers of time beckon you, and you know that this is not merely a matter of locating some hidden object, or avoiding a trap. This is something that can change the entire mankind. Pahelika: Revelations is a pure adventure game. It does not feature any hidden objects scenes. That said, there are objects hidden in the game which need to be found out, so fans of the hidden objects game genre will not be disappointed... For Updates to Pahelika: Revelations and news on release of new games, follow us on Twitter or Facebook (Copy & Paste the links in your browser). Twitter Handle: http://twitter.com/Ironcode_Gaming Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/Ironcode.Gaming Website: http://www.ironcode.com
release_text: Pahelika: Revelations: Hidden Object Adventure Now supports over 5300 Devices!

description: ¡Toda la información que necesitás para andar en bici por Buenos Aires, en un solo lugar! La aplicación cuenta con: 1) Mapa de disponibilidad: - Ver en tiempo real la disponibilidad de Ecobicis y anclajes en cada estación (sistema público de bicicletas de la Ciudad de Buenos Aires). - Ver la ubicación de cada estación de Ecobicis. - Bicicleterías con información de contacto, bicicleteros para estacionar tu bici, bicisendas y locales con descuentos por ir en bici. - Muestra tu ubicación actual en el mapa mediante gps o internet. - ¡No es necesaria una conexión a Internet! Si te quedaste sin conexión de datos, ¡no importa! vas a tener toda la información disponible. - Desde el menú podés seleccionar qué categorías ver, para visualizar mejor el mapa. - Desde el menú escribinos si ves información faltante o incorrecta en el mapa y la agregaremos! 2) Acceso rápido para llamar al sistema de ecobici y retirar tu bici de forma más rápida. 3) Cronómetro para no olvidar cuando devolver tu bici. En Bici es una aplicación independiente, no dependemos del Gobierno de la Ciudad. ¡Los comentarios/sugerencias son bienvenidos! All the information you need to ride a bike in Buenos Aires, in one place! The application features: 1) Map Availability: - View real-time availability of Ecobicis and anchors at each station (public bicycle system of the City of Buenos Aires). - See the location of each station Ecobicis. - Bicycle Shops contact information, bikers to park your bike, bike paths and places with discounts for cycling. - Show your current location on the map using GPS or the Internet. - No Internet connection is needed! If you stay offline data, no matter! you'll have all available information. - From the menu you can select which categories see, to better visualize the map. - From the menu escribinos if you see missing or incorrect information on the map and add! 2) quick to call the system and remove your bike EcoBici faster access. 3) Timer to remember when returning your bike. Bike is a standalone application, not rely on the Government of the City. The comments / suggestions are welcome!
release_text: - Nuevo diseño! - Muestra en tiempo real la disponibilidad en las nuevas estaciones 24 hs de Ecobici. - Cronómetro para no olvidar cuando devolver la bici. - Formulario para contactarnos.

description: Play MagnoBot, a small robot with amazing powers. Your family has been kidnapped by mysterious strangers! Pick up the trail by following the oil puddles left by your leaky brother LubriBot. Wander around Zhu-Ji, the city oppressed by humans. Armed with your powerful magnets, control metal objects around you and dodge obstacles in front of you! Ready for the challenge? Crazy Magnets was created by students from ISART Digital, the Video Game and 3D Animation/VFX school, as part of their graduation project (class of 2013): David GIBAUD / Game Designer / Project Management Michel TOPUZOGLU / Game Designer / Project Management Léo MILLOT / Game Designer / Scénario / Narrative Alexandre LEBOURGEOIS / Game Designer / Level Design Romain DUBUC / Game Designer Programmer / Gameplay developer Clément MARCHAL / Game Programmer : I.A. / Gameplay developer Florian RENEAU / Game Designer Programmer / Gameplay developer Matthieu GOERIG / Game Artist / 3D Artist / Modeling Pauline GOSSELIN / Game Artist / 2D-3D Artist Xavier RYSINSKI / Game Artist / 3D Artist / 3D Animation Kevin DE LAURE / Music Sound Designer / Music Yannick TASSIN / Music Sound Designer / SFX

Set alarms to repeat by powerful date rules, which no other apps could do the same. This app is exactly the same as Power Alarm Clock. NO AD, NO IN APP CHARGE. Power Alarm Clock main features: 1. Define alarm and workday in complex date repeat rules. For example, "last Saturday of every month", "12, 16 and 23 of every month". See details in below section. 2. Combine two or more complex date rules to get more powerful result. For example, "from Monday to Friday of every week", plus "last Saturday of every month", then subtract "date range from 25/12/2012 to 28/12/2012". 3. Disable alarm of single time. For example, you set an alarm to ring at 7:30 every morning. It's possible to just disable the alarm of tomorrow morning, while all other alarms will still went off. 4. Disable alarms of selected date range. 5. Select any music in your device as alarm ringtone. 6. Ringtone & vibrate fade in when alarm went off. 7. Set an alarm to only ring or only vibrate. 8. Very large snooze button (turn on in preference). 9. Lock "Dismiss" and "Snooze" button for 2 seconds after alarm went off to prevent misoperation. 10. Lock "Dismiss" and "Snooze" button when device was in pocket to prevent misoperation. 11. Snooze time is configurable. 12. Show next alarm time and remaining time in status bar for easy access (can be disabled in preference). 13. Snoozed alarm will shown in status bar, you can dismiss it immediately. 14. If you don't response the alarm for sometime, it will automatically snooze for 3 times, then dismiss to save battery power. An notification message will leave in status bar so you know you miss it. 15. Speak alarm's name when rings (turn on in preference, currently only English supported). Date repeat rules supported: 1. Selected Dates. 2. Everyday. 3. Day of Week (Monday and Friday of every week). 4. Day of Week in Month (Second Monday and Tuesday of every month). 5. Last Day of Week in Month (Last Friday of every month). 6. Day of Month (3, 10 and 18 of every month). 7. Day Month Range (from 10 February to 15 March of every year). 8. Day Month Year Range (From 12/25/2012 to 12/28/2012). 9. Alarm X Off Y Days (Start from 12/24/2011, alarm 21 days then off 7 days in cycle). With these powerful date repeat rules, it is possible to set alarms just once, then it will went off on time so you don't have to worry about it everyday! Feel free to send me mail if you have any ideas, suggestions or needs any help for this app. (C) InfiniteSpace Studio, 2013 Jimmy F. Klarke, For Real Life
release_text: 1. Remove all ADs. 2. Fix snoozed alarm cannot be dismissed from notification bar issue. 3. Remove unrequired rights.

The South Carolina 511 mobile application provides real-time access to traffic and traveler information supplied by the South Carolina Department of Transportation (South Carolina DOT). Maps depict current traffic conditions, as well as incident and construction events that can impact traffic on all Interstate, U.S., and State Routes. DMS, HAR, alert, and weather information is also available. The map indicates the location of roadside cameras, which allow users to view current traffic conditions. As users move through the highway network, the app can keep track of their location on the map. South Carolina DOT's Twitter feeds are also accessible and provide information impacting traffic across the state's regions.
release_text: - Fixed an issue with the Evacuation Routes link.

description: Get notify about recent job vacancy over the Bangladesh. Very easy interface and user friendly with background job synchronization. No more wasting time finding your preferred job, its now in your hand.

The Marathon's World (www.marathonsworld.com) App is Here! Marathon's World is a social media website geared toward runners. Marathon・s World is picking up the pace in the running community. This dynamic website integrates races for runners to interact and share experiences and expertise. The App has finally arrived! Get Started: - Choose either running or cycling. - Clean, easy-to-read interface. - Per-kilometer pace table. - Real time map display of your route. - Post immediate results on the Marathon・s World website. - Fill in all details including, location, weather, as well as your post-run physical conditions for all running stats. - Upload and share photos. Wall: - An area for everyone to share their journals. - 'Like' your favorites and leave messages for other users. - View updates from both friends as well as others in your area. My Journal: - Display your personal log journal. - Easily track your monthly progress. - Friend List at your fingertips. - Personal information including running experience, total distance, cycling distance, annual distance, race schedules and stats. Races: - Displays most recent events. - Share and discuss all tracked races. - Add personal race stats. Post results, rankings and comments, as well as upload pictures to share. Home: - Display monthly and weekly running statistics. - Display notifications such as comments and messages. -With cloud interface you can easily log on to update, view or share your tracked information at any time.
release_text: - Fixed the bug from the home page crash

description: Mental challenge allows you to streamline your mind in a fun way! The game consists of four basic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division), in four different game modes, in the course of each of these, the application randomly select operations to solve. The game features a high score table where the highest scores appear in every game type. The 4 modes are: >60 seconds -. In this game you have to answer as many operations as you can in a minute. >Hit and increase.- You count with 60 seconds, each correct answer will increase 3 seconds and each incorrect answer will subtract 2 seconds. >Number lost.- Here you have to calculate the missing number in the operation. >Training.- Here you can make as many operations as you want with no time limit.
Are you tired to forget where are you parked your car in the mall?

Tulum is an asian(blacksea) ethnical instrument which has similarities with Bagpipe. It's sound is more dramatic then BagPipe. It is a harmonic instrument. It can sound 2 notes simultanously. It is the most different wind instrument in the world. With this app you can play realistic Tulum. description: Meteo Aeronautica Militare. Un'applicazione non ufficiale che fa uso delle immagini fornite dal sito dell'aeronautica militare italiana, meteoam.it. L'applicazione fornisce previsioni fino a 4 giorni di distanza, indicando la stato di agitazione del mare e la direzione dei venti sul mediterraneo. Le immagini fornite offrono l'altezza delle onde, il loro periodo e la direzione e velocità del vento. La WHDD fornisce l'altezza delle onde (Immagine di default). La WPDD fornice il periodo delle onde. La Normale fornisce lo stato del vento e del mare a 10 metri. Se l'applicazione si blocca all'avvio, o durante l'utilizzo, e' probabilmente dovuto ad una cattiva connessione internet. “Informazioni elaborate dal Servizio Meteorologico dell’Aeronautica Militare e  pubblicate sul sito www.meteoam.it” [tags] moto ondoso meteoam meteo am weather forecast sea level 10 metri correnti marine pesca traina fondale altezza onde periodo onde direzione media Weather Air Force. An unofficial application that makes use of images provided by the Italian Air Force website, meteoam.it. The application provides forecasts up to 4 days apart, indicating the state of agitation of the sea and the wind direction on the Mediterranean. The images are provided that the height of the waves, their period, and the direction and speed of the wind. The WHDD provides the height of waves (Image by default). The fornix WPDD the period of the waves. The Normal provides the status of the wind and sea to 10 meters. If the application crashes on startup, or during use, and 'probably due to a bad internet connection. "Information compiled by the National Weather Service and published on the website www.meteoam.it " [Tags] wave meteoam am weather weather forecast sea level 10 meters above current sea fishing trolling backdrop average height wave period, wave direction
release_text: Adesso l'applicazione, nel caso in cui l'Aeronautica Militare non abbia aggiornato le immagini, carichera` quelle della giornata precedente.

Your rude pirate mates left over 60 knotted ropes for you to unknot! To earn their respect solve each of their puzzles in as few moves as possible. Knotty Ropes is a beautiful and challenging puzzle game that will demand and improve your spatial & logical thinking in over 60 handcrafted puzzles. And best of all, you can create your own puzzles and share them with your friends! Can they beat your score? Optimized for smartphone AND tablets! --- Why we need the app-permissions: * Storage: Used to save your created puzzles. * Network Communication: Used to share your created puzzles.

Find great alternatives to fast food wherever you are. Food Tripping locates the closest eateries, juice joints, farmers’ markets, microbreweries, and more. Driving in America, you see signs for fast food at every exit. But how do you find the better spots? Food Tripping, the GPS-based app, shows you great options close to you with a fun, simple interface that puts the good stuff at your fingertips. With a growing database of eateries, healthy food markets, farmers’ markets, juice joints, artisanals, microbreweries, organic coffee spots and more, Food Tripping makes it simple to find healthier and more thoughtful food while you’re on the road, or at home looking for inspiration. It’s a collaboration from SHFT.com and Ford Motor Company, in a partnership dedicated to helping conscious consumers find better options. Food Tripping has done a lot of the work, but we need you, the user, to share the many hidden gems and add to the options we’ve supplied. Be a part of the community we’re building on the shift toward a healthier, tastier food future. Features: • Discover healthy, sustainable food options near you or in the place you’re traveling to. • Search by location, name, popularity, and category. • Track the places you’ve been to and mark your favorite spots to come back later. • View contact details for each location. • Suggest new businesses offering healthy, local, sustainable fare. • Share the places you discover with your friends via Facebook, Twitter, and email. • Connect with SHFT to learn more about living a conscious lifestyle.

Razorbacks Campus Guide shows you how to navigate through the University of Arkansas, Fayetteville campus without having to ask for directions. Search for campus buildings, dining areas, public art, computer labs and emergency boxes closest to you and get walking directions to your destination. Features: - List of all campus buildings with building codes, names and addresses - List of computer labs on campus - List of dining areas on campus - List of emergency boxes sorted by the ones closest to you - List of public art on campus - View places on a Google Map - Get walking directions to your destination Razorbacks Campus Guide has been developed to ensure a more productive and safer college experience.
release_text: - List of all campus buildings with building codes, names and addresses - List of computer labs on campus - List of dining areas on campus - List of emergency boxes sorted by the ones closest to you - List of public art on campus - View places on a Google Map - Get walking directions to your destination

Daily expenses note is a note that students and also anyone who want to mark down or record down their expenses in every expect, most importantly is their food expenses. A lot of people like to control their own financial by using paper notes or books to record their daily or monthly expenses. But the traditional way of recording things is way too old and most of the people now uses smart phones to record every thing in their daily lives. That is why a Daily Expenses Note is needed for everyone of us, this application will automatically sum up your daily expenses recorded in the apps.A lots of students aren't well funded to study in universities and colleges, most of the students are relying on loans to further their studies in getting their degrees and diplomas certificates. Which is why they need a budget control and to control their own financials, first by controlling their expenses. Students don’t use books and notes any more and if they use their computer to mark down, they need to wait for the computer to turn on which is quite slow for an old computer.

Optimize your time and learn Japanese smartly. JA Audiobook is a unique and entertaining Japanese reading assistant that helps you acquire effective communication in Japanese, whether you are a beginner or you already have an intermediate level. JA Audiobook contains a series of texts in order of increasing difficulty with sound and background music for each text that will entertain and help you stay focused, or even touch you and make you laugh! At any time, press on a sentence in the text for detailed information: • Complete grammar fact sheets that explain the structures used. • Fact sheets on the Japanese particles and counters encountered in the sentence. • Many additional comments. • A list of words used in the sentence with their meaning. • A detailed Kanji sheet accompanied by a tool that will assess your writing. • The complete conjugation and verbal constructions for each verb. • Assess your understanding of the text with a quiz at the end of each text, and get access to the translation of the text. JA Audiobook is like a teacher who remains at your side, ready to assist you when you are stuck. The objective is to rapidly familiarize yourself with authentic Japanese content and easily assimilate it for reuse in your own statements. You may already know many Japanese words and have read many lessons, but you are still unable to understand and express yourself naturally. Working with the JA Audiobook texts: • You memorize syntactic patterns that become natural and automatic. • You will learn words in context. • You will learn how to read Kanji (Japanese characters) in texts. • Your reading of Hiragana and Katakana will flow better without you noticing. • You will have more confidence in your level in Japanese, and you will thus progress faster. JA Audiobook is the missing link between your knowledge of the language (a set of individual words and grammar rules) and communicative competence that you want to achieve. Because you do not want to become an encyclopedia of the Japanese language, but simply to talk with your Japanese friends or to watch Japanese shows on TV. By the numbers: • 20 texts for a total listening length of more than 60 minutes • 877 different words • 577 different Kanji used • 80 different grammar sheets • 74 different particle usages • 19 Japanese counters • Over 40MB of carefully crafted Japanese material and data to install • 9 Japanese native speakers to bring more variation and improve your listening List of texts included: • Usagi- san, an Unexpected Hero: funny and moving tale for beginners. (7 texts) • The Strange Encounter of Kenta: story between a young boy and an old lady, for beginners. (5 texts) • Don't be late for the meeting! : dialogue between two colleagues to learn the polite oral form. (1 text) • Tomoko’s Journal: introduction to the informal style in writing. (1 text) • City or Country?: argumentative conversation to express your opinion in Japanese. (1 text) • Barbecue with Friends: telephone conversation between two students in informal speech. (1 text) • Yumi - Not easy to be a father: humorous text between an overwhelmed father, and his daughter. Colloquial and oral language is highlighted. (1 text) • Yumi - I want a tablet! : dialog between two schoolgirls. Oral forms are used. (1 text) • Cultural Experience in Japan: learn to tell about your trip to Japan in Japanese with more complex sentences that prepare you for the next level. (2 texts) These texts will mainly help you to take the JLPT N5 and JLPT N4. Once the texts are downloaded, no Internet connection is required. JA Audiobook is fully available in ENGLISH and FRENCH. To fully utilize JA Audiobook, it is advisable to know Hiragana and Katakana. If this is not the case or if you do not know what it is, install the free JA Sensei application, a complementary and comprehensive application which will teach you all the necessary basics and much more.
release_text: - Improved readability on the focused sentence in the detailed view - Improved general stability - The app would crash sometimes when pressing the Magnifying Glass FIXED - New scroll to position module - The app now remembers the latest selected sentence for each text - When switching between views, the text would sometimes restart from the beginning FIXED - Vocabulary in the kanji sheet displayed in French FIXED - Refreshed Kanji data - Android 5 ready

description: A super simple baby name generator app called Kick to Name. Kick to Name let's unborn babies kick to choose their own name! Parents, take a load off, and let your baby make the big name decision. And what fun to tell them one day that that they chose their own name! Open the app to the "Kick" page, choose whether you want a girl name or boy name. Then, place phone face down on mommy’s tummy while baby is active. When a kick is found, the app will sound a chime and display your baby's name choice from a list of thousands. You will have the option to "Add to Favorites" or "Discard" the name given by the baby name generator. -- Also, search baby names from the "List" page where there are thousands to choose from. Add as many as you want to your Favorites. -- Let baby kick to choose from your Favorites list (aka, your short list!) -- Even add your own crazy baby names to the Favorites list (if you somehow cannot find it on the Kick to name baby name generator list.) Then let baby kick his or her choice! Kick to Name, the end all baby name generator app for android has put the fun factor back in the baby naming process. Let the baby naming begin! Ready, Set, Kick! Apphouse Software has created this app purely for "kicks", pardon the pun, and for the fun of expectant parents everywhere. Enjoy!

Ad-supported free version. Paid version is ad-free. Tablet Sudoku brings everyone's favorite Japanese number game to your Android Tablet! Over 14,000 games available from easy to very hard. INCLUDES 6 THEMES FOR THE PRICE OF 1 GO SMS Girly Zebra Theme GO Launcher Girly Zebra Theme GO Contacts Girly Zebra Theme GO Locker Girly Zebra Theme Girly Zebra Keyboard Skin Girly Zebra GO Keyboard Theme Requirements This theme requires ALL of the following be installed on your device to use the complete theme. All applications listed below can be downloaded for free from the Google Play Store. GO Launcher (Free) GO SMS Pro (Free) GO Contacts (Free) GO Locker (Free) Keyboard Application (Smart Keyboard Trial or Pro version, Perfect Keyboard Pro, etc.) Description This is a Zebra theme with a Girly zebra print with colors of black, purple, and pink! If you LOVE Girly zebra print then this is the theme for you! Very girly yet still clean and classy. Features *1,000 Girly zebra icons *2 Custom Zebra print wallpapers *Custom font (see installation instructions below) Installation GO SMS: 1. Open GO SMS Pro 2. Press the menu button on your phone 3. Select Themes 4. Select the theme and hit apply GO Contacts: 1. Open GO Contacts 2. Press the menu button on your phone 3. Select Themes 4. Select the theme and hit apply GO Locker 1. Open GO Locker 2. Press the menu button on your phone 3. Select Themes 4. Select the theme and hit apply GO Launcher 1. Press the menu button on your phone after installing GO Launcher 2. Select Themes 3. Select the theme and hit apply Custom Font To install the custom font in GO SMS Pro follow these steps: 1. Open GO SMS Pro 2. Select Settings 3. Select Advanced Settings 4. Select Appearance Settings 5. Scan font packages You can then change each of the different areas (conversation, conv. list, and Popup window) to you liking and change the font. The font that is used is called Zebra [ Girly Zebra Theme]. You can also install the custom font in GO Launcher by going to Preferences, Visual Settings, Font, then select Scan font and then just select the Zebra Font. description: I am proud to present you the Steampunk GOkeyboard Theme. Thank you for trying it out. I've been away for a a few years and stopped development of themes. I hope to continue this year and will bring some freshly rusted Steampunk stuff along real soon. Thank you again. Please read instructions below to get this theme working. You will need to download the latest GOkeyboard Application from the market before applying this theme. Grab it here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jb.emoji.gokeyboard Once you have the above installed. Open GoKeyboard from your app drawer. Then Tap Menu > Display > Themes > Installed Themes > Tap Steampunk > Apply. Reboot your phone, as I find this helps top clear the cache and once it's restarted - you should hopefull;y have the Steampunk Keyboard. If not drop me an email using the links below and I will assist you further I hope you all like this as much as you have my others. Please contact me directly by email if you experience any issues before rating low. A very big thank you to all you great people who always go out of your way to contact me and rate my apps. You know who you are :) You guys and girls rock - thank you very much. If you would like to contact me, please use any of the means below. I'm always happy to hear from you. Don't be shy. Follow: https://twitter.com/@mindseedDesign Like: http://www.facebook.com/mindseed.design Plus: https://plus.google.com/109275982008448960608/posts Visit: http://www.mindseed.co.za Email: mindseed.design@gmail.com
