You can also search for jobs with incredible ease, filtering by city, sector or simply entering keywords relevant to your dream job. This time we bring you, besides tons of bugfixing, a brand new signup experience. It is easier to understand, much more leaner and beautiful. Hope you like it!

description: 4W is a simple tool for the management of jobs and small projects. It is an essential tool for contractors, small businesses and personal use. Our users are saying: -------------------------------- 4W Job Management is a must have for any trade. It does everything you need to track jobs, customers and scheduling. (Rob Drewsironworks) WOW!! The most AMAZING APP for my work! I have been scouring the android app list for months. Finally an app that meets my work needs. Plus many benefits I thought would NEVER BE OFFERED. This is a lifesaver, Light years ahead of all the other managers. THANKS!!!!! (John Dickson) Features: • Manage your jobs with an intuitive job description: Who, What, Where and When (4W). • Simple to use CRM features. • Add your own custom fields. • Seamlessly integrate your Contacts, Calendar Events and SMS messages. • Enter a simple or extensive job description, text and voice notes, and job/meeting locations. • Jobs can include a hierarchical list of job items. Jobs and job items can include a to do list. • Time and mileage entry with data export to csv file. (For Excel etc.) • Sync your phone and tablet data plus optionally send task and job data to others. (Sync is a payable subscription service) The application has... • Basic finance features only. (no estimates, no invoices no financial reports) • [Tech: No support for app2sd for database performance reasons] Permissions: To understand more about how the app is using permissions, scroll down to the Understanding Permissions below. Please note that 4W Task Manager is optimized for phone-sized screens. However, it is fully operational on tablets. 4W Task Manager was previously called OnTheJob Job Management. This application is not related to the Macintosh software called On The Job. Target users: Contractors, Small businesses and more. Understanding Permissions ------------------------- The app is using a variety of permissions, all required to make it easier to do your job. Many of the permissions are required to use the full- featured Calendar. If you want to know more about which permissions are needed for what, read on… • Modify/delete USB storage contents: Allows voice recordings and pictures taken within the app to be stored on the SD card saving internal phone memory. • Read/Edit SMS or MMS: Required to display all SMS/MMS messages exchanged with your customers and allows you to delete a message. Note that the app does not send SMS/MMS messages itself, but instead opens your normal SMS/ MMS app. • Display system-level alerts: Allows the app to show the 4W widget while in a phone call. • Prevent phone/tablet from sleeping: Required by the Calendar to enable all its features. • Record audio: Used by the built-in voice recorder. Voice recording can be used for notes and job descriptions. • Google mail • Use the authentication credentials of an account • Add or modify calendar events and send email to guests • Read calendar events: Required by the Calendar to enable all its features. • Read/write contact data: Allows the app to integrate your phone contacts as customers. You can then edit contacts from inside the app. • Read sensitive log data: In case of an application crash, the app automatically creates an email with log crash information and asks for your permission to send it to Job Crafts. No information is ever sent without your approval. • Full Internet access: Required by the Calendar. • Intercept outgoing calls, Read phone state and identity: Allows the app to show the 4W widget while in a phone call, which allows you to open the 4W app without leaving the call screen. • Receive data from Internet: This Google cloud messaging (GCM) permission is used for 4W data sync. • Discover known accounts, Control vibrator: Required by the Calendar and used by the task alerts.
release_text: Version 2.7.0.2: • Resolved a sync server issue introduced by Google on July 18th, 2015. ------------------------------------------------- Version 2.7: • Added distinct view and edit modes for job screen. • Added an option to move/copy job item and its children to another job. • Added an option to sort job list by description. • Added an option to add To Do/Schedule/Time to job items directly from a job's item list.

description: Feng shui tips Feng shui tips is an application that allows entering your birth date to get our kua number, there are eight numbers " kua " that correspond to the eight basic directions : North, South , East, West , Northeast, Northwest , Southeast, Southwest . With the Kua number and the help of the compass included in the application can determine which are favorable and unfavorable directions to the location and distribution in our spaces at home or work to harmonize well eliminating any negative influence. Feng shui tips also shows some useful and basic tips for our favorable location coordinates as our date of birth , but there are many Feng Shui cures and advice from expert teachers in this art can help us to balance and harmonize the spaces and diminish, eliminate the negative influence of the unfavorable directions in our lives. Feng shui tips is simple to use, you just introduce your date of birth and your gender showed our kua and compass to indicate us the favorable and unfavorable directions with the respective meanings of these tips and you must continue to distribute the spaces correctly to attract prosperity and success to your life.

This a a free trial for the app Paramedic Meds. This is a full version trial that allows you to run the app 3 times. Paramedic Meds is a great tool for medics in the field. This medical app contains nearly 100 of the most common used drugs and drips for quick reference at your finger tips. It also includes calculators to give you either mL/hr or gtt/min. With each drug you will quickly be able to see its class, action, indications, contraindications, precautions, side effects, routes, adult dosing, and pediatric dosing. Paramedic Meds also gives you the standard infusion rates for certain medications. You can add your own drugs, customize any drug, and hide drugs that you don't use. Internet access is required to use this trial, however it is NOT required for the paid version. STORAGE permission is required for the Backup/Restore feature. Medications included: Acetaminophen Activated Charcoal Adenosine Albumin Albuterol Aminophylline Amiodarone Amrinone Amyl Nitrite Aspirin Atenlol Atropine Bretylium Bumetanide Calcium Chloride Calcium Gluconate Captopril Cefotaxime Cimetidine Clopidogrel Dexamethasone Dextrose 25%, 50% Diazepam Digoxin Diltiazem Dimenhydrinate Diphenhydramine Dobutamine Dopamine Epinephrine (both 1:1000 and 1:10000) Epinephrine Drip Esmolol Etomidate Famotidine Fentanyl Flumazenil Furosemide Glucagon Haloperidol Heparin Hydrocortisone Hydromorphone Hydroxyzine Insulin Ipratropium Isoetharine Isoproterenol Ketorolac Ketamine Labetalol Levalbuterol Lidocaine Lorazepam Magnesium Sulfate Mannitol Meperidine Metaproterenol Methylprednisolone Metoclopramide Metoprolol Midazolam Morphine Nalbuphine Naloxone Nicardipine Nifedipine Nitroglycerin (Drip and SL) Nitropaste Nitroprusside Nitrous Oxide Norco Norepinephrine Ondansetron Oxygen Oxytocin Pancuronium Phenobarbital Phenylephrine Phenytoin Pralidoxime Procainamide Prochlorperazine Promethazine Propanolol Propofol Racemic Epinephrine Rocuronium Sodium Bicarbonate Succinycholine Terbutaline Thiamine Torsemide TPA Vasopressin Vecuronium Verapamil We also offer great support for this app. Want us to add a drug? description: Capture colors using your camera and store them in a color album. This app allows real-world color picking in real-time. Get instant feedback on the hex value that the camera sees. This app is also intended for inputting 'known' colors that you may use regularly. For example, you may need to store your company's branding colors. Useful for web designers/developers who want to quickly capture a rough color when out and about, or to store important color values that you use regularly. Useful when you see a color that inspires you that you want to save for later.

New: The creator of Iowa Police Field Reference has release a new app to make drunk driver testing easier and more accurate. Scroll down or search the market for "SFST Wizard" to learn more. Iowa Police Field Reference is an application for police officers, deputies, attorneys, criminal justice students, and other law enforcement professionals in the state of Iowa. It features a browseable, searchable database of the entire Iowa Criminal Code, Iowa Traffic Law, and other selected chapters that are useful in the daily duties of a law enforcement officer as well as a variety of additional reference material. Users can also mark commonly referenced statutes as "favorites" for even faster access. Features include: No internet access required Complete Iowa Criminal Code Chapter 321 - Iowa Traffic Law Fine Compendium Speeding Citation Calculator Court Date Finder Driver's License Classes/Endorsements/Restrictions. Dark interface for use night or day. Flexible search system to rapidly find the appropriate statute for any situation. Ability to share statutes with friends or fellow officers via email or text message. APCO 10 Codes (Radio Ten Codes) Uniform Bond Schedule Miranda Warning Phonetic Alphabet Drug Endangered Children Protocols
release_text: Changed in 2.0.2: -Fixed bug that was causing search to crash for some users. Changed in 2.0.1: -Updated Iowa Code (Effective 1/1/2015. Will update for laws effective 7/1/2015 as soon as Iowa publishes them) -Updated Compendium (7/1/2015)

description: In 1930, the prestigious Prof. Baboo teaches Archeology at the university. Although he is actually pretty clueless, Baboo always wants to impress his favorite student, Dorothy, for whom he feels "something special". Dorothy is a nerdy student; even though she is not very attractive, she is sharp and determined. Both will live an incredible adventure inside the Pyramid of Khafre. After getting lost in a university trip, they end up in the most dismal chamber of the pyramid. After desecrating it, they fall under the curse of Anubis, being hopelessly trapped. Together they must find a way to break the curse, and face the fearsome Mummy that inhabits the pyramid, as well as other dangers and mysteries. Prof. Baboo and the Chamber of Chaos is a game that blends action and adventure with the spirit of the classics. Step into the characters’ shoes and explore scenarios, delve for secret passages, examine the maps and make use of helpful objects to make progress in the adventure. Unravel the mysteries of the secret chambers, including the Chamber of Chaos, the most enigmatic of all. Luckily, there are clues hidden in the notes and maps that the eminent archeologist J.L. Burckhardt left scattered long after his investigation of the pyramid’s secrets. But the adventure has just begun, and, in the end, the most amazing and best kept archeological secret will be revealed.

Farm Mania (Swap Harvest) is a new matching puzzle! Switch and match cropsies in the fantastic adventure, switch and match three or more adorable cropsies to make a remove! There are more than one hundred levels waiting for you. Pass all the levels with strategic matching and you will become the super farm adventurer. Farm Mania (Swap Harvest) is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment. Farm Mania (Swap Harvest) is an all-new matching puzzle filled with mixed crops crush madness! Farm Mania (Swap Harvest) Features: ● Gather all kinds of cropsies or collect soils to win the level before you run out of moves. ● Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master. ● Take on your friends to compete for the best score and see who can switch their way to the fattest onions ever! ● Rechargeable boosters, extra moves and special power-ups to help with those challenging levels. Farm Mania (Swap Harvest) How to Play ● Switch and match 3 or more crops to reach the target. ● Unlock power-ups, collect, run your farm for the preparation of tough levels. ● Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get. Can you score high enough to earn 3 stars on every level? Play through hundreds of levels of switching, crunching chaos to help our Farm save the day! Have you got what it takes to be the next Farm Tycoon?

description: The power of magic Candy is in your hands! Switch and match 3 or more Candy to walk through more than 100 levels in this completely new puzzle adventure. Candy Deluxe is an addictive and delicious adventure filled with colorful gem crunching effects and well designed puzzles! With Candy style Candy to eliminate in each level, Candy Deluxe is twice the fun but familiar to play. So let's get started now! How to Play: - Swap the Candy to match 3 or more in a line to remove them - Match the Candy until the board become Translucent - If all block boards where the Candy exists are translucent,you win,if not,you lose.good luck! Game Features: - Match 4 Candy can win 1 Lighting Candy. - Lighting Candy can eliminate Candy in one row or column - Match 5 Candy can win the Color-changing Candy. - The Color-changing Candy can eliminate to any other colored Candy. - Stunning graphics with a highly polished interface. - Sharp and animated visuals bring this Candy tale to life. - Easy and fun to start but a challenge to get 3 stars in each level Thanks for playing!

EcoDrive Speedometer is a unique GPS speedometer allowing you to save your fuel, time and also enhancing safety. Besides, it helps you to avoid penalties and reach the destination first! ● The motion efficiency indicator on the base of velocity, speedup and elevations analysis, permits you to correct your driving style and reduce fuel consumption in real time. ● Personalized audio warnings help you to keep maximum speed allowed and not exceed it, at the same time keeping an eye on the road and saving your time. EcoDrive Speedometer is a powerful and handy instrument. ● All useful indicators are on the main screen, thus allowing you to control the elapsed distance, time, acceleration, height, maximum and average speed. You can switch between indicators of maximum and average speed, haul and time of various periods with a single touch. ● All the speedometer functions are available in a background mode too, even when the screen is off, while the speedometer window shows the speed above other applications (i.e. navigation software) and can be in every point of the screen*. ● EcoDrive Speedometer is supported all types of overland, aerial and naval transport and also all sports, where speed, distance, time and acceleration are important. Walking, bicycling or mountain skiing - anytime and anywhere you want to know speed or altitude/distances you overcome, how long your workout lasted, you cannot do without EcoDrive Speedometer. The main unique features: • Versatile scale of analogue speedometer → Customizable manual or automatic 1-1000 ml/h (km/h) scale limit → Customizable indicator type (an arrow or a bar) • Digital speed indicator • System of units options • Indicator of instant and average fuel (energy) efficiency for various time frames • Audio warning of overspeed (three customizable parameters) • Floating (overlay) speedometer window over all other applications • Background mode • Extended statistics for various time frames* and user's counter → Mileage → Overall time → Running time → Stop time → Maximum speed → Average speed → Average efficiency → Maximum acceleration and braking (ml/h per sec or km/h per sec) → The highest and lowest points of the track (above sea level) Good luck on the roads! * In free version, "floating window" option is available for 7 trial days. * In free version, the statistics for some periods is not available.
release_text: + Added a new view of Eco scale. The new version of the scale changes color depending on the economy of movement. For fans of the moving scale (old version), there's an ability to disable a new option in the application settings.

Ready for a challenge? Memory Castle is a rogue-like RPG that tests your memory skills and exercises your brain. Each stage is filled with monsters, gold, upgrades, experience points, and other items, and you have to find the key and get to the exit to advance. The twist is: at the start of each stage, you have just a few seconds to memorize where everything is and work out a path to the key and the exit. Then everything gets hidden behind blocks and you have to rely on your memory skills to clear the stage. There are 25 randomly generated stages that you must clear to beat the game, which unlocks additional classes with different starting stats and upgrades. Additional features include: An interactive tutorial that teaches you everything you need to know to play the game Easy, intuitive controls, only needs one finger, just touch the screen to move your character Seven achievements Original, selectable music Alternative game mode Quick Play allows you to just play one quick level Statistics tracked such as number of defeats, number of wins, time played, etc. Three additional character classes to unlock Highly challenging. You will not beat this game on your first try! 100% free. No ads, no-in game purchases.
release_text: Fix to the screen resolution on some devices. Border added to game grid to improve appearance.

A must have for any Muslim. With Masjid Now, you can check your local salah times for any day of the year, find nearby mosques, and determine the direction of the Qiblah using your phone's compass capabilities. Set notifications so that you are alerted when the time for salah arrives, or a reminder so that you know there is only a few minutes left before the next salah comes in. Masjid Now also allows you to add mosques to our ever-growing database, helping other Muslims to find a place to pray when they are traveling. Features: - Islamic Prayer Times *University of Islamic Sciences, Karachi *Islamic Society of North America *Muslim World League *Umm al-Qura, Makkah *Egyptian General Authority of Survey *Institude of Geophysics, University of Tehran *Jafari/Ithna Ashari - Find/Add Masjids - Determine Qiblah direction - 4 Muezzins for Adhan - Time Left until next salah - Reminders to pray - DayDream with next prayer time - NEW - Four (4) sizes of prayer widgets
release_text: - Fixed some timezone issues for Dhaka

description: SONGoLOGIST is a mobile songbook, guitar chord library, and sheet music editor in one. Browse hundreds of songs from pop, rock, country, jazz, R&B and more. A comprehensive chord dictionary with over 1000 chords is accessible from within each song so you’ll never miss a beat to switch apps. You can also create, edit and share your own songs via email or QR code. Each song in the app is checked for accuracy and presented using easy to read chord charts. Songologist is the best alternative to tab websites and an indispensable tool for musicians of all levels. SONGoLOGIST's 700+ song library, browsable by artist, title, genre, country, or language, is expanding on a daily basis with the most popular songs from around the world. Songs are displayed on your phone, tablet, or computer using standard chord symbols (e.g. C, G-, F7b9) in a chord sheet format. Tap or click any chord symbol to reveal a chord diagram for guitar. Song transposition is fully automated to accommodate any vocal range. The SONGoLOGIST editor allows you to create, publish, and share your own songs. The groundbreaking ChordBoard allows you to enter chords as though you were using a word processor complete with copy, cut and paste. Many elements of standard musical notation can be used such such as repeats, codas, bar lines, and section symbols (ABCD, V, PC etc) and a variety of time signatures (3/4, 4/4, 6/8, and even 5/4, and 7/8).
release_text: • Chord chart symbol displays just the selected chord • Chord-slashes are shown on empty beats • Chord chart view has been updated to display both bar-lines and chord-slashes • In edit mode user can now add new chord variations • Settings screen is updated, now Chord Slashes and Grid can be toggled • Transpose Song form is simplified • Song Submission screen is fixed

description: Caribbean Poker is an American casino game similar to five-card stud poker. However, unlike in standard stud poker game, you play against the house rather than against other players. There is no bluffing or other deception. Real poker strategy is applied. This app is a great time-killing solo game that allows you play anywhere on your phone or tablet with or without WiFi. If you're a poker fan, it also helps you sharpen your skills without risking a cent. Enjoy and good luck! P.S. The first release is dedicated to my wife, Alice Teh, for her birthday.
release_text: 1.1 Background music is added. Enjoy Gangnam Style while playing your poker game. 1.2 The game has got a new navigation screen, which makes it easier to play. 1.3 The game icon has been changed. 1.4 Background music is disabled by default for the first time users. You may switch it on in the settings. 1.6 Airpush has been removed.

description: Do you like to solve crossword puzzles? Or do you make crossword puzzles? Then this app will stand with you side by side to face the challenge. - Large word/clue collection: the app is built on top of a database of 240K+ words and over 2 million clues, which were collected from major daily newspapers in the past 50 years! - Bi-directional search: the app has two modes: CLUE TO WORD and WORD TO CLUE. CLUE TO WORD mode is for crossword solvers, while WORD TO CLUE is for crossword puzzle makers. - No microSD card required. Your phone/tablet doesn't have a microSD slot? No problem. Unlike some other large apps, it doesn't need one. Note: When you run Crossword Clue Finder for the first time, it will automatically install the database. The process may take a few minutes to finish, but you only need to do it once.

This is the Pro version of IELTS Vocabulary. Here're the highlights: - About 8500 words (4000 more than the lite version) - No ads IELTS, or International English Language Testing System, is an international standardized test of English language proficiency. There are two versions of the IELTS: the Academic Version and the General Training Version: - The Academic Version is intended for those who want to enroll in universities and other institutions of higher education and for professionals such as medical doctors and nurses who want to study or practice in an English-speaking country. - The General Training Version is intended for those planning to undertake non-academic training or to gain work experience, or for immigration purposes. IELTS is accepted by most Australian, British, Canadian, Irish, New Zealand and South African academic institutions, over 3,000 academic institutions in the United States, and various professional organizations. It is also a requirement for immigration to Australia and New Zealand. In Canada, IELTS, TEF, or CELPIP are accepted by the immigration authority. Being able to use a rich vocabulary is a major advantage in the IELTS and will certainly help you get a higher score. It will also be beneficial in your academic, personal and professional life. This IELTS Vocabulary Pro app will help you achieve your goal more efficiently: - The database contains a list of about 8500 IELTS words with pronunciation and a brief definition. - It uses 3 different approaches (Word List, Flashcard and Quiz) to fit in different students’ study habits. - You may mark the words that you’re not familiar with and review only those marked words in Flashcard mode. - It tracks your progress and results for all quizzes you take. Be better prepared!

Bitcoin ticker widget with crash detector Homepage: http://jurekovac.wix.com/bitcrash Functions: - Bitcoin exchanges: Major bitcoin exchanges are supported: Bitstamp, MtGox, BTC-e, BTCChina, Vircurex, Kraken. Support for other exchanges and currencies will be added in future versions. Several alts within these exchanges, are also supported. - Crash Detector: BitCrash detects when currency change diminish drastically over short period of time and indicates the crash by lightning icon in info area and notification. - Trend indicator arrows: Instant trends are indicated by nice graphical arrows on the left. Also, on the right, there is an info icon that indicates long term trends and trend reversals. - Alarm Notifications: Alarm notifications can be enabled to alarm you of currency crash. Also high and low alarms can be set to alert you of currency value above or below certain level. NOTE: - Allow at least 30 ticks before info icons (long term trends, crashes) start showing. - This app is early work: Feedback and contributions of any kind are deeply appreciated to support further development.
